BioLib  2.7.2.1
A GUI-less version of Bio .NET library for editing & annotating various microscopy image formats.

1using AForge;
2using AForge.Imaging;
3using AForge.Imaging.Filters;

31namespace BioLib
32{
33 /* A class declaration. */
34 public static class Images
35 {
36 public static List<BioImage> images = new List<BioImage>();
37 public delegate void ImageAddedEventHandler(object sender, EventArgs e);
38 // Declare the event
39 public static event ImageAddedEventHandler AddedEvent;
40
41 // Method to raise the event
42 static void OnMyEvent(EventArgs e)
43 {
44 // Raise the event
45 AddedEvent.Invoke(null, e);
46 }
47
48 // Example method that triggers the event
49 public static void TriggerEvent()
50 {
51 OnMyEvent(EventArgs.Empty);
52 }
53
56 public static BioImage GetImage(string ids)
57 {
58 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
59 {
60 if (images[i].ID == ids || images[i].file == ids)
61 return images[i];
62 }
63 return null;
64 }
68 public static void AddImage(BioImage im, bool newtab)
69 {
70 string ext = Path.GetExtension(im.ID);
71 if (ext == "")
72 im.ID += "ome.tif";
73 im.Filename = im.ID;
74 if (images.Contains(im)) return;
75 im.Filename = GetImageName(im.ID);
76 int c = GetImageCountByName(im.ID);
77 if (c > 1)
78 im.ID = im.Filename + "-" + c;
79 else
80 im.ID = im.Filename;
81 images.Add(im);
82
83 }
90 public static int GetImageCountByName(string s)
91 {
92 string name = Path.GetFileName(s);
93 string ext = Path.GetExtension(s);
94 if (ext != "")
95 {
96 if (name.Split('-').Length > 2)
97 name = name.Remove(name.LastIndexOf('-'), name.Length - name.LastIndexOf('-'));
98 }
99 int i = 0;
100 for (int im = 0; im < images.Count; im++)
101 {
102 if (images[im].ID.Contains(name) && images[im].ID.EndsWith(ext))
103 i++;
104 }
105 return i;
106 }
112 public static string GetImageName(string s)
113 {
114 //Here we create a unique ID for an image.
115 int i = Images.GetImageCountByName(s);
116 if (i == 0)
117 return Path.GetFileName(s);
118 string name = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(s);
119 if (Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(name) != name)
120 name = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(name);
121 string ext = s.Substring(s.IndexOf('.'), s.Length - s.IndexOf('.'));
122 if (name.Split('-').Length > 2)
123 {
124 string sts = name.Remove(name.LastIndexOf('-'), name.Length - name.LastIndexOf('-'));
125 return sts + "-" + i + ext;
126 }
127 else
128 return name + "-" + i + ext;
129 }
133 public static void RemoveImage(BioImage im)
134 {
135 RemoveImage(im.ID);
136 }
142 public static void RemoveImage(string id)
143 {
144 BioImage im = GetImage(id);
145 if (im == null)
146 return;
147 images.Remove(im);
148 im.Dispose();
149 }
155 public static void UpdateImage(BioImage im)
156 {
157 for (int i = 0; i < images.Count; i++)
158 {
159 if (images[i].ID == im.ID)
160 {
161 images[i] = im;
162 return;
163 }
164 }
165 }
166 }
167 /* A struct that is used to store the resolution of an image. */
168 /* A struct that is used to store the resolution of an image. */
169 public struct Resolution
170 {
171 int x;
172 int y;
173 PixelFormat format;
174 double px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz;
175 public int SizeX
176 {
177 get { return x; }
178 set { x = value; }
179 }
180 public int SizeY
181 {
182 get { return y; }
183 set { y = value; }
184 }
185 public double PhysicalSizeX
186 {
187 get { return px; }
188 set { px = value; }
189 }
190 public double PhysicalSizeY
191 {
192 get { return py; }
193 set { py = value; }
194 }
195 public double PhysicalSizeZ
196 {
197 get { return pz; }
198 set { pz = value; }
199 }
200 public double StageSizeX
201 {
202 get { return sx; }
203 set { sx = value; }
204 }
205 public double StageSizeY
206 {
207 get { return sy; }
208 set { sy = value; }
209 }
210 public double StageSizeZ
211 {
212 get { return sz; }
213 set { sz = value; }
214 }
215 public double VolumeWidth
216 {
217 get
218 {
219 return PhysicalSizeX * SizeX;
220 }
221 }
222 public double VolumeHeight
223 {
224 get
225 {
226 return PhysicalSizeY * SizeY;
227 }
228 }
229 public PixelFormat PixelFormat
230 {
231 get { return format; }
232 set { format = value; }
233 }
234 public int RGBChannelsCount
235 {
236 get
237 {
238 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
239 return 1;
240 else if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
241 return 3;
242 else
243 return 4;
244 }
245 }
246 public long SizeInBytes
247 {
248 get
249 {
250 if (format == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
251 return (long)y * (long)x;
252 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
253 return (long)y * (long)x * 2;
254 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
255 return (long)y * (long)x * 3;
256 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
257 return (long)y * (long)x * 4;
258 else if (format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb || format == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
259 return (long)y * (long)x * 6;
260 throw new NotSupportedException(format + " is not supported.");
261 }
262 }
263 public Resolution(int w, int h, int omePx, int bitsPerPixel, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
264 {
265 x = w;
266 y = h;
267 sx = stageX;
268 sy = stageY;
269 sz = stageZ;
270 format = BioImage.GetPixelFormat(omePx, bitsPerPixel);
271 px = physX;
272 py = physY;
273 pz = physZ;
274 }
275 public Resolution(int w, int h, PixelFormat f, double physX, double physY, double physZ, double stageX, double stageY, double stageZ)
276 {
277 x = w;
278 y = h;
279 format = f;
280 sx = stageX;
281 sy = stageY;
282 sz = stageZ;
283 px = physX;
284 py = physY;
285 pz = physZ;
286 }
287 public Resolution Copy()
288 {
289 return new Resolution(x, y, format, px, py, pz, sx, sy, sz);
290 }
291 public override string ToString()
292 {
293 return "new Resolution(" + SizeX + "," + SizeY + "," + format + "," + PhysicalSizeX + "," + PhysicalSizeY + "," + PhysicalSizeZ + "," + StageSizeX + "," + StageSizeY + "," + StageSizeZ + ");";
294 }
295 }
296
297 /* The ROI class is a class that contains a list of points, a bounding box, and a type */
298 public class ROI : IDisposable
299 {
300 /* Defining an enum. */
301 public enum Type
302 {
303 Rectangle,
304 Point,
305 Line,
306 Polygon,
307 Polyline,
308 Freeform,
309 Ellipse,
310 Label,
311 Mask
312 }
313 /* A property of a class. */
314 public PointD Point
315 {
316 get
317 {
318 return Points[0];
319 }
320 set
321 {
322 UpdatePoint(value, 0);
323 UpdateBoundingBox();
324 }
325 }
326 public RectangleD Rect
327 {
328 get
329 {
330 if (Points.Count == 0)
331 return new RectangleD(0, 0, 0, 0);
332 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform || type == Type.Label)
333 return BoundingBox;
334 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
335 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, Points[1].X - Points[0].X, Points[2].Y - Points[0].Y);
336 else
337 return new RectangleD(Points[0].X, Points[0].Y, 1, 1);
338 }
339 set
340 {
341 if (type == Type.Line || type == Type.Polyline || type == Type.Polygon || type == Type.Freeform)
342 {
343 BoundingBox = value;
344 }
345 else
346 if (Points.Count < 4 && (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse))
347 {
348 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y));
349 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y));
350 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H));
351 AddPoint(new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H));
352 }
353 else
354 if (type == Type.Rectangle || type == Type.Ellipse)
355 {
356 Points[0] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y);
357 Points[1] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y);
358 Points[2] = new PointD(value.X, value.Y + value.H);
359 Points[3] = new PointD(value.X + value.W, value.Y + value.H);
360 }
361 UpdateBoundingBox();
362 }
363 }
364 public double X
365 {
366 get
367 {
368 return Point.X;
369 }
370 set
371 {
372 Rect = new RectangleD(value, Y, W, H);
373 }
374 }
375 public double Y
376 {
377 get
378 {
379 return Point.Y;
380 }
381 set
382 {
383 Rect = new RectangleD(X, value, W, H);
384 }
385 }
386 public double W
387 {
388 get
389 {
390 if (type == Type.Point)
391 return strokeWidth;
392 else
393 return BoundingBox.W;
394 }
395 set
396 {
397 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, value, H);
398 }
399 }
400 public double H
401 {
402 get
403 {
404 if (type == Type.Point)
405 return strokeWidth;
406 else
407 return BoundingBox.H;
408 }
409 set
410 {
411 Rect = new RectangleD(X, Y, W, value);
412 }
413 }
414 public int Resolution
415 {
416 get { return resolution; }
417 set { resolution = value; }
418 }
419 public enum CoordinateSystem
420 {
421 pixel,
422 micron
423 }
424 public Type type;
425 public static float selectBoxSize = 8f;
426 private List<PointD> Points = new List<PointD>();
427 public List<PointD> PointsD
428 {
429 get
430 {
431 return Points;
432 }
433 }
434 private List<RectangleD> selectBoxs = new List<RectangleD>();
435 public List<int> selectedPoints = new List<int>();
436 public RectangleD BoundingBox;
437 public float fontSize = 12;
438 public Cairo.FontSlant slant;
439 public Cairo.FontWeight weight;
440 public string family = "Times New Roman";
441 public ZCT coord;
442 public Color strokeColor;
443 public Color fillColor;
444 public bool isFilled = false;
445 public string id = "";
446 public string roiID = "";
447 public string roiName = "";
448 public string properties = "";
449 public int serie = 0;
450 private string text = "";
451 private int resolution = 0;
452 public double strokeWidth = 1;
453 public int shapeIndex = 0;
454 public bool closed = false;
455 bool selected = false;
456 public bool Selected
457 {
458 get { return selected; }
459 set
460 {
461 if (roiMask != null)
462 roiMask.Selected = value;
463 selected = value;
464 }
465 }
466 public bool subPixel = false;
467 public Mask roiMask { get; set; }
471 public class Mask : IDisposable
472 {
473 public float min = 0;
474 float[] mask;
475 int width;
476 int height;
477 public int Width { get { return width; } set { width = value; } }
478 public int Height { get { return height; } set { height = value; } }
479 public double PhysicalSizeX { get; set; }
480 public double PhysicalSizeY { get; set; }
481 bool updatePixbuf = true;
482 bool updateColored = true;
483 Gdk.Pixbuf pixbuf;
484 Gdk.Pixbuf colored;
485 bool selected = false;
486 internal bool Selected
487 {
488 get { return selected; }
489 set
490 {
491 selected = value;
492 if (selected)
493 UpdateColored(Color.Blue);
494 else
495 updateColored = true;
496 }
497 }
498 public bool IsSelected(int x, int y)
499 {
500 int ind = y * width + x;
501 if (ind > mask.Length)
502 throw new ArgumentException("Point " + x + "," + y + " is outside the mask.");
503 if (mask[ind]>min)
504 {
505 return true;
506 }
507 return false;
508 }
509 public float GetValue(int x, int y)
510 {
511 int ind = y * width + x;
512 if (ind > mask.Length)
513 throw new ArgumentException("Point " + x + "," + y + " is outside the mask.");
514 return mask[ind];
515 }
516 public void SetValue(int x, int y, float val)
517 {
518 int ind = y * width + x;
519 if (ind > mask.Length)
520 throw new ArgumentException("Point " + x + "," + y + " is outside the mask.");
521 mask[ind] = val;
522 updatePixbuf = true;
523 updateColored = true;
524 }
525 public Mask(float[] fts, int width, int height, double physX, double physY)
526 {
527 this.width = width;
528 this.height = height;
529 PhysicalSizeX = physX;
530 PhysicalSizeY = physY;
531 mask = fts;
532 }
533 public Mask(byte[] bts, int width, int height, double physX, double physY)
534 {
535 this.width = width;
536 this.height = height;
537 PhysicalSizeX = physX;
538 PhysicalSizeY = physY;
539 mask = new float[bts.Length];
540 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
541 {
542 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
543 {
544 int ind = y * width + x;
545 mask[ind] = (float)BitConverter.ToSingle(bts, ind * 4);
546 }
547 }
548 }
549 public Gdk.Pixbuf Pixbuf
550 {
551 get
552 {
553 if (updatePixbuf)
554 {
555 if (pixbuf != null)
556 pixbuf.Dispose();
557 byte[] pixelData = new byte[width * height * 4];
558 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
559 {
560 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
561 {
562 int ind = y * width + x;
563 if (mask[ind] > 0)
564 {
565 pixelData[4 * ind] = (byte)(mask[ind] / 255);// Blue
566 pixelData[4 * ind + 1] = (byte)(mask[ind] / 255);// Green
567 pixelData[4 * ind + 2] = (byte)(mask[ind] / 255);// Red
568 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = 125;// Alpha
569 }
570 else
571 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = 0;
572 }
573 }
574 pixbuf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(pixelData, true, 8, width, height, width * 4);
575 updatePixbuf = false;
576 return pixbuf;
577 }
578 else
579 return pixbuf;
580 }
581 }
582 void UpdateColored(AForge.Color col)
583 {
584 byte[] pixelData = new byte[width * height * 4];
585 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
586 {
587 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
588 {
589 int ind = y * width + x;
590 if (mask[ind] > 0)
591 {
592 pixelData[4 * ind] = col.R;
593 pixelData[4 * ind + 1] = col.G;
594 pixelData[4 * ind + 2] = col.B;
595 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = 125;
596 }
597 else
598 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = 0;
599 }
600 }
601 colored = new Gdk.Pixbuf(pixelData, true, 8, width, height, width * 4);
602 updateColored = false;
603 }
604 public Gdk.Pixbuf GetColored(AForge.Color col, bool forceUpdate = false)
605 {
606 if (updateColored || forceUpdate)
607 {
608 UpdateColored(col);
609 return colored;
610 }
611 else
612 return colored;
613 }
614 public byte[] GetBytes()
615 {
616 byte[] pixelData = new byte[width * height * 4];
617 for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)
618 {
619 for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)
620 {
621 int ind = y * width + x;
622 byte[] bt = BitConverter.GetBytes(mask[ind]);
623 pixelData[4 * ind] = bt[0];
624 pixelData[4 * ind + 1] = bt[1];
625 pixelData[4 * ind + 2] = bt[2];
626 pixelData[4 * ind + 3] = bt[3];
627 }
628 }
629 return pixelData;
630 }
631 public void Dispose()
632 {
633 if(pixbuf!=null)
634 pixbuf.Dispose();
635 if(colored!=null)
636 colored.Dispose();
637 mask = null;
638 }
639 }
640 /*
641 public Size TextSize
642 {
643 get
644 {
645 return TextRenderer.MeasureText(text, font);
646 }
647 }
648 */
649 public ROI Copy()
650 {
651 ROI copy = new ROI();
652 copy.id = id;
653 copy.roiID = roiID;
654 copy.roiName = roiName;
655 copy.text = text;
656 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
657 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
658 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
659 copy.Points = Points;
660 copy.Selected = Selected;
661 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
662 copy.closed = closed;
663 copy.family = family;
664 copy.fontSize = fontSize;
665 copy.slant = slant;
666 copy.selectBoxs = selectBoxs;
667 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
668 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
669 copy.coord = coord;
670 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;
671
672 return copy;
673 }
674 public ROI Copy(ZCT cord)
675 {
676 ROI copy = new ROI();
677 copy.type = type;
678 copy.id = id;
679 copy.roiID = roiID;
680 copy.roiName = roiName;
681 copy.text = text;
682 copy.strokeWidth = strokeWidth;
683 copy.strokeColor = strokeColor;
684 copy.fillColor = fillColor;
685 copy.Points.AddRange(Points);
686 copy.Selected = Selected;
687 copy.shapeIndex = shapeIndex;
688 copy.closed = closed;
689 copy.family = family;
690 copy.fontSize = fontSize;
691 copy.slant = slant;
692 copy.selectBoxs.AddRange(selectBoxs);
693 copy.BoundingBox = BoundingBox;
694 copy.isFilled = isFilled;
695 copy.coord = cord;
696 copy.selectedPoints = selectedPoints;
697 return copy;
698 }
699 public string Text
700 {
701 get
702 {
703 return text;
704 }
705 set
706 {
707 text = value;
708 if (type == Type.Label)
709 {
710 UpdateBoundingBox();
711 }
712 }
713 }
720 public RectangleD GetSelectBound(double scaleX,double scaleY)
721 {
722 if (type == Type.Mask)
723 return BoundingBox;
724 double fx = scaleX / 2;
725 double fy = scaleY / 2;
726 return new RectangleD(BoundingBox.X - fx, BoundingBox.Y - fy, BoundingBox.W + scaleX, BoundingBox.H + scaleY);
727 }
728 /* Creating a new ROI object. */
729 public ROI()
730 {
731 coord = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
732 strokeColor = Color.Yellow;
733 BoundingBox = new RectangleD(0, 0, 1, 1);
734 }
746 public PointD[] ImagePoints(Resolution res)
747 {
748 return BioImage.ToImageSpace(PointsD, (int)res.StageSizeX, (int)res.StageSizeY, (int)res.PhysicalSizeX, (int)res.PhysicalSizeY);
749 }
756 public RectangleD[] GetSelectBoxes(double s)
757 {
758 double f = s / 2;
759 selectBoxs.Clear();
760 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
761 {
762 selectBoxs.Add(new RectangleD((float)(Points[i].X - f), (float)(Points[i].Y - f), (float)s, (float)s));
763 }
764 return selectBoxs.ToArray();
765 }
772 public RectangleD[] GetSelectBoxes()
773 {
774 double f = ROI.selectBoxSize / 2;
775 selectBoxs.Clear();
776 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
777 {
778 selectBoxs.Add(new RectangleD((float)(Points[i].X - f), (float)(Points[i].Y - f), (float)ROI.selectBoxSize, (float)ROI.selectBoxSize));
779 }
780 return selectBoxs.ToArray();
781 }
789 public static ROI CreatePoint(ZCT coord, double x, double y)
790 {
791 ROI an = new ROI();
792 an.coord = coord;
793 an.AddPoint(new PointD(x, y));
794 an.type = Type.Point;
795 return an;
796 }
804
805 public static ROI CreateLine(ZCT coord, PointD x1, PointD x2)
806 {
807 ROI an = new ROI();
808 an.coord = coord;
809 an.type = Type.Line;
810 an.AddPoint(x1);
811 an.AddPoint(x2);
812 return an;
813 }
823 public static ROI CreateRectangle(ZCT coord, double x, double y, double w, double h)
824 {
825 ROI an = new ROI();
826 an.coord = coord;
827 an.type = Type.Rectangle;
828 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
829 return an;
830 }
840 public static ROI CreateEllipse(ZCT coord, double x, double y, double w, double h)
841 {
842 ROI an = new ROI();
843 an.coord = coord;
844 an.type = Type.Ellipse;
845 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
846 return an;
847 }
854 public static ROI CreatePolygon(ZCT coord, PointD[] pts)
855 {
856 ROI an = new ROI();
857 an.coord = coord;
858 an.type = Type.Polygon;
859 an.AddPoints(pts);
860 an.closed = true;
861 return an;
862 }
869 public static ROI CreateFreeform(ZCT coord, PointD[] pts)
870 {
871 ROI an = new ROI();
872 an.coord = coord;
873 an.type = Type.Freeform;
874 an.AddPoints(pts);
875 an.closed = true;
876 return an;
877 }
878 public static ROI CreateMask(ZCT coord, float[] mask,int width,int height,PointD loc, double physicalX, double physicalY)
879 {
880 ROI an = new ROI();
881 an.coord = coord;
882 an.type = Type.Mask;
883 an.roiMask = new Mask(mask, width, height,physicalX,physicalY);
884 an.AddPoint(loc);
885 return an;
886 }
887 public static ROI CreateMask(ZCT coord, byte[] mask,int width,int height,PointD loc,double physicalX,double physicalY)
888 {
889 ROI an = new ROI();
890 an.coord = coord;
891 an.type = Type.Mask;
892 an.roiMask = new Mask(mask, width, height, physicalX, physicalY);
893 an.AddPoint(loc);
894 return an;
895 }
900 public void UpdatePoint(PointD p, int i)
901 {
902 if (i < Points.Count)
903 {
904 Points[i] = p;
905 }
906 UpdateBoundingBox();
907 }
913 public PointD GetPoint(int i)
914 {
915 return Points[i];
916 }
920 public PointD[] GetPoints()
921 {
922 return Points.ToArray();
923 }
927 public PointF[] GetPointsF()
928 {
929 PointF[] pfs = new PointF[Points.Count];
930 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
931 {
932 pfs[i].X = (float)Points[i].X;
933 pfs[i].Y = (float)Points[i].Y;
934 }
935 return pfs;
936 }
940 public void AddPoint(PointD p)
941 {
942 Points.Add(p);
943 UpdateBoundingBox();
944 }
948 public void AddPoints(PointD[] p)
949 {
950 Points.AddRange(p);
951 UpdateBoundingBox();
952 }
956 public void AddPoints(int[] xp, int[] yp)
957 {
958 for (int i = 0; i < xp.Length; i++)
959 {
960 Points.Add(new PointD(xp[i], yp[i]));
961 }
962 UpdateBoundingBox();
963 }
967 public void AddPoints(float[] xp, float[] yp)
968 {
969 for (int i = 0; i < xp.Length; i++)
970 {
971 Points.Add(new PointD(xp[i], yp[i]));
972 }
973 UpdateBoundingBox();
974 }
978 public void RemovePoints(int[] indexs)
979 {
980 List<PointD> inds = new List<PointD>();
981 for (int i = 0; i < Points.Count; i++)
982 {
983 bool found = false;
984 for (int ind = 0; ind < indexs.Length; ind++)
985 {
986 if (indexs[ind] == i)
987 found = true;
988 }
989 if (!found)
990 inds.Add(Points[i]);
991 }
992 Points = inds;
993 UpdateBoundingBox();
994 }
995 public void ClearPoints()
996 {
997 Points.Clear();
998 }
1002 public int GetPointCount()
1003 {
1004 return Points.Count;
1005 }
1011 public PointD[] stringToPoints(string s)
1012 {
1013 List<PointD> pts = new List<PointD>();
1014 string[] ints = s.Split(' ');
1015 for (int i = 0; i < ints.Length; i++)
1016 {
1017 string[] sints;
1018 if (s.Contains("\t"))
1019 sints = ints[i].Split('\t');
1020 else
1021 sints = ints[i].Split(',');
1022 double x = double.Parse(sints[0], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
1023 double y = double.Parse(sints[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
1024 pts.Add(new PointD(x, y));
1025 }
1026 return pts.ToArray();
1027 }
1033 public string PointsToString(BioImage b)
1034 {
1035 string pts = "";
1036 PointD[] ps = b.ToImageSpace(Points);
1037 for (int j = 0; j < ps.Length; j++)
1038 {
1039 if (j == ps.Length - 1)
1040 pts += ps[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
1041 else
1042 pts += ps[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + ps[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + " ";
1043 }
1044 return pts;
1045 }
1048 public void UpdateBoundingBox()
1049 {
1050 if(type == Type.Mask)
1051 {
1052 double minx = double.MaxValue;
1053 double miny = double.MaxValue;
1054 double maxx = double.MinValue;
1055 double maxy = double.MinValue;
1056 for (int y = 0; y < roiMask.Height; y++)
1057 {
1058 for (int x = 0; x < roiMask.Width; x++)
1059 {
1060 if (roiMask.IsSelected(x, y))
1061 {
1062 if (minx > x)
1063 minx = x;
1064 if (miny > y)
1065 miny = y;
1066 if (maxx < x)
1067 maxx = x;
1068 if (maxy < y)
1069 maxy = y;
1070 }
1071 }
1072 }
1073 BoundingBox = new RectangleD(PointsD[0].X + (minx * roiMask.PhysicalSizeX), PointsD[0].Y + (miny * roiMask.PhysicalSizeY),
1074 (maxx - minx) * roiMask.PhysicalSizeX, (maxy - miny) * roiMask.PhysicalSizeY);
1075 return;
1076 }
1077 PointD min = new PointD(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue);
1078 PointD max = new PointD(double.MinValue, double.MinValue);
1079 foreach (PointD p in Points)
1080 {
1081 if (min.X > p.X)
1082 min.X = p.X;
1083 if (min.Y > p.Y)
1084 min.Y = p.Y;
1085
1086 if (max.X < p.X)
1087 max.X = p.X;
1088 if (max.Y < p.Y)
1089 max.Y = p.Y;
1090 }
1091 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
1092 r.X = min.X;
1093 r.Y = min.Y;
1094 r.W = max.X - min.X;
1095 r.H = max.Y - min.Y;
1096 if (r.W == 0)
1097 r.W = 1;
1098 if (r.H == 0)
1099 r.H = 1;
1100 BoundingBox = r;
1101 }
1102 public void Dispose()
1103 {
1104 if(roiMask!=null)
1105 {
1106 roiMask.Dispose();
1107 }
1108 }
1109 }
1110 /* It's a class that holds a string, an IFilter, and a Type */
1111 public class Filt
1112 {
1113 /* Defining an enum. */
1114 public enum Type
1115 {
1116 Base = 0,
1117 Base2 = 1,
1118 InPlace = 2,
1119 InPlace2 = 3,
1120 InPlacePartial = 4,
1121 Resize = 5,
1122 Rotate = 6,
1123 Transformation = 7,
1124 Copy = 8
1125 }
1126 public string name;
1127 public IFilter filt;
1128 public Type type;
1129 public Filt(string s, IFilter f, Type t)
1130 {
1131 name = s;
1132 filt = f;
1133 type = t;
1134 }
1135 }
1136 public static class Filters
1137 {
1138 public static int[,] indexs;
1144 public static Filt GetFilter(string name)
1145 {
1146 foreach (Filt item in filters)
1147 {
1148 if (item.name == name)
1149 return item;
1150 }
1151 return null;
1152 }
1160 public static Filt GetFilter(int type, int index)
1161 {
1162 return filters[indexs[type, index]];
1163 }
1164 public static List<Filt> filters = new List<Filt>();
1173 public static BioImage Base(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1174 {
1175 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1176 if (!inPlace)
1177 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1178 try
1179 {
1180 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1181 BaseFilter fi = (BaseFilter)f.filt;
1182 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1183 {
1184 Bitmap bm = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1185 img.Buffers[i] = bm;
1186 }
1187 if (!inPlace)
1188 {
1189 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1190 }
1191 }
1192 catch (Exception e)
1193 {
1194 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1195 dialog.Show();
1196 }
1197 return img;
1198 }
1209 public static BioImage Base2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
1210 {
1211 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
1212 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
1213 if (!inPlace)
1214 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1215 try
1216 {
1217 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1218 BaseFilter2 fi = (BaseFilter2)f.filt;
1219 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1220 {
1221 fi.OverlayImage = c2.Buffers[i];
1222 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1223 }
1224 if (!inPlace)
1225 {
1226 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1227 }
1228 return img;
1229 }
1230 catch (Exception e)
1231 {
1232 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1233 dialog.Show();
1234 }
1235 return img;
1236 }
1245 public static BioImage InPlace(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1246 {
1247 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1248 if (!inPlace)
1249 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1250 try
1251 {
1252 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1253 BaseInPlaceFilter fi = (BaseInPlaceFilter)f.filt;
1254 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1255 {
1256 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i]);
1257 }
1258 if (!inPlace)
1259 {
1260 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1261 }
1262 return img;
1263 }
1264 catch (Exception e)
1265 {
1266 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1267 dialog.Show();
1268 }
1269 return img;
1270 }
1279 public static BioImage InPlace2(string id, string id2, string name, bool inPlace)
1280 {
1281 BioImage c2 = Images.GetImage(id);
1282 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id2);
1283 if (!inPlace)
1284 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1285 try
1286 {
1287 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1288 BaseInPlaceFilter2 fi = (BaseInPlaceFilter2)f.filt;
1289 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1290 {
1291 fi.OverlayImage = c2.Buffers[i];
1292 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1293 }
1294 if (!inPlace)
1295 {
1296 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1297 }
1298 return img;
1299 }
1300 catch (Exception e)
1301 {
1302 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1303 dialog.Show();
1304 }
1305 return img;
1306 }
1315 public static BioImage InPlacePartial(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1316 {
1317 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1318 if (!inPlace)
1319 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1320 try
1321 {
1322 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1323 BaseInPlacePartialFilter fi = (BaseInPlacePartialFilter)f.filt;
1324 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1325 {
1326 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1327 }
1328 if (!inPlace)
1329 {
1330 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1331 }
1332 return img;
1333 }
1334 catch (Exception e)
1335 {
1336 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1337 dialog.Show();
1338 }
1339 return img;
1340 }
1351 public static BioImage Resize(string id, string name, bool inPlace, int w, int h)
1352 {
1353 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1354 if (!inPlace)
1355 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1356 try
1357 {
1358 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1359 BaseResizeFilter fi = (BaseResizeFilter)f.filt;
1360 fi.NewHeight = h;
1361 fi.NewWidth = w;
1362 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1363 {
1364 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1365 }
1366 if (!inPlace)
1367 {
1368 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1369 }
1370 }
1371 catch (Exception e)
1372 {
1373 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1374 dialog.Show();
1375 }
1376 return img;
1377 }
1390 public static BioImage Rotate(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle, int a, int r, int g, int b)
1391 {
1392 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1393 if (!inPlace)
1394 img = BioImage.Copy(Images.GetImage(id));
1395 try
1396 {
1397 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1398 BaseRotateFilter fi = (BaseRotateFilter)f.filt;
1399 fi.Angle = angle;
1400 fi.FillColor = Color.FromArgb(a, r, g, b);
1401 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1402 {
1403 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1404 }
1405 if (!inPlace)
1406 {
1407 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1408 }
1409 }
1410 catch (Exception e)
1411 {
1412 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1413 dialog.Show();
1414 }
1415 return img;
1416
1417 }
1428 public static BioImage Transformation(string id, string name, bool inPlace, float angle)
1429 {
1430 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1431 if (!inPlace)
1432 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1433 try
1434 {
1435 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1436 BaseTransformationFilter fi = (BaseTransformationFilter)f.filt;
1437 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1438 {
1439 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply(img.Buffers[i]);
1440 }
1441 if (!inPlace)
1442 {
1443 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1444 }
1445 }
1446 catch (Exception e)
1447 {
1448 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1449 dialog.Show();
1450 }
1451 return img;
1452 }
1461 public static BioImage Copy(string id, string name, bool inPlace)
1462 {
1463 BioImage img = Images.GetImage(id);
1464 if (!inPlace)
1465 img = BioImage.Copy(img);
1466 try
1467 {
1468 Filt f = GetFilter(name);
1469 BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter fi = (BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter)f.filt;
1470 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1471 {
1472 img.Buffers[i] = fi.Apply((Bitmap)img.Buffers[i]);
1473 }
1474 if (!inPlace)
1475 {
1476 Images.AddImage(img, true);
1477 }
1478 }
1479 catch (Exception e)
1480 {
1481 MessageDialog dialog = new MessageDialog(null, DialogFlags.Modal, MessageType.Info, ButtonsType.Ok, e.Message);
1482 dialog.Show();
1483 }
1484 return img;
1485 }
1495 public static BioImage Crop(string id, double x, double y, double w, double h)
1496 {
1497 BioImage c = Images.GetImage(id);
1498 RectangleF r = c.ToImageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
1499 Rectangle rec = new Rectangle((int)r.X, (int)r.Y, (int)Math.Abs(r.Width), (int)Math.Abs(r.Height));
1500 BioImage img = BioImage.Copy(c, false);
1501 for (int i = 0; i < img.Buffers.Count; i++)
1502 {
1503 img.Buffers[i].Crop(rec);
1504 }
1505 BioImage.AutoThreshold(img, true);
1506 if (img.bitsPerPixel > 8)
1507 img.StackThreshold(true);
1508 else
1509 img.StackThreshold(false);
1510 return img;
1511 }
1518 public static BioImage Crop(string id, RectangleD r)
1519 {
1520 return Crop(id, r.X, r.Y, r.W, r.H);
1521 }
1522
1524 public static void Init()
1525 {
1526 //Base Filters
1527 indexs = new int[9, 32];
1528 indexs[0, 0] = filters.Count;
1529 Filt f = new Filt("AdaptiveSmoothing", new AdaptiveSmoothing(), Filt.Type.Base);
1530 filters.Add(f);
1531 indexs[0, 1] = filters.Count;
1532 f = new Filt("BayerFilter", new BayerFilter(), Filt.Type.Base);
1533 filters.Add(f);
1534 indexs[0, 2] = filters.Count;
1535 f = new Filt("BayerFilterOptimized", new BayerFilterOptimized(), Filt.Type.Base);
1536 filters.Add(f);
1537 indexs[0, 3] = filters.Count;
1538 f = new Filt("BayerDithering", new BayerDithering(), Filt.Type.Base);
1539 filters.Add(f);
1540 indexs[0, 4] = filters.Count;
1541 f = new Filt("ConnectedComponentsLabeling", new ConnectedComponentsLabeling(), Filt.Type.Base);
1542 filters.Add(f);
1543 indexs[0, 5] = filters.Count;
1544 f = new Filt("ExtractChannel", new ExtractChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
1545 filters.Add(f);
1546 indexs[0, 6] = filters.Count;
1547 f = new Filt("ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel", new ExtractNormalizedRGBChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
1548 filters.Add(f);
1549 indexs[0, 7] = filters.Count;
1550 f = new Filt("Grayscale", new Grayscale(0.2125, 0.7154, 0.0721), Filt.Type.Base);
1551 filters.Add(f);
1552 //f = new Filt("TexturedFilter", new TexturedFilter());
1553 //filters.Add(f);
1554 indexs[0, 8] = filters.Count;
1555 f = new Filt("WaterWave", new WaterWave(), Filt.Type.Base);
1556 filters.Add(f);
1557 indexs[0, 9] = filters.Count;
1558 f = new Filt("YCbCrExtractChannel", new YCbCrExtractChannel(), Filt.Type.Base);
1559 filters.Add(f);
1560 indexs[0, 10] = filters.Count;
1561 //BaseFilter2
1562
1563 f = new Filt("ThresholdedDifference", new ThresholdedDifference(), Filt.Type.Base2);
1564 filters.Add(f);
1565 indexs[1, 0] = filters.Count;
1566 f = new Filt("ThresholdedEuclideanDifference", new ThresholdedEuclideanDifference(), Filt.Type.Base2);
1567 filters.Add(f);
1568 indexs[1, 1] = filters.Count;
1569
1570 //BaseInPlaceFilter
1571 indexs[2, 0] = filters.Count;
1572 f = new Filt("BackwardQuadrilateralTransformation", new BackwardQuadrilateralTransformation(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1573 filters.Add(f);
1574 indexs[2, 1] = filters.Count;
1575 f = new Filt("BlobsFiltering", new BlobsFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1576 filters.Add(f);
1577 indexs[2, 2] = filters.Count;
1578 f = new Filt("BottomHat", new BottomHat(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1579 filters.Add(f);
1580 indexs[2, 3] = filters.Count;
1581 f = new Filt("BradleyLocalThresholding", new BradleyLocalThresholding(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1582 filters.Add(f);
1583 indexs[2, 4] = filters.Count;
1584 f = new Filt("CanvasCrop", new CanvasCrop(new Rectangle(0, 0, 0, 0)), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1585 filters.Add(f);
1586 indexs[2, 5] = filters.Count;
1587 f = new Filt("CanvasFill", new CanvasFill(new Rectangle(0, 0, 0, 0)), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1588 filters.Add(f);
1589 indexs[2, 6] = filters.Count;
1590 f = new Filt("CanvasMove", new CanvasMove(new IntPoint()), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1591 filters.Add(f);
1592 indexs[2, 7] = filters.Count;
1593 f = new Filt("FillHoles", new FillHoles(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1594 filters.Add(f);
1595 indexs[2, 8] = filters.Count;
1596 f = new Filt("FlatFieldCorrection", new FlatFieldCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1597 filters.Add(f);
1598 indexs[2, 9] = filters.Count;
1599 f = new Filt("TopHat", new TopHat(), Filt.Type.InPlace);
1600 filters.Add(f);
1601
1602 //BaseInPlaceFilter2
1603 indexs[3, 0] = filters.Count;
1604 f = new Filt("Add", new Add(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1605 filters.Add(f);
1606 indexs[3, 1] = filters.Count;
1607 f = new Filt("Difference", new Difference(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1608 filters.Add(f);
1609 indexs[3, 2] = filters.Count;
1610 f = new Filt("Intersect", new Intersect(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1611 filters.Add(f);
1612 indexs[3, 3] = filters.Count;
1613 f = new Filt("Merge", new Merge(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1614 filters.Add(f);
1615 indexs[3, 4] = filters.Count;
1616 f = new Filt("Morph", new Morph(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1617 filters.Add(f);
1618 indexs[3, 5] = filters.Count;
1619 f = new Filt("MoveTowards", new MoveTowards(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1620 filters.Add(f);
1621 indexs[3, 6] = filters.Count;
1622 f = new Filt("StereoAnaglyph", new StereoAnaglyph(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1623 filters.Add(f);
1624 indexs[3, 7] = filters.Count;
1625 f = new Filt("Subtract", new Subtract(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1626 filters.Add(f);
1627 //f = new Filt("Add", new TexturedMerge(), Filt.Type.InPlace2);
1628 //filters.Add(f);
1629
1630 //BaseInPlacePartialFilter
1631 indexs[4, 0] = filters.Count;
1632 f = new Filt("AdditiveNoise", new AdditiveNoise(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1633 filters.Add(f);
1634 //f = new Filt("ApplyMask", new ApplyMask(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial2);
1635 //filters.Add(f);
1636 indexs[4, 1] = filters.Count;
1637 f = new Filt("BrightnessCorrection", new BrightnessCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1638 filters.Add(f);
1639 indexs[4, 2] = filters.Count;
1640 f = new Filt("ChannelFiltering", new ChannelFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1641 filters.Add(f);
1642 indexs[4, 3] = filters.Count;
1643 f = new Filt("ColorFiltering", new ColorFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1644 filters.Add(f);
1645 indexs[4, 4] = filters.Count;
1646 f = new Filt("ColorRemapping", new ColorRemapping(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1647 filters.Add(f);
1648 indexs[4, 5] = filters.Count;
1649 f = new Filt("ContrastCorrection", new ContrastCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1650 filters.Add(f);
1651 indexs[4, 6] = filters.Count;
1652 f = new Filt("ContrastStretch", new ContrastStretch(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1653 filters.Add(f);
1654
1655 //f = new Filt("ErrorDiffusionDithering", new ErrorDiffusionDithering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1656 //filters.Add(f);
1657 indexs[4, 7] = filters.Count;
1658 f = new Filt("EuclideanColorFiltering", new EuclideanColorFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1659 filters.Add(f);
1660 indexs[4, 8] = filters.Count;
1661 f = new Filt("GammaCorrection", new GammaCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1662 filters.Add(f);
1663 indexs[4, 9] = filters.Count;
1664 f = new Filt("HistogramEqualization", new HistogramEqualization(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1665 filters.Add(f);
1666 indexs[4, 10] = filters.Count;
1667 f = new Filt("HorizontalRunLengthSmoothing", new HorizontalRunLengthSmoothing(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1668 filters.Add(f);
1669 indexs[4, 11] = filters.Count;
1670 f = new Filt("HSLFiltering", new HSLFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1671 filters.Add(f);
1672 indexs[4, 12] = filters.Count;
1673 f = new Filt("HueModifier", new HueModifier(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1674 filters.Add(f);
1675 indexs[4, 13] = filters.Count;
1676 f = new Filt("Invert", new Invert(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1677 filters.Add(f);
1678 indexs[4, 14] = filters.Count;
1679 f = new Filt("LevelsLinear", new LevelsLinear(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1680 filters.Add(f);
1681 indexs[4, 15] = filters.Count;
1682 f = new Filt("LevelsLinear16bpp", new LevelsLinear16bpp(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1683 filters.Add(f);
1684 //indexs[4, 16] = 46;
1685 //f = new Filt("MaskedFilter", new MaskedFilter(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1686 //filters.Add(f);
1687 //f = new Filt("Mirror", new Mirror(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1688 //filters.Add(f);
1689 indexs[4, 16] = filters.Count;
1690 f = new Filt("OrderedDithering", new OrderedDithering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1691 filters.Add(f);
1692 indexs[4, 17] = filters.Count;
1693 f = new Filt("OtsuThreshold", new OtsuThreshold(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1694 filters.Add(f);
1695 indexs[4, 19] = filters.Count;
1696 f = new Filt("Pixellate", new Pixellate(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1697 filters.Add(f);
1698 indexs[4, 20] = filters.Count;
1699 f = new Filt("PointedColorFloodFill", new PointedColorFloodFill(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1700 filters.Add(f);
1701 indexs[4, 21] = filters.Count;
1702 f = new Filt("PointedMeanFloodFill", new PointedMeanFloodFill(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1703 filters.Add(f);
1704 indexs[4, 22] = filters.Count;
1705 f = new Filt("ReplaceChannel", new Invert(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1706 filters.Add(f);
1707 indexs[4, 23] = filters.Count;
1708 f = new Filt("RotateChannels", new LevelsLinear(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1709 filters.Add(f);
1710 indexs[4, 24] = filters.Count;
1711 f = new Filt("SaltAndPepperNoise", new LevelsLinear16bpp(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1712 filters.Add(f);
1713 indexs[4, 25] = filters.Count;
1714 f = new Filt("SaturationCorrection", new SaturationCorrection(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1715 filters.Add(f);
1716 indexs[4, 26] = filters.Count;
1717 f = new Filt("Sepia", new Sepia(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1718 filters.Add(f);
1719 indexs[4, 26] = filters.Count;
1720 f = new Filt("SimplePosterization", new SimplePosterization(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1721 filters.Add(f);
1722 indexs[4, 27] = filters.Count;
1723 f = new Filt("SISThreshold", new SISThreshold(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1724 filters.Add(f);
1725 //f = new Filt("Texturer", new Texturer(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1726 //filters.Add(f);
1727 //f = new Filt("Threshold", new Threshold(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1728 //filters.Add(f);
1729 indexs[4, 28] = filters.Count;
1730 f = new Filt("ThresholdWithCarry", new ThresholdWithCarry(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1731 filters.Add(f);
1732 indexs[4, 29] = filters.Count;
1733 f = new Filt("VerticalRunLengthSmoothing", new VerticalRunLengthSmoothing(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1734 filters.Add(f);
1735 indexs[4, 30] = filters.Count;
1736 f = new Filt("YCbCrFiltering", new YCbCrFiltering(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1737 filters.Add(f);
1738 indexs[4, 31] = filters.Count;
1739 f = new Filt("YCbCrLinear", new YCbCrLinear(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1740 filters.Add(f);
1741 //f = new Filt("YCbCrReplaceChannel", new YCbCrReplaceChannel(), Filt.Type.InPlacePartial);
1742 //filters.Add(f);
1743
1744 //BaseResizeFilter
1745 indexs[5, 0] = filters.Count;
1746 f = new Filt("ResizeBicubic", new ResizeBicubic(0, 0), Filt.Type.Resize);
1747 filters.Add(f);
1748 indexs[5, 1] = filters.Count;
1749 f = new Filt("ResizeBilinear", new ResizeBilinear(0, 0), Filt.Type.Resize);
1750 filters.Add(f);
1751 indexs[5, 2] = filters.Count;
1752 f = new Filt("ResizeNearestNeighbor", new ResizeNearestNeighbor(0, 0), Filt.Type.Resize);
1753 filters.Add(f);
1754
1755 //BaseRotateFilter
1756 indexs[6, 0] = filters.Count;
1757 f = new Filt("RotateBicubic", new RotateBicubic(0), Filt.Type.Rotate);
1758 filters.Add(f);
1759 indexs[6, 1] = filters.Count;
1760 f = new Filt("RotateBilinear", new RotateBilinear(0), Filt.Type.Rotate);
1761 filters.Add(f);
1762 indexs[6, 2] = filters.Count;
1763 f = new Filt("RotateNearestNeighbor", new RotateNearestNeighbor(0), Filt.Type.Rotate);
1764 filters.Add(f);
1765
1766 //Transformation
1767 indexs[7, 0] = filters.Count;
1768 f = new Filt("Crop", new Crop(new Rectangle(0, 0, 0, 0)), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1769 filters.Add(f);
1770 indexs[7, 1] = filters.Count;
1771 f = new Filt("QuadrilateralTransformation", new QuadrilateralTransformation(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1772 filters.Add(f);
1773 //f = new Filt("QuadrilateralTransformationBilinear", new QuadrilateralTransformationBilinear(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1774 //filters.Add(f);
1775 //f = new Filt("QuadrilateralTransformationNearestNeighbor", new QuadrilateralTransformationNearestNeighbor(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1776 //filters.Add(f);
1777 indexs[7, 2] = filters.Count;
1778 f = new Filt("Shrink", new Shrink(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1779 filters.Add(f);
1780 indexs[7, 3] = filters.Count;
1781 f = new Filt("SimpleQuadrilateralTransformation", new SimpleQuadrilateralTransformation(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1782 filters.Add(f);
1783 indexs[7, 4] = filters.Count;
1784 f = new Filt("TransformFromPolar", new TransformFromPolar(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1785 filters.Add(f);
1786 indexs[7, 5] = filters.Count;
1787 f = new Filt("TransformToPolar", new TransformToPolar(), Filt.Type.Transformation);
1788 filters.Add(f);
1789
1790 //BaseUsingCopyPartialFilter
1791 indexs[8, 0] = filters.Count;
1792 f = new Filt("BinaryDilatation3x3", new BinaryDilatation3x3(), Filt.Type.Copy);
1793 filters.Add(f);
1794 indexs[8, 1] = filters.Count;
1795 f = new Filt("BilateralSmoothing ", new BilateralSmoothing(), Filt.Type.Copy);
1796 filters.Add(f);
1797 indexs[8, 2] = filters.Count;
1798 f = new Filt("BinaryErosion3x3 ", new BinaryErosion3x3(), Filt.Type.Copy);
1799 filters.Add(f);
1800
1801 }
1802 }
1803 public class ImageInfo
1804 {
1805 bool HasPhysicalXY = false;
1806 bool HasPhysicalXYZ = false;
1807 private double physicalSizeX = -1;
1808 private double physicalSizeY = -1;
1809 private double physicalSizeZ = -1;
1810 public double PhysicalSizeX
1811 {
1812 get { return physicalSizeX; }
1813 set
1814 {
1815 physicalSizeX = value;
1816 HasPhysicalXY = true;
1817 }
1818 }
1819 public double PhysicalSizeY
1820 {
1821 get { return physicalSizeY; }
1822 set
1823 {
1824 physicalSizeY = value;
1825 HasPhysicalXY = true;
1826 }
1827 }
1828 public double PhysicalSizeZ
1829 {
1830 get { return physicalSizeZ; }
1831 set
1832 {
1833 physicalSizeZ = value;
1834 HasPhysicalXYZ = true;
1835 }
1836 }
1837
1838 bool HasStageXY = false;
1839 bool HasStageXYZ = false;
1840 public double stageSizeX = -1;
1841 public double stageSizeY = -1;
1842 public double stageSizeZ = -1;
1843 public double StageSizeX
1844 {
1845 get { return stageSizeX; }
1846 set
1847 {
1848 stageSizeX = value;
1849 HasStageXY = true;
1850 }
1851 }
1852 public double StageSizeY
1853 {
1854 get { return stageSizeY; }
1855 set
1856 {
1857 stageSizeY = value;
1858 HasStageXY = true;
1859 }
1860 }
1861 public double StageSizeZ
1862 {
1863 get { return stageSizeZ; }
1864 set
1865 {
1866 stageSizeZ = value;
1867 HasStageXYZ = true;
1868 }
1869 }
1870
1871 private int series = 0;
1872 public int Series
1873 {
1874 get { return series; }
1875 set { series = value; }
1876 }
1877
1881 public ImageInfo Copy()
1882 {
1883 ImageInfo inf = new ImageInfo();
1884 inf.PhysicalSizeX = PhysicalSizeX;
1885 inf.PhysicalSizeY = PhysicalSizeY;
1886 inf.PhysicalSizeZ = PhysicalSizeZ;
1887 inf.StageSizeX = StageSizeX;
1888 inf.StageSizeY = StageSizeY;
1889 inf.StageSizeZ = StageSizeZ;
1890 inf.HasPhysicalXY = HasPhysicalXY;
1891 inf.HasPhysicalXYZ = HasPhysicalXYZ;
1892 inf.StageSizeX = StageSizeX;
1893 inf.StageSizeY = StageSizeY;
1894 inf.StageSizeZ = StageSizeZ;
1895 inf.HasStageXY = HasStageXY;
1896 inf.HasStageXYZ = HasStageXYZ;
1897 return inf;
1898 }
1899
1900 }
1901 public class BioImage : IDisposable
1902 {
1903 public class WellPlate
1904 {
1905 public class Well
1906 {
1907 public string ID { get; set; }
1908 public int Index { get; set; }
1909 public int Column { get; set; }
1910 public int Row { get; set; }
1911 public System.Drawing.Color Color { get; set; }
1912 public List<Sample> Samples = new List<Sample>();
1913 public class Sample
1914 {
1915 public string ID { get; set; }
1916 public int Index { get; set; }
1917 public PointD Position { get; set; }
1918 public Timestamp Time { get; set; }
1919 }
1920 }
1921 public List<Well> Wells = new List<Well>();
1922
1923 public PointD Origin;
1924 public string ID;
1925 public string Name;
1926 public WellPlate(BioImage b)
1927 {
1928 ID = b.meta.getPlateID(b.series);
1929 Name = b.meta.getPlateName(b.series);
1930 double x, y;
1931 if (b.meta.getPlateWellOriginX(b.series) != null)
1932 x = b.meta.getPlateWellOriginX(b.series).value().doubleValue();
1933 else
1934 x = 0;
1935 if (b.meta.getPlateWellOriginY(b.series) != null)
1936 y = b.meta.getPlateWellOriginY(b.series).value().doubleValue();
1937 else
1938 y = 0;
1939 Origin = new PointD(x, y);
1940 int ws = b.meta.getWellCount(b.series);
1941 for (int i = 0; i < ws; i++)
1942 {
1943 Well w = new Well();
1944 w.ID = b.meta.getWellID(b.series, i);
1945 w.Column = b.meta.getWellColumn(b.series, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
1946 w.Row = b.meta.getWellRow(b.series, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
1947 int wsc = b.meta.getWellSampleCount(b.series, i);
1948 for (int s = 0; s < wsc; s++)
1949 {
1950 Well.Sample sa = new Well.Sample();
1951 sa.Time = b.meta.getWellSampleTimepoint(b.series, i, s);
1952 sa.Index = b.meta.getWellSampleIndex(b.series, i, s).getNumberValue().intValue();
1953 double sx, sy;
1954 if (b.meta.getWellSamplePositionX(b.series, i, s) != null)
1955 sx = b.meta.getWellSamplePositionX(b.series, i, s).value().doubleValue();
1956 else sx = 0;
1957 if (b.meta.getWellSamplePositionY(b.series, i, s) != null)
1958 sy = b.meta.getWellSamplePositionY(b.series, i, s).value().doubleValue();
1959 else sy = 0;
1960 sa.Position = new PointD(sx, sy);
1961 sa.ID = b.meta.getWellSampleID(b.series, i, s);
1962 w.Samples.Add(sa);
1963 }
1964 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color c = b.meta.getWellColor(b.series, i);
1965 if (c != null)
1966 w.Color = System.Drawing.Color.FromArgb(c.getAlpha(), c.getRed(), c.getGreen(), c.getBlue());
1967 Wells.Add(w);
1968 }
1969
1970 }
1971 }
1972 public WellPlate Plate = null;
1973 public int[,,] Coords;
1974 private ZCT coordinate;
1975 public ZCT Coordinate
1976 {
1977 get
1978 {
1979 return coordinate;
1980 }
1981 set
1982 {
1983 coordinate = value;
1984 }
1985 }
1986 public enum ImageType
1987 {
1988 stack,
1989 pyramidal,
1990 well,
1991 }
1992 private string id;
1993 public ImageType Type { get; set; }
1994 public List<Channel> Channels = new List<Channel>();
1995 public List<Resolution> Resolutions = new List<Resolution>();
1996 public List<AForge.Bitmap> Buffers = new List<AForge.Bitmap>();
1997 public List<NetVips.Image> vipPages = new List<NetVips.Image>();
1998 int level = 0;
1999 public int Level
2000 {
2001 get
2002 {
2003 if (openslideBase != null)
2004 return OpenSlideGTK.TileUtil.GetLevel(openslideBase.Schema.Resolutions, Resolution);
2005 else
2006 if (slideBase != null)
2007 return LevelFromResolution(Resolution);
2008 return level;
2009 }
2010 set
2011 {
2012 if(Type == ImageType.well)
2013 {
2014 level = value;
2015 reader.setId(file);
2016 reader.setSeries(value);
2017 // read the image data bytes
2018 int pages = reader.getImageCount();
2019 bool inter = reader.isInterleaved();
2020 PixelFormat pf = Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
2021 int w = Buffers[0].SizeX; int h = Buffers[0].SizeY;
2022 Buffers.Clear();
2023 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
2024 {
2025 Bitmap bf;
2026 byte[] bytes = reader.openBytes(p);
2027 bf = new Bitmap(file, w, h, pf, bytes, new ZCT(), p, null, littleEndian, inter);
2028 Buffers.Add(bf);
2029 }
2030 }
2031 }
2032 }
2033 public VolumeD Volume;
2034 public List<ROI> Annotations = new List<ROI>();
2035 public string filename = "";
2036 public string script = "";
2037 public string Filename
2038 {
2039 get
2040 {
2041 return filename;
2042 }
2043 set
2044 {
2045 filename = value;
2046 }
2047 }
2048 public int[] rgbChannels = new int[3];
2049 public int RGBChannelCount
2050 {
2051 get
2052 {
2053 return Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount;
2054 }
2055 }
2056 public int bitsPerPixel;
2057 public int imagesPerSeries = 0;
2058 public int seriesCount = 1;
2059 public double frameInterval = 0;
2060 public bool littleEndian = false;
2061 public bool isGroup = false;
2062 public long loadTimeMS = 0;
2063 public long loadTimeTicks = 0;
2064 public bool selected = false;
2065 public Statistics Statistics
2066 {
2067 get
2068 {
2069 return statistics;
2070 }
2071 set
2072 {
2073 statistics = value;
2074 }
2075 }
2076 private int sizeZ, sizeC, sizeT;
2077 private Statistics statistics;
2078 private double resolution = 1;
2079 public double Resolution
2080 {
2081 get { return resolution; }
2082 set
2083 {
2084 if (value < 0)
2085 return;
2086 resolution = value;
2087 }
2088 }
2089
2090 ImageInfo imageInfo = new ImageInfo();
2095 public static BioImage Copy(BioImage b, bool rois)
2096 {
2097 BioImage bi = new BioImage(b.ID);
2098 if (rois)
2099 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
2100 {
2101 bi.Annotations.Add(an);
2102 }
2103 foreach (Bitmap bf in b.Buffers)
2104 {
2105 bi.Buffers.Add(bf.Copy());
2106 }
2107 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
2108 {
2109 bi.Channels.Add(c);
2110 }
2111 bi.Volume = b.Volume;
2112 bi.Coords = b.Coords;
2113 bi.sizeZ = b.sizeZ;
2114 bi.sizeC = b.sizeC;
2115 bi.sizeT = b.sizeT;
2116 bi.series = b.series;
2117 bi.seriesCount = b.seriesCount;
2118 bi.frameInterval = b.frameInterval;
2119 bi.littleEndian = b.littleEndian;
2120 bi.isGroup = b.isGroup;
2121 bi.imageInfo = b.imageInfo;
2122 bi.bitsPerPixel = b.bitsPerPixel;
2123 bi.file = b.file;
2124 bi.filename = b.filename;
2125 bi.Resolutions = b.Resolutions;
2126 bi.statistics = b.statistics;
2127 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, b, rois);
2128 return bi;
2129 }
2135 public static BioImage Copy(BioImage b)
2136 {
2137 return Copy(b, true);
2138 }
2144 public BioImage Copy(bool rois)
2145 {
2146 return BioImage.Copy(this, rois);
2147 }
2151 public BioImage Copy()
2152 {
2153 return BioImage.Copy(this, true);
2154 }
2162 public static BioImage CopyInfo(BioImage b, bool copyAnnotations, bool copyChannels)
2163 {
2164 BioImage bi = new BioImage(b.ID);
2165 if (copyAnnotations)
2166 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
2167 {
2168 bi.Annotations.Add(an);
2169 }
2170 if (copyChannels)
2171 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
2172 {
2173 bi.Channels.Add(c.Copy());
2174 }
2175
2176 bi.Coords = b.Coords;
2177 bi.Volume = b.Volume;
2178 bi.sizeZ = b.sizeZ;
2179 bi.sizeC = b.sizeC;
2180 bi.sizeT = b.sizeT;
2181 bi.series = b.series;
2182 bi.seriesCount = b.seriesCount;
2183 bi.frameInterval = b.frameInterval;
2184 bi.littleEndian = b.littleEndian;
2185 bi.isGroup = b.isGroup;
2186 bi.imageInfo = b.imageInfo;
2187 bi.bitsPerPixel = b.bitsPerPixel;
2188 bi.Resolutions = b.Resolutions;
2189 bi.Coordinate = b.Coordinate;
2190 bi.file = b.file;
2191 bi.Filename = b.Filename;
2192 bi.ID = Images.GetImageName(b.file);
2193 bi.statistics = b.statistics;
2194 return bi;
2195 }
2204 public double GetLevelDownsample(int level)
2205 {
2206 int originalWidth = Resolutions[0].SizeX; // Width of the original level
2207 int nextLevelWidth = Resolutions[level].SizeX; // Width of the next level (downsampled)
2208 return (double)originalWidth / (double)nextLevelWidth;
2209 }
2210 public double[] GetLevelDownsamples()
2211 {
2212 double[] ds = new double[Resolutions.Count];
2213 for (int i = 0; i < Resolutions.Count; i++)
2214 {
2215 ds[i] = Resolutions[0].PhysicalSizeX * GetLevelDownsample(i);
2216 }
2217 return ds;
2218 }
2224 public int LevelFromResolution(double Resolution)
2225 {
2226 double[] ds = GetLevelDownsamples();
2227 for (int i = 0; i < ds.Length; i++)
2228 {
2229 if (ds[i] > Resolution)
2230 return i - 1;
2231 }
2232 return Resolutions.Count-1;
2233 }
2239 public double GetUnitPerPixel(int level)
2240 {
2241 return Resolutions[0].PhysicalSizeX * GetLevelDownsample(level);
2242 }
2243 public string ID
2244 {
2245 get { return id; }
2246 set { id = value; }
2247 }
2248 public int ImageCount
2249 {
2250 get
2251 {
2252 return Buffers.Count;
2253 }
2254 }
2255 public double PhysicalSizeX
2256 {
2257 get { return Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeX; }
2258 }
2259 public double PhysicalSizeY
2260 {
2261 get { return Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeY; }
2262 }
2263 public double PhysicalSizeZ
2264 {
2265 get { return Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeZ; }
2266 }
2267 public double StageSizeX
2268 {
2269 get
2270 {
2271 return Resolutions[Level].StageSizeX;
2272 }
2273 set { imageInfo.StageSizeX = value; }
2274 }
2275 public double StageSizeY
2276 {
2277 get { return Resolutions[Level].StageSizeY; }
2278 set { imageInfo.StageSizeY = value; }
2279 }
2280 public double StageSizeZ
2281 {
2282 get { return Resolutions[Level].StageSizeZ; }
2283 set { imageInfo.StageSizeZ = value; }
2284 }
2285 Size s = new Size(1920, 1080);
2286 public Size PyramidalSize { get { return s; } set { s = value; } }
2287 PointD pyramidalOrigin = new PointD(0, 0);
2288 public PointD PyramidalOrigin
2289 {
2290 get { return pyramidalOrigin; }
2291 set
2292 {
2293 pyramidalOrigin = value;
2294 }
2295 }
2296 public int series
2297 {
2298 get
2299 {
2300 return imageInfo.Series;
2301 }
2302 set
2303 {
2304 imageInfo.Series = value;
2305 }
2306 }
2307
2308 static bool initialized = false;
2309 OpenSlideBase openslideBase;
2310 public OpenSlideBase OpenSlideBase { get { return openslideBase; } }
2311 SlideBase slideBase;
2312 public SlideBase SlideBase { get { return slideBase; } }
2313 public Channel RChannel
2314 {
2315 get
2316 {
2317 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
2318 return Channels[rgbChannels[0]];
2319 else
2320 return Channels[0];
2321 }
2322 }
2323 public Channel GChannel
2324 {
2325 get
2326 {
2327 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
2328 return Channels[rgbChannels[1]];
2329 else
2330 return Channels[0];
2331 }
2332 }
2333 public Channel BChannel
2334 {
2335 get
2336 {
2337 if (Channels[0].range.Length == 1)
2338 return Channels[rgbChannels[2]];
2339 else
2340 return Channels[0];
2341 }
2342 }
2343 private List<ROI> annotationsR = new List<ROI>();
2344 public List<ROI> AnnotationsR
2345 {
2346 get
2347 {
2348 return GetAnnotations(Coordinate.Z, RChannel.Index, Coordinate.T);
2349 }
2350 }
2351 private List<ROI> annotationsG = new List<ROI>();
2352 public List<ROI> AnnotationsG
2353 {
2354 get
2355 {
2356 return GetAnnotations(Coordinate.Z, GChannel.Index, Coordinate.T);
2357 }
2358 }
2359 private List<ROI> annotationsB = new List<ROI>();
2360 public List<ROI> AnnotationsB
2361 {
2362 get
2363 {
2364 return GetAnnotations(Coordinate.Z, BChannel.Index, Coordinate.T);
2365 }
2366 }
2367 public class ImageJDesc
2368 {
2369 public string ImageJ;
2370 public int images = 0;
2371 public int channels = 0;
2372 public int slices = 0;
2373 public int frames = 0;
2374 public bool hyperstack;
2375 public string mode;
2376 public string unit;
2377 public double finterval = 0;
2378 public double spacing = 0;
2379 public bool loop;
2380 public double min = 0;
2381 public double max = 0;
2382 public int count;
2383 public bool bit8color = false;
2384
2393 public ImageJDesc FromImage(BioImage b)
2394 {
2395 ImageJ = "";
2396 images = b.ImageCount;
2397 channels = b.SizeC;
2398 slices = b.SizeZ;
2399 frames = b.SizeT;
2400 hyperstack = true;
2401 mode = "grayscale";
2402 unit = "micron";
2403 finterval = b.frameInterval;
2404 spacing = b.PhysicalSizeZ;
2405 loop = false;
2406 /*
2407 double dmax = double.MinValue;
2408 double dmin = double.MaxValue;
2409 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
2410 {
2411 if(dmax < c.Max)
2412 dmax = c.Max;
2413 if(dmin > c.Min)
2414 dmin = c.Min;
2415 }
2416 min = dmin;
2417 max = dmax;
2418 */
2419 min = b.Channels[0].RangeR.Min;
2420 max = b.Channels[0].RangeR.Max;
2421 return this;
2422 }
2426 public string GetString()
2427 {
2428 string s = "";
2429 s += "ImageJ=" + ImageJ + "\n";
2430 s += "images=" + images + "\n";
2431 s += "channels=" + channels.ToString() + "\n";
2432 s += "slices=" + slices.ToString() + "\n";
2433 s += "frames=" + frames.ToString() + "\n";
2434 s += "hyperstack=" + hyperstack.ToString() + "\n";
2435 s += "mode=" + mode.ToString() + "\n";
2436 s += "unit=" + unit.ToString() + "\n";
2437 s += "finterval=" + finterval.ToString() + "\n";
2438 s += "spacing=" + spacing.ToString() + "\n";
2439 s += "loop=" + loop.ToString() + "\n";
2440 s += "min=" + min.ToString() + "\n";
2441 s += "max=" + max.ToString() + "\n";
2442 return s;
2443 }
2447 public void SetString(string desc)
2448 {
2449 string[] lines = desc.Split(new string[] { "\r\n", "\r", "\n" }, StringSplitOptions.None);
2450 int maxlen = 20;
2451 for (int i = 0; i < lines.Length; i++)
2452 {
2453 if (i < maxlen)
2454 {
2455 string[] sp = lines[i].Split('=');
2456 if (sp[0] == "ImageJ")
2457 ImageJ = sp[1];
2458 if (sp[0] == "images")
2459 images = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2460 if (sp[0] == "channels")
2461 channels = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2462 if (sp[0] == "slices")
2463 slices = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2464 if (sp[0] == "frames")
2465 frames = int.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2466 if (sp[0] == "hyperstack")
2467 hyperstack = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2468 if (sp[0] == "mode")
2469 mode = sp[1];
2470 if (sp[0] == "unit")
2471 unit = sp[1];
2472 if (sp[0] == "finterval")
2473 finterval = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2474 if (sp[0] == "spacing")
2475 spacing = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2476 if (sp[0] == "loop")
2477 loop = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2478 if (sp[0] == "min")
2479 min = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2480 if (sp[0] == "max")
2481 max = double.Parse(sp[1], CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
2482 if (sp[0] == "8bitcolor")
2483 bit8color = bool.Parse(sp[1]);
2484 }
2485 else
2486 return;
2487 }
2488
2489 }
2490 }
2491 public int SizeX
2492 {
2493 get
2494 {
2495 if (Buffers.Count > 0)
2496 return Buffers[0].SizeX;
2497 else return 0;
2498 }
2499 }
2500 public int SizeY
2501 {
2502 get
2503 {
2504 if (Buffers.Count > 0)
2505 return Buffers[0].SizeY;
2506 else return 0;
2507 }
2508 }
2509 public int SizeZ
2510 {
2511 get { return sizeZ; }
2512 }
2513 public int SizeC
2514 {
2515 get { return sizeC; }
2516 }
2517 public int SizeT
2518 {
2519 get { return sizeT; }
2520 }
2521 public static bool Planes = false;
2522 public enum Order
2523 {
2524 ZCT,
2525 CZT,
2526 TCZ
2527 }
2528 public Order StackOrder
2529 {
2530 get;set;
2531 }
2532 public object Tag { get;set; }
2533 public IntRange RRange
2534 {
2535 get
2536 {
2537 return RChannel.RangeR;
2538 }
2539 }
2540 public IntRange GRange
2541 {
2542 get
2543 {
2544 return GChannel.RangeG;
2545 }
2546 }
2547 public IntRange BRange
2548 {
2549 get
2550 {
2551 return BChannel.RangeB;
2552 }
2553 }
2554 public Bitmap SelectedBuffer
2555 {
2556 get
2557 {
2558 return Buffers[GetFrameIndex(Coordinate.Z, Coordinate.C, Coordinate.T)];
2559 }
2560 }
2561 public Stopwatch watch = new Stopwatch();
2562 public bool isRGB
2563 {
2564 get
2565 {
2566 if (RGBChannelCount == 3 || RGBChannelCount == 4)
2567 return true;
2568 else
2569 return false;
2570 }
2571 }
2572 public bool isTime
2573 {
2574 get
2575 {
2576 if (SizeT > 1)
2577 return true;
2578 else
2579 return false;
2580 }
2581 }
2582 public bool isSeries
2583 {
2584 get
2585 {
2586 if (seriesCount > 1)
2587 return true;
2588 else
2589 return false;
2590 }
2591 }
2592 public bool isPyramidal
2593 {
2594 get
2595 {
2596 if (Type == ImageType.pyramidal)
2597 return true;
2598 else
2599 return false;
2600 }
2601 }
2602 public string file;
2603 public static string status;
2604 public static string progFile;
2605 public static bool Initialized
2606 {
2607 get
2608 {
2609 return initialized;
2610 }
2611 }
2613 public void To8Bit()
2614 {
2615 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
2616 To24Bit();
2617 PixelFormat px = Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
2618 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2619 return;
2620 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2621 {
2622 To24Bit();
2623 List<AForge.Bitmap> bfs = new List<AForge.Bitmap>();
2624 int index = 0;
2625 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2626 {
2627 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB24To8(Buffers[i]);
2628 Bitmap br = new Bitmap(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2629 Bitmap bg = new Bitmap(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
2630 Bitmap bb = new Bitmap(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2631 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2632 {
2633 bs[b].Dispose();
2634 }
2635 bs = null;
2636 GC.Collect();
2637 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
2638 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
2639 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
2640 bfs.Add(br);
2641 bfs.Add(bg);
2642 bfs.Add(bb);
2643 index += 3;
2644 }
2645 Buffers = bfs;
2646 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
2647 }
2648 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2649 {
2650 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2651 int index = 0;
2652 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2653 {
2654 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB24To8(Buffers[i]);
2655 Bitmap br = new Bitmap(ID, bs[2], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2656 Bitmap bg = new Bitmap(ID, bs[1], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 1, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 1, Buffers[i].Plane);
2657 Bitmap bb = new Bitmap(ID, bs[0], new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 2, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), index + 2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2658 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2659 {
2660 bs[b].Dispose();
2661 bs[b] = null;
2662 }
2663 bs = null;
2664 GC.Collect();
2665 Statistics.CalcStatistics(br);
2666 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bg);
2667 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bb);
2668 bfs.Add(br);
2669 bfs.Add(bg);
2670 bfs.Add(bb);
2671 index += 3;
2672 }
2673 Buffers = bfs;
2674 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 3, SizeT);
2675 }
2676 else
2677 {
2678 To48Bit();
2679 To8Bit();
2680 }
2681 AutoThreshold(this, true);
2682 StackThreshold(false);
2683 bitsPerPixel = 8;
2684 }
2686 public void To16Bit()
2687 {
2688 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
2689 To24Bit();
2690 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2691 return;
2692 bitsPerPixel = 16;
2693 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2694 {
2695 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2696 int index = 0;
2697 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2698 {
2699 Array.Reverse(Buffers[i].Bytes);
2700 Bitmap[] bs = Bitmap.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, index, Buffers[i].Plane);
2701 bfs.AddRange(bs);
2702 index += 3;
2703 }
2704 Buffers = bfs;
2705 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, SizeC * 3, SizeT);
2706 if (Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel == 3)
2707 {
2708 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
2709 c.SamplesPerPixel = 1;
2710 c.range = new IntRange[1];
2711 Channels.Clear();
2712 Channels.Add(c);
2713 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
2714 Channels.Add(c.Copy());
2715 Channels[1].Index = 1;
2716 Channels[2].Index = 2;
2717 }
2718 }
2719 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2720 {
2721 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2722 {
2723 Buffers[i] = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
2724 Statistics.CalcStatistics(Buffers[i]);
2725 }
2726 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2727 {
2728 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2729 {
2730 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2731 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2732 }
2733 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
2734 }
2735 bitsPerPixel = 16;
2736 }
2737 else if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2738 {
2739 To48Bit();
2740 To16Bit();
2741 }
2742 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
2743 AutoThreshold(this, true);
2744 StackThreshold(true);
2745 }
2747 public void To24Bit()
2748 {
2749 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2750 return;
2751 bitsPerPixel = 8;
2752 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb)
2753 {
2754 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2755 {
2756 Buffers[i] = Bitmap.To24Bit(Buffers[i]);
2757 Buffers[i].SwitchRedBlue();
2758 }
2759 if (Channels.Count == 4)
2760 {
2761 Channels.RemoveAt(0);
2762 }
2763 else
2764 {
2765 Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel = 3;
2766 }
2767 }
2768 else
2769 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2770 {
2771 //We run 8bit so we get 24 bit rgb.
2772 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2773 {
2774 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(Buffers[i]);
2775 Buffers[i].SwitchRedBlue();
2776 }
2777 }
2778 else
2779 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2780 {
2781 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2782 {
2783 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2784 {
2785 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert16bppTo8bpp(Buffers[i]);
2786 }
2787 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2788 {
2789 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2790 {
2791 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2792 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)ushort.MaxValue) * byte.MaxValue);
2793 }
2794 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 8;
2795 }
2796 }
2797 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2798 if (Buffers.Count % 3 != 0 && Buffers.Count % 2 != 0)
2799 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2800 {
2801 Bitmap bs = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2802 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB8To24(bs);
2803 bs.Dispose();
2804 bs = null;
2805 bfs.Add(bbs);
2806 }
2807 else
2808 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += Channels.Count)
2809 {
2810 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
2811 bs[2] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2812 bs[1] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
2813 if (Channels.Count > 2)
2814 bs[0] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 2].Coordinate.T), i + 2, Buffers[i + 2].Plane);
2815 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB8To24(bs);
2816 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2817 {
2818 if (bs[b] != null)
2819 bs[b].Dispose();
2820 bs[b] = null;
2821 }
2822 bfs.Add(bbs);
2823 }
2824 Buffers = bfs;
2825 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
2826 }
2827 AutoThreshold(this, true);
2828 StackThreshold(false);
2829 }
2831 public void To32Bit()
2832 {
2833 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
2834 return;
2835 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat != PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
2836 {
2837 To24Bit();
2838 }
2839 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2840 {
2841 UnmanagedImage b = Bitmap.To32Bit(Buffers[i]);
2842 Buffers[i].Image = b;
2843 }
2844 AutoThreshold(this, true);
2845 }
2849 public void To48Bit()
2850 {
2851 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
2852 To24Bit();
2853 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
2854 return;
2855 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
2856 {
2857 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
2858 {
2859 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2860 {
2861 Buffers[i].Image = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
2862 }
2863 }
2864 List<Bitmap> bfs = new List<Bitmap>();
2865 if (Buffers.Count % 3 != 0 && Buffers.Count % 2 != 0)
2866 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2867 {
2868 Bitmap bs = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2869 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bs);
2870 bs.Dispose();
2871 bs = null;
2872 bfs.Add(bbs);
2873 }
2874 else
2875 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += Channels.Count)
2876 {
2877 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
2878 bs[0] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].PixelFormat, Buffers[i].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T), i, Buffers[i].Plane);
2879 bs[1] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i + 1].PixelFormat, Buffers[i + 1].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i + 1].Coordinate.T), i + 1, Buffers[i + 1].Plane);
2880 if (Channels.Count > 2)
2881 bs[2] = new Bitmap(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i+2].PixelFormat, Buffers[i+2].Bytes, new ZCT(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, 0, Buffers[i+2].Coordinate.T), i+2, Buffers[i].Plane);
2882 Bitmap bbs = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bs);
2883 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2884 {
2885 if (bs[b] != null)
2886 bs[b].Dispose();
2887 bs[b] = null;
2888 }
2889 bfs.Add(bbs);
2890 }
2891 GC.Collect();
2892 Buffers = bfs;
2893 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
2894 Channel c = Channels[0].Copy();
2895 c.SamplesPerPixel = 3;
2896 rgbChannels[0] = 0;
2897 rgbChannels[1] = 0;
2898 rgbChannels[2] = 0;
2899 Channels.Clear();
2900 Channels.Add(c);
2901 }
2902 else
2903 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
2904 {
2905 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2906 {
2907 Buffers[i] = AForge.Imaging.Image.Convert8bppTo16bpp(Buffers[i]);
2908 }
2909 /*
2910 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
2911 {
2912 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[c].range.Length; i++)
2913 {
2914 Channels[c].range[i].Min = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Min / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2915 Channels[c].range[i].Max = (int)(((float)Channels[c].range[i].Max / (float)byte.MaxValue) * ushort.MaxValue);
2916 }
2917 Channels[c].BitsPerPixel = 16;
2918 }
2919 */
2920 }
2921 else
2922 {
2923 int index = 0;
2924 List<Bitmap> buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
2925 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i += 3)
2926 {
2927 Bitmap[] bf = new Bitmap[3];
2928 bf[0] = Buffers[i];
2929 bf[1] = Buffers[i + 1];
2930 bf[2] = Buffers[i + 2];
2931 Bitmap inf = Bitmap.RGB16To48(bf);
2932 buffers.Add(inf);
2933 for (int b = 0; b < 3; b++)
2934 {
2935 bf[b].Dispose();
2936 }
2937 index++;
2938 }
2939 Buffers = buffers;
2940 UpdateCoords(SizeZ, 1, SizeT);
2941 }
2942 bitsPerPixel = 16;
2943 AutoThreshold(this, true);
2944 StackThreshold(true);
2945 }
2946 public int? MacroResolution { get;set; }
2947 public int? LabelResolution { get;set; }
2948 void SetLabelMacroResolutions()
2949 {
2950 int i = 0;
2951 AForge.Size s = new AForge.Size(int.MaxValue, int.MaxValue);
2952 bool noMacro = true;
2953 PixelFormat pf = Resolutions[0].PixelFormat;
2954 foreach (Resolution res in Resolutions)
2955 {
2956 if (res.SizeX < s.Width && res.SizeY < s.Height)
2957 {
2958 //If the pixel format changes it means this is the macro resolution.
2959 if (pf != res.PixelFormat)
2960 {
2961 noMacro = false;
2962 break;
2963 }
2964 pf = res.PixelFormat;
2965 s = new AForge.Size(res.SizeX, res.SizeY);
2966 }
2967 else
2968 {
2969 //If this level is bigger than the previous this is the macro resolution.
2970 noMacro = false;
2971 break;
2972 }
2973 i++;
2974 }
2975 if (!noMacro)
2976 {
2977 MacroResolution = i;
2978 LabelResolution = i + 1;
2979 }
2980 }
2981 public void RotateFlip(AForge.RotateFlipType rot)
2982 {
2983 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
2984 {
2985 Buffers[i].RotateFlip(rot);
2986 }
2987 Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ), new Point3D(PhysicalSizeX * SizeX, PhysicalSizeY * SizeY, PhysicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
2988 }
2997 public void Bake(int rmin, int rmax, int gmin, int gmax, int bmin, int bmax)
2998 {
2999 Bake(new IntRange(rmin, rmax), new IntRange(gmin, gmax), new IntRange(bmin, bmax));
3000 }
3007 public void Bake(IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
3008 {
3009 BioImage bm = new BioImage(Images.GetImageName(ID));
3010 bm = CopyInfo(this, true, true);
3011 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
3012 {
3013 ZCT co = Buffers[i].Coordinate;
3014 UnmanagedImage b = GetFiltered(i, rf, gf, bf);
3015 Bitmap inf = new Bitmap(bm.ID, b, co, i);
3016 bm.SetFrameIndex(co.Z, co.C, co.T,i);
3017 bm.Buffers.Add(inf);
3018 }
3019 foreach (Channel item in bm.Channels)
3020 {
3021 for (int i = 0; i < item.range.Length; i++)
3022 {
3023 item.range[i].Min = 0;
3024 if (bm.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3025 item.range[i].Max = ushort.MaxValue;
3026 else
3027 item.range[i].Max = 255;
3028 }
3029 }
3030 AutoThreshold(bm, true);
3031 Images.AddImage(bm, true);
3032 }
3034 public void UpdateCoords()
3035 {
3036 int z = 0;
3037 int c = 0;
3038 int t = 0;
3039 Coords = new int[SizeZ, SizeC, SizeT];
3040 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
3041 {
3042 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
3043 SetFrameIndex(co.Z, co.C, co.T,im);
3044 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
3045 if (c < SizeC - 1)
3046 c++;
3047 else
3048 {
3049 c = 0;
3050 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
3051 z++;
3052 else
3053 {
3054 z = 0;
3055 if (t < SizeT - 1)
3056 t++;
3057 else
3058 t = 0;
3059 }
3060 }
3061 }
3062 }
3069 public void UpdateCoords(int sz, int sc, int st)
3070 {
3071 int z = 0;
3072 int c = 0;
3073 int t = 0;
3074 sizeZ = sz;
3075 sizeC = sc;
3076 sizeT = st;
3077 Coords = new int[sz, sc, st];
3078 for (int im = 0; im < Buffers.Count; im++)
3079 {
3080 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
3081 SetFrameIndex(co.Z, co.C, co.T,im);
3082 Buffers[im].Coordinate = co;
3083 if (c < SizeC - 1)
3084 c++;
3085 else
3086 {
3087 c = 0;
3088 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
3089 z++;
3090 else
3091 {
3092 z = 0;
3093 if (t < SizeT - 1)
3094 t++;
3095 else
3096 t = 0;
3097 }
3098 }
3099 }
3100 }
3107 public void UpdateCoords(int sz, int sc, int st, Order order)
3108 {
3109 int z = 0;
3110 int c = 0;
3111 int t = 0;
3112 sizeZ = sz;
3113 sizeC = sc;
3114 sizeT = st;
3115 Coords = new int[sz, sc, st];
3116 int fr = sz * sc * st;
3117 if (order == Order.CZT)
3118 {
3119 for (int im = 0; im < fr; im++)
3120 {
3121 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
3122 SetFrameIndex(co.Z, co.C, co.T,im);
3123 if (c < SizeC - 1)
3124 c++;
3125 else
3126 {
3127 c = 0;
3128 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
3129 z++;
3130 else
3131 {
3132 z = 0;
3133 if (t < SizeT - 1)
3134 t++;
3135 else
3136 t = 0;
3137 }
3138 }
3139 }
3140 }
3141 else if (order == Order.ZCT)
3142 {
3143 for (int im = 0; im < fr; im++)
3144 {
3145 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
3146 SetFrameIndex(co.Z, co.C, co.T,im);
3147 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
3148 z++;
3149 else
3150 {
3151 z = 0;
3152 if (c < SizeC - 1)
3153 c++;
3154 else
3155 {
3156 c = 0;
3157 if (t < SizeT - 1)
3158 t++;
3159 else
3160 t = 0;
3161 }
3162 }
3163 }
3164 }
3165 else
3166 {
3167 //Order.TZC
3168 for (int im = 0; im < fr; im++)
3169 {
3170 ZCT co = new ZCT(z, c, t);
3171 SetFrameIndex(co.Z, co.C, co.T,im);
3172 if (t < SizeT - 1)
3173 t++;
3174 else
3175 {
3176 t = 0;
3177 if (z < SizeZ - 1)
3178 z++;
3179 else
3180 {
3181 z = 0;
3182 if (c < SizeC - 1)
3183 c++;
3184 else
3185 c = 0;
3186 }
3187 }
3188 }
3189 }
3190 }
3196 public double ToImageSizeX(double d)
3197 {
3198 return d / PhysicalSizeX;
3199 }
3206 public double ToImageSizeY(double d)
3207 {
3208 return d / PhysicalSizeY;
3209 }
3215 public double ToImageSpaceX(double x)
3216 {
3217 if (isPyramidal)
3218 return x;
3219 return (float)((x - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3220 }
3226 public double ToImageSpaceY(double y)
3227 {
3228 if (isPyramidal)
3229 return y;
3230 return (float)((y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3231 }
3237 public PointD ToImageSpace(PointD p)
3238 {
3239 PointD pp = new PointD();
3240 pp.X = (float)((p.X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3241 pp.Y = (float)((p.Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3242 return pp;
3243 }
3249 public PointD[] ToImageSpace(List<PointD> p)
3250 {
3251 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Count];
3252 for (int i = 0; i < p.Count; i++)
3253 {
3254 PointD pp = new PointD();
3255 pp.X = ((p[i].X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3256 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3257 ps[i] = pp;
3258 }
3259 return ps;
3260 }
3267 public PointF[] ToImageSpace(PointF[] p)
3268 {
3269 PointF[] ps = new PointF[p.Length];
3270 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
3271 {
3272 PointF pp = new PointF();
3273 pp.X = (float)((p[i].X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3274 pp.Y = (float)((p[i].Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3275 ps[i] = pp;
3276 }
3277 return ps;
3278 }
3284 public RectangleF ToImageSpace(RectangleD p)
3285 {
3286 RectangleF r = new RectangleF();
3287 Point pp = new Point();
3288 r.X = (int)((p.X - StageSizeX) / PhysicalSizeX);
3289 r.Y = (int)((p.Y - StageSizeY) / PhysicalSizeY);
3290 r.Width = (int)(p.W / PhysicalSizeX);
3291 r.Height = (int)(p.H / PhysicalSizeY);
3292 return r;
3293 }
3299 public PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p)
3300 {
3301 PointD pp = new PointD();
3302 if (isPyramidal)
3303 {
3304 pp.X = ((p.X * Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3305 pp.Y = ((p.Y * Resolutions[Level].PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3306 return pp;
3307 }
3308 else
3309 {
3310 pp.X = ((p.X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3311 pp.Y = ((p.Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3312 return pp;
3313 }
3314 }
3321 public PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p, int resolution)
3322 {
3323 PointD pp = new PointD();
3324 pp.X = ((p.X * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3325 pp.Y = ((p.Y * Resolutions[resolution].PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3326 return pp;
3327 }
3338 public static PointD ToStageSpace(PointD p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
3339 {
3340 PointD pp = new PointD();
3341 pp.X = ((p.X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
3342 pp.Y = ((p.Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
3343 return pp;
3344 }
3351 public RectangleD ToStageSpace(RectangleD p)
3352 {
