3353 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
3354 r.X = ((p.X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3355 r.Y = ((p.Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3356 r.W = (p.W * PhysicalSizeX);
3357 r.H = (p.H * PhysicalSizeY);
3358 return r;
3359 }
3370 public static RectangleD ToStageSpace(RectangleD p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
3371 {
3372 RectangleD r = new RectangleD();
3373 r.X = ((p.X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
3374 r.Y = ((p.Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
3375 r.W = (p.W * physicalSizeX);
3376 r.H = (p.H * physicalSizeY);
3377 return r;
3378 }
3385 public PointD[] ToStageSpace(PointD[] p)
3386 {
3387 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Length];
3388 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
3389 {
3390 PointD pp = new PointD();
3391 pp.X = ((p[i].X * PhysicalSizeX) + Volume.Location.X);
3392 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y * PhysicalSizeY) + Volume.Location.Y);
3393 ps[i] = pp;
3394 }
3395 return ps;
3396 }
3408 public static PointD[] ToStageSpace(PointD[] p, double physicalSizeX, double physicalSizeY, double volumeX, double volumeY)
3409 {
3410 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Length];
3411 for (int i = 0; i < p.Length; i++)
3412 {
3413 PointD pp = new PointD();
3414 pp.X = ((p[i].X * physicalSizeX) + volumeX);
3415 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y * physicalSizeY) + volumeY);
3416 ps[i] = pp;
3417 }
3418 return ps;
3419 }
3420 /* Creating a new BioImage object. */
3421 public BioImage(string file)
3422 {
3423 id = file;
3424 this.file = file;
3425 filename = Images.GetImageName(id);
3426 Coordinate = new ZCT();
3427 rgbChannels[0] = 0;
3428 rgbChannels[1] = 0;
3429 rgbChannels[2] = 0;
3430 }
3444 public static BioImage Substack(BioImage orig, int ser, int zs, int ze, int cs, int ce, int ts, int te)
3445 {
3446 BioImage b = CopyInfo(orig, false, false);
3447 b.ID = Images.GetImageName(orig.ID);
3448 int i = 0;
3449 b.Coords = new int[ze - zs, ce - cs, te - ts];
3450 b.sizeZ = ze - zs;
3451 b.sizeC = ce - cs;
3452 b.sizeT = te - ts;
3453 for (int ti = 0; ti < b.SizeT; ti++)
3454 {
3455 for (int zi = 0; zi < b.SizeZ; zi++)
3456 {
3457 for (int ci = 0; ci < b.SizeC; ci++)
3458 {
3459 int ind = orig.GetFrameIndex(zs + zi, cs + ci, ts + ti);
3460 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(Images.GetImageName(orig.id), orig.SizeX, orig.SizeY, orig.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, orig.Buffers[ind].Bytes, new ZCT(zi, ci, ti), i);
3461 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
3462 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
3463 b.SetFrameIndex(zi, ci, ti, i);
3464 i++;
3465 }
3466 }
3467 }
3468 for (int ci = cs; ci < ce; ci++)
3469 {
3470 b.Channels.Add(orig.Channels[ci]);
3471 }
3472 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3473 do
3474 {
3475 Thread.Sleep(100);
3476 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3477 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3478 b.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(b.Buffers[0].SizeX, b.Buffers[0].SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.PhysicalSizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ, b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ));
3479 AutoThreshold(b, false);
3480 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3481 b.StackThreshold(true);
3482 else
3483 b.StackThreshold(false);
3484 Images.AddImage(b, true);
3485 return b;
3486 }
3493 public static BioImage MergeChannels(BioImage b2, BioImage b)
3494 {
3495 BioImage res = new BioImage(b2.ID);
3496 res.ID = Images.GetImageName(b2.ID);
3497 res.series = b2.series;
3498 res.sizeZ = b2.SizeZ;
3499 int cOrig = b2.SizeC;
3500 res.sizeC = b2.SizeC + b.SizeC;
3501 res.sizeT = b2.SizeT;
3502 res.bitsPerPixel = b2.bitsPerPixel;
3503 res.imageInfo = b2.imageInfo;
3504 res.littleEndian = b2.littleEndian;
3505 res.seriesCount = b2.seriesCount;
3506 res.imagesPerSeries = res.ImageCount / res.seriesCount;
3507 res.Coords = new int[res.SizeZ, res.SizeC, res.SizeT];
3508
3509 int i = 0;
3510 int cc = 0;
3511 for (int ti = 0; ti < res.SizeT; ti++)
3512 {
3513 for (int zi = 0; zi < res.SizeZ; zi++)
3514 {
3515 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
3516 {
3517 ZCT co = new ZCT(zi, ci, ti);
3518 if (ci < cOrig)
3519 {
3520 //If this channel is part of the image b1 we add planes from it.
3521 Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(b2.id, b2.SizeX, b2.SizeY, b2.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b2.Buffers[i].Bytes, co, i);
3522 if (b2.littleEndian)
3523 copy.RotateFlip(AForge.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3524 res.SetFrameIndex(zi, ci, ti, i);
3525 res.Buffers.Add(b2.Buffers[i]);
3526 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
3527 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
3528 List<ROI> anns = b2.GetAnnotations(zi, ci, ti);
3529 if (anns.Count > 0)
3530 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
3531 }
3532 else
3533 {
3534 //This plane is not part of b1 so we add the planes from b2 channels.
3535 Bitmap copy = new Bitmap(b.id, b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.Buffers[i].Bytes, co, i);
3536 if (b2.littleEndian)
3537 copy.RotateFlip(AForge.RotateFlipType.Rotate180FlipNone);
3538 res.SetFrameIndex(zi, ci, ti,i);
3539 res.Buffers.Add(b.Buffers[i]);
3540 res.Buffers.Add(copy);
3541
3542 //Lets copy the ROI's from the original image.
3543 List<ROI> anns = b.GetAnnotations(zi, cc, ti);
3544 if (anns.Count > 0)
3545 res.Annotations.AddRange(anns);
3546 }
3547 i++;
3548 }
3549 }
3550 }
3551 for (int ci = 0; ci < res.SizeC; ci++)
3552 {
3553 if (ci < cOrig)
3554 {
3555 res.Channels.Add(b2.Channels[ci].Copy());
3556 }
3557 else
3558 {
3559 res.Channels.Add(b.Channels[cc].Copy());
3560 res.Channels[cOrig + cc].Index = ci;
3561 cc++;
3562 }
3563 }
3564 Images.AddImage(res, true);
3565 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3566 do
3567 {
3568 Thread.Sleep(100);
3569 } while (res.Buffers[res.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3570 AutoThreshold(res, false);
3571 if (res.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3572 res.StackThreshold(true);
3573 else
3574 res.StackThreshold(false);
3575 return res;
3576 }
3583 public static BioImage MergeChannels(string bname, string b2name)
3584 {
3585 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(bname);
3586 BioImage b2 = Images.GetImage(b2name);
3587 return MergeChannels(b, b2);
3588 }
3594 public static BioImage MergeZ(BioImage b)
3595 {
3596 BioImage bi = BioImage.CopyInfo(b, true, true);
3597 int ind = 0;
3598 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
3599 {
3600 for (int t = 0; t < b.sizeT; t++)
3601 {
3602 Merge m = new Merge(b.Buffers[b.GetFrameIndex(0, c, t)]);
3603 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat);
3604 for (int i = 1; i < b.sizeZ; i++)
3605 {
3606 m.OverlayImage = bm;
3607 bm = m.Apply(b.Buffers[b.GetFrameIndex(i, c, t)]);
3608 }
3609 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(b.file, bm, new ZCT(0, c, t), ind);
3610 bi.Buffers.Add(bf);
3611 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
3612 ind++;
3613 }
3614 }
3615 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
3616 bi.UpdateCoords(1, b.SizeC, b.SizeT);
3617 bi.Coordinate = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
3618 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3619 do
3620 {
3621 Thread.Sleep(100);
3622 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3623 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3624 bi.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(b.Buffers[0].SizeX, b.Buffers[0].SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.PhysicalSizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ, b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ));
3625
3626 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
3627 if (bi.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3628 bi.StackThreshold(true);
3629 else
3630 bi.StackThreshold(false);
3631 return bi;
3632 }
3638 public static BioImage MergeT(BioImage b)
3639 {
3640 BioImage bi = BioImage.CopyInfo(b, true, true);
3641 int ind = 0;
3642 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
3643 {
3644 for (int z = 0; z < b.sizeZ; z++)
3645 {
3646 Merge m = new Merge(b.Buffers[b.GetFrameIndex(z, c, 0)]);
3647 Bitmap bm = new Bitmap(b.SizeX, b.SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat);
3648 for (int i = 1; i < b.sizeT; i++)
3649 {
3650 m.OverlayImage = bm;
3651 bm = m.Apply(b.Buffers[b.GetFrameIndex(z, c, i)]);
3652 }
3653 Bitmap bf = new Bitmap(b.file, bm, new ZCT(z, c, 0), ind);
3654 bi.Buffers.Add(bf);
3655 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bf);
3656 ind++;
3657 }
3658 }
3659 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
3660 bi.UpdateCoords(1, b.SizeC, b.SizeT);
3661 bi.Coordinate = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
3662 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3663 do
3664 {
3665 Thread.Sleep(100);
3666 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3667 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3668 bi.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(b.Buffers[0].SizeX, b.Buffers[0].SizeY, b.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, b.PhysicalSizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ, b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ));
3669 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
3670 if (bi.bitsPerPixel > 8)
3671 bi.StackThreshold(true);
3672 else
3673 bi.StackThreshold(false);
3674 return bi;
3675 }
3679 public BioImage[] SplitChannels()
3680 {
3681 BioImage[] bms;
3682 if (isRGB)
3683 {
3684 bms = new BioImage[3];
3685 BioImage ri = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-1" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3686 BioImage gi = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-2" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3687 BioImage bi = new BioImage(Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ID) + "-3" + Path.GetExtension(ID));
3688 ri.sizeC = 1;
3689 gi.sizeC = 1;
3690 bi.sizeC = 1;
3691 ri.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3692 gi.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3693 bi.sizeZ = SizeZ;
3694 ri.sizeT = SizeT;
3695 gi.sizeT = SizeT;
3696 bi.sizeT = SizeT;
3697
3698 ri.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3699 gi.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3700 bi.Coords = new int[SizeZ, 1, SizeT];
3701 int ind = 0;
3702 for (int i = 0; i < ImageCount; i++)
3703 {
3704 if (Buffers[i].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
3705 {
3706 //For 48bit images we need to use our own function as AForge won't give us a proper image.
3707 Bitmap[] bfs = Bitmap.RGB48To16(ID, SizeX, SizeY, Buffers[i].Stride, Buffers[i].Bytes, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind, Buffers[i].Plane);
3708 ind += 3;
3709 ri.Buffers.Add(bfs[0]);
3710 gi.Buffers.Add(bfs[1]);
3711 bi.Buffers.Add(bfs[2]);
3712 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[0]);
3713 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[1]);
3714 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bfs[2]);
3715 ri.SetFrameIndex(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T,i);
3716 gi.SetFrameIndex(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T, i);
3717 bi.SetFrameIndex(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T, i);
3718 }
3719 else
3720 {
3721
3722 Bitmap rImage = extractR.Apply(Buffers[i]);
3723 Bitmap rbf = new Bitmap(ri.ID, rImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
3724 Statistics.CalcStatistics(rbf);
3725 ri.Buffers.Add(rbf);
3726 ri.SetFrameIndex(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T, i);
3727
3728 Bitmap gImage = extractG.Apply(Buffers[i]);
3729 Bitmap gbf = new Bitmap(gi.ID, gImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
3730 Statistics.CalcStatistics(gbf);
3731 gi.Buffers.Add(gbf);
3732 gi.SetFrameIndex(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T, i);
3733
3734 Bitmap bImage = extractB.Apply(Buffers[i]);
3735 //Clipboard.SetImage(bImage);
3736 Bitmap bbf = new Bitmap(bi.ID, bImage, Buffers[i].Coordinate, ind++);
3737 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bbf);
3738 bi.Buffers.Add(bbf);
3739 bi.SetFrameIndex(Buffers[i].Coordinate.Z, Buffers[i].Coordinate.C, Buffers[i].Coordinate.T,i);
3740
3741 }
3742 }
3743 //We wait for threshold image statistics calculation
3744 do
3745 {
3746 Thread.Sleep(100);
3747 } while (bi.Buffers[bi.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
3748 ri.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(Buffers[0].SizeX, Buffers[0].SizeY, Buffers[0].PixelFormat, PhysicalSizeX, PhysicalSizeY, PhysicalSizeZ, StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ));
3749 gi.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(Buffers[0].SizeX, Buffers[0].SizeY, Buffers[0].PixelFormat, PhysicalSizeX, PhysicalSizeY, PhysicalSizeZ, StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ));
3750 bi.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(Buffers[0].SizeX, Buffers[0].SizeY, Buffers[0].PixelFormat, PhysicalSizeX, PhysicalSizeY, PhysicalSizeZ, StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ));
3751 ri.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
3752 gi.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
3753 bi.Channels.Add(Channels[0].Copy());
3754 AutoThreshold(ri, false);
3755 AutoThreshold(gi, false);
3756 AutoThreshold(bi, false);
3757 Images.AddImage(ri, true);
3758 Images.AddImage(gi, true);
3759 Images.AddImage(bi, true);
3760 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3761 bms[0] = ri;
3762 bms[1] = gi;
3763 bms[2] = bi;
3764 }
3765 else
3766 {
3767 bms = new BioImage[SizeC];
3768 for (int c = 0; c < SizeC; c++)
3769 {
3770 BioImage b = BioImage.Substack(this, 0, 0, SizeZ, c, c + 1, 0, SizeT);
3771 bms[c] = b;
3772 }
3773 }
3774 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
3775 return bms;
3776 }
3782 public static BioImage[] SplitChannels(BioImage bb)
3783 {
3784 return bb.SplitChannels();
3785 }
3791 public static BioImage[] SplitChannels(string name)
3792 {
3793 return SplitChannels(Images.GetImage(name));
3794 }
3795
3796 /* Creating a new instance of the LevelsLinear class. */
3797 public static LevelsLinear filter8 = new LevelsLinear();
3798 public static LevelsLinear16bpp filter16 = new LevelsLinear16bpp();
3799 private static ExtractChannel extractR = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.R);
3800 private static ExtractChannel extractG = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.G);
3801 private static ExtractChannel extractB = new ExtractChannel(AForge.Imaging.RGB.B);
3802
3810 public Bitmap GetImageByCoord(int z, int c, int t)
3811 {
3812 return Buffers[GetFrameIndex(z, c, t)];
3813 }
3823 public Bitmap GetBitmap(int z, int c, int t)
3824 {
3825 return Buffers[GetFrameIndex(z, c, t)];
3826 }
3837 public int GetIndex(int ix, int iy)
3838 {
3839 if (ix > SizeX || iy > SizeY || ix < 0 || iy < 0)
3840 return 0;
3841 int stridex = SizeX;
3842 int x = ix;
3843 int y = iy;
3844 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
3845 {
3846 return (y * stridex + x) * 2;
3847 }
3848 else
3849 {
3850 return (y * stridex + x);
3851 }
3852 }
3860 public int GetIndexRGB(int ix, int iy, int index)
3861 {
3862 int stridex = SizeX;
3863 //For 16bit (2*8bit) images we multiply buffer index by 2
3864 int x = ix;
3865 int y = iy;
3866 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
3867 {
3868 return (y * stridex + x) * 2 * index;
3869 }
3870 else
3871 {
3872 return (y * stridex + x) * index;
3873 }
3874 }
3881 public ushort GetValue(ZCTXY coord)
3882 {
3883 return GetValueRGB(coord, 0);
3884 }
3891 public ushort GetValueRGB(ZCTXY coord, int index)
3892 {
3893 int ind = 0;
3894 if (coord.C >= SizeC)
3895 {
3896 coord.C = 0;
3897 }
3898 ind = GetFrameIndex(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T);
3899 return (ushort)Buffers[ind].GetValue(coord.X, coord.Y, index);
3900 }
3908 public ushort GetValue(ZCT coord, int x, int y)
3909 {
3910 return GetValueRGB(new ZCTXY(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T, x, y), 0);
3911 }
3921 public ushort GetValue(int z, int c, int t, int x, int y)
3922 {
3923 return GetValueRGB(new ZCTXY(z, c, t, x, y),0);
3924 }
3933 public float GetValueRGB(ZCT coord, int x, int y, int RGBindex)
3934 {
3935 int i = GetFrameIndex(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T);
3936 return Buffers[i].GetValue(x, y, RGBindex);
3937 }
3949 public float GetValueRGB(int z, int c, int t, int x, int y, int RGBindex)
3950 {
3951 return GetValueRGB(new ZCT(z, c, t), x, y, RGBindex);
3952 }
3957 public void SetValue(ZCTXY coord, ushort value)
3958 {
3959 int i = GetFrameIndex(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T);
3960 Buffers[i].SetValue(coord.X, coord.Y, value);
3961 }
3968 public void SetValue(int x, int y, int ind, ushort value)
3969 {
3970 Buffers[ind].SetValue(x, y, value);
3971 }
3978 public void SetValue(int x, int y, ZCT coord, ushort value)
3979 {
3980 SetValue(x, y, GetFrameIndex(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T), value);
3981 }
3988 public void SetValueRGB(ZCTXY coord, int RGBindex, ushort value)
3989 {
3990 int ind = GetFrameIndex(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T);
3991 Buffers[ind].SetValue(coord.X, coord.Y, RGBindex, value);
3992 }
3998 public Bitmap GetBitmap(ZCT coord)
3999 {
4000 return (Bitmap)GetImageByCoord(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T);
4001 }
4010 public Bitmap GetFiltered(ZCT coord, IntRange r, IntRange g, IntRange b)
4011 {
4012 int index = GetFrameIndex(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T);
4013 return GetFiltered(index, r, g, b);
4014 }
4023 public Bitmap GetFiltered(int ind, IntRange r, IntRange g, IntRange b)
4024 {
4025 if (Buffers[ind].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Float || Buffers[ind].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Short)
4026 {
4027 BioImage.filter8.InRed = r;
4028 BioImage.filter8.InGreen = g;
4029 BioImage.filter8.InBlue = b;
4030 Bitmap bm = BioImage.filter8.Apply(Buffers[ind].ImageRGB);
4031 return bm;
4032 }
4033 else
4034 if (Buffers[ind].BitsPerPixel > 8)
4035 {
4036 BioImage.filter16.InRed = r;
4037 BioImage.filter16.InGreen = g;
4038 BioImage.filter16.InBlue = b;
4039 Bitmap bm = BioImage.filter16.Apply(Buffers[ind]);
4040 return bm;
4041 }
4042 else
4043 {
4044 // set ranges
4045 BioImage.filter8.InRed = r;
4046 BioImage.filter8.InGreen = g;
4047 BioImage.filter8.InBlue = b;
4048 return BioImage.filter8.Apply(Buffers[ind]);
4049 }
4050 }
4055 public UnmanagedImage GetChannelImage(int ind, short s)
4056 {
4057 Bitmap bf = Buffers[ind];
4058 if (bf.isRGB)
4059 {
4060 if (s == 0)
4061 return extractR.Apply(Buffers[ind].Image);
4062 else
4063 if (s == 1)
4064 return extractG.Apply(Buffers[ind].Image);
4065 else
4066 return extractB.Apply(Buffers[ind].Image);
4067 }
4068 else
4069 throw new InvalidOperationException();
4070 }
4080 public Bitmap GetEmission(ZCT coord, IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
4081 {
4082 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
4083 {
4084 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[Channels.Count];
4085 for (int c = 0; c < Channels.Count; c++)
4086 {
4087 int index = GetFrameIndex(coord.Z, c, coord.T);
4088 bs[c] = Buffers[index];
4089 }
4090 Bitmap bm = (Bitmap)Bitmap.GetEmissionBitmap(bs, Channels.ToArray());
4091 return bm;
4092 }
4093 else
4094 {
4095 int index = GetFrameIndex(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T);
4096 return Buffers[index];
4097 }
4098 }
4107 public Bitmap GetRGBBitmap(ZCT coord, IntRange rf, IntRange gf, IntRange bf)
4108 {
4109 int index = GetFrameIndex(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T);
4110 if (Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
4111 {
4112 if (Channels.Count >= 3)
4113 {
4114 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Float || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Short)
4115 {
4116 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
4117 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index].ImageRGB;
4118 bs[1] = Buffers[index + GChannel.Index].ImageRGB;
4119 bs[0] = Buffers[index + BChannel.Index].ImageRGB;
4120 return Bitmap.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
4121 }
4122 else
4123 {
4124 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
4125 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
4126 bs[1] = Buffers[index + GChannel.Index];
4127 bs[0] = Buffers[index + BChannel.Index];
4128 return Bitmap.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
4129 }
4130
4131 }
4132 else
4133 {
4134 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Float || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Short)
4135 {
4136 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
4137 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index].ImageRGB;
4138 bs[1] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 1].ImageRGB;
4139 bs[0] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 2].ImageRGB;
4140 return Bitmap.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
4141 }
4142 else
4143 {
4144 Bitmap[] bs = new Bitmap[3];
4145 bs[2] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index];
4146 bs[1] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 1];
4147 bs[0] = Buffers[index + RChannel.Index + 2];
4148 return Bitmap.GetRGBBitmap(bs, rf, gf, bf);
4149 }
4150
4151 }
4152 }
4153 else
4154 {
4155 if (Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Float || Buffers[0].PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Short)
4156 {
4157 return Buffers[index].ImageRGB;
4158 }
4159 else
4160 return Buffers[index];
4161 }
4162 }
4171 public static unsafe Bitmap GetBitmapRGB(int w, int h, PixelFormat px, byte[] bts)
4172 {
4173 if (px == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
4174 {
4175 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4176 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4177 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4178 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4179 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4180 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4181 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4182 {
4183 //getting the pixels of current row
4184 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4185 int rowRGB = y * w * 4;
4186 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4187 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4188 {
4189 int indexRGB = x * 4;
4190 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4191 row[indexRGBA + 3] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 3];//byte A
4192 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
4193 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
4194 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
4195 }
4196 }
4197 //unlocking bits and disposing image
4198 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4199 return bmp;
4200 }
4201 else if (px == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb)
4202 {
4203 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4204 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4205 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4206 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4207 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4208 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4209 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4210 {
4211 //getting the pixels of current row
4212 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4213 int rowRGB = y * w * 3;
4214 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4215 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4216 {
4217 int indexRGB = x * 3;
4218 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4219 row[indexRGBA + 3] = byte.MaxValue;//byte A
4220 row[indexRGBA + 2] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 2];//byte R
4221 row[indexRGBA + 1] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB + 1];//byte G
4222 row[indexRGBA] = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];//byte B
4223 }
4224 }
4225 //unlocking bits and disposing image
4226 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4227 return bmp;
4228 }
4229 else
4230 if (px == PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb)
4231 {
4232 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4233 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4234 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4235 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4236 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4237 unsafe
4238 {
4239 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4240 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4241 {
4242 //getting the pixels of current row
4243 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4244 int rowRGB = y * w * 6;
4245 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4246 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4247 {
4248 int indexRGB = x * 6;
4249 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4250 int b = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
4251 int g = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 2) / 255);
4252 int r = (int)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB + 4) / 255);
4253 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
4254 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
4255 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(g);//byte G
4256 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(r);//byte B
4257 }
4258 }
4259 }
4260 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4261 return bmp;
4262 }
4263 else
4264 if (px == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed)
4265 {
4266 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4267 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4268 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4269 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4270 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4271 unsafe
4272 {
4273 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4274 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4275 {
4276 //getting the pixels of current row
4277 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4278 int rowRGB = y * w;
4279 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4280 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4281 {
4282 int indexRGB = x;
4283 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4284 byte b = bts[rowRGB + indexRGB];
4285 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
4286 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
4287 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
4288 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
4289 }
4290 }
4291 }
4292 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4293 return bmp;
4294 }
4295 else
4296 if (px == PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale)
4297 {
4298 //opening a 8 bit per pixel jpg image
4299 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(w, h, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);
4300 //creating the bitmapdata and lock bits
4301 AForge.Rectangle rec = new AForge.Rectangle(0, 0, w, h);
4302 BitmapData bmd = bmp.LockBits(rec, ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, bmp.PixelFormat);
4303 unsafe
4304 {
4305 //iterating through all the pixels in y direction
4306 for (int y = 0; y < h; y++)
4307 {
4308 //getting the pixels of current row
4309 byte* row = (byte*)bmd.Scan0 + (y * bmd.Stride);
4310 int rowRGB = y * w * 2;
4311 //iterating through all the pixels in x direction
4312 for (int x = 0; x < w; x++)
4313 {
4314 int indexRGB = x * 2;
4315 int indexRGBA = x * 4;
4316 ushort b = (ushort)((float)BitConverter.ToUInt16(bts, rowRGB + indexRGB) / 255);
4317 row[indexRGBA + 3] = 255;//byte A
4318 row[indexRGBA + 2] = (byte)(b);//byte R
4319 row[indexRGBA + 1] = (byte)(b);//byte G
4320 row[indexRGBA] = (byte)(b);//byte B
4321 }
4322 }
4323 }
4324 bmp.UnlockBits(bmd);
4325 return bmp;
4326 }
4327
4328 throw new NotSupportedException("Pixelformat " + px + " is not supported.");
4329 }
4330 public static Stopwatch swatch = new Stopwatch();
4337 public List<ROI> GetAnnotations(ZCT coord)
4338 {
4339 List<ROI> annotations = new List<ROI>();
4340 foreach (ROI an in Annotations)
4341 {
4342 if (an == null)
4343 continue;
4344 if (an.coord == coord)
4345 annotations.Add(an);
4346 }
4347 return annotations;
4348 }
4357 public List<ROI> GetAnnotations(int Z, int C, int T)
4358 {
4359 List<ROI> annotations = new List<ROI>();
4360 foreach (ROI an in Annotations)
4361 {
4362 if (an.coord.Z == Z && an.coord.Z == Z && an.coord.C == C && an.coord.T == T)
4363 annotations.Add(an);
4364 }
4365 return annotations;
4366 }
4367 public bool Loading = false;
4370 public static void Initialize()
4371 {
4372 //We initialize OME on a seperate thread so the user doesn't have to wait for initialization to
4373 //view images.
4374 System.Threading.Thread t = new System.Threading.Thread(new System.Threading.ThreadStart(InitFactory));
4375 t.Start();
4376 System.Threading.Thread t3 = new System.Threading.Thread(new System.Threading.ThreadStart(InitReader));
4377 t3.Start();
4378 System.Threading.Thread t4 = new System.Threading.Thread(new System.Threading.ThreadStart(InitWriter));
4379 t4.Start();
4380 }
4381 static bool inf = false, inr = false, inw = false;
4383 private static void InitFactory()
4384 {
4385 factory = new ServiceFactory();
4386 service = (OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService));
4387 inf = true;
4388 if (inf && inr && inw)
4389 initialized = true;
4390 }
4392 private static void InitReader()
4393 {
4394 reader = new ImageReader();
4395 inr = true;
4396 if (inf && inr && inw)
4397 initialized = true;
4398 }
4400 private static void InitWriter()
4401 {
4402 writer = new ImageWriter();
4403 inw = true;
4404 if (inf && inr && inw)
4405 initialized = true;
4406 }
4407 string FromMethod(MethodBase bm)
4408 {
4409 string s = bm.Name + ".(";
4410 foreach (var item in bm.GetParameters())
4411 {
4412
4413 }
4414 return s;
4415 }
4416 private static List<Resolution> GetResolutions()
4417 {
4418 List<Resolution> rss = new List<Resolution>();
4419 int seriesCount = reader.getSeriesCount();
4420 for (int s = 0; s < seriesCount; s++)
4421 {
4422 reader.setSeries(s);
4423 IMetadata meta = (IMetadata)reader.getMetadataStore();
4424 for (int r = 0; r < reader.getResolutionCount(); r++)
4425 {
4426 Resolution res = new Resolution();
4427 try
4428 {
4429 int rgbc = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
4430 int bps = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
4431 PixelFormat px;
4432 try
4433 {
4434 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, meta.getPixelsType(r));
4435 }
4436 catch (Exception)
4437 {
4438 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, bps);
4439 }
4440 res.PixelFormat = px;
4441 res.SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
4442 res.SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
4443 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(r) != null)
4444 {
4445 res.PhysicalSizeX = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(r).value().doubleValue();
4446 }
4447 else
4448 res.PhysicalSizeX = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
4449 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(r) != null)
4450 {
4451 res.PhysicalSizeY = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(r).value().doubleValue();
4452 }
4453 else
4454 res.PhysicalSizeY = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
4455
4456 if (meta.getStageLabelX(r) != null)
4457 res.StageSizeX = meta.getStageLabelX(r).value().doubleValue();
4458 if (meta.getStageLabelY(r) != null)
4459 res.StageSizeY = meta.getStageLabelY(r).value().doubleValue();
4460 if (meta.getStageLabelZ(r) != null)
4461 res.StageSizeZ = meta.getStageLabelZ(r).value().doubleValue();
4462 else
4463 res.StageSizeZ = 1;
4464 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(r) != null)
4465 {
4466 res.PhysicalSizeZ = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(r).value().doubleValue();
4467 }
4468 else
4469 {
4470 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
4471 }
4472 }
4473 catch (Exception e)
4474 {
4475 Console.WriteLine("No Stage Coordinates. PhysicalSize:(" + res.PhysicalSizeX + "," + res.PhysicalSizeY + "," + res.PhysicalSizeZ + ")");
4476 }
4477 rss.Add(res);
4478 }
4479 }
4480 return rss;
4481 }
4482 private static int GetPyramidCount()
4483 {
4484 List<Resolution> rss = GetResolutions();
4485 //We need to determine if this image is pyramidal or not.
4486 //We do this by seeing if the resolutions are downsampled or not.
4487 //We also need to determine number of pyramids in this image and which belong to the series we are opening.
4488 List<Tuple<int, int>> prs = new List<Tuple<int, int>>();
4489 int? sr = null;
4490 for (int r = 0; r < rss.Count - 1; r++)
4491 {
4492 if (rss[r].SizeX > rss[r + 1].SizeX && rss[r].PixelFormat == rss[r + 1].PixelFormat)
4493 {
4494 if (sr == null)
4495 {
4496 sr = r;
4497 prs.Add(new Tuple<int, int>(r, 0));
4498 }
4499 }
4500 else
4501 {
4502 if (rss[prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1].PixelFormat == rss[r].PixelFormat)
4503 prs[prs.Count - 1] = new Tuple<int, int>(prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1, r);
4504 sr = null;
4505 }
4506 }
4507 return prs.Count;
4508 }
4509 public static int GetSeriesCount(string file)
4510 {
4511 reader.setId(file);
4512 int i = reader.getSeriesCount();
4513 int prs = GetPyramidCount();
4514 reader.close();
4515 if (prs > 0)
4516 return prs;
4517 else
4518 return i;
4519 }
4525 public static void SaveFile(string file, string ID)
4526 {
4527 string[] sts = new string[1];
4528 sts[0] = ID;
4529 SaveSeries(sts, file);
4530 }
4535 public static void SaveSeries(string[] IDs, string file)
4536 {
4537 string desc = "";
4538 int stride = 0;
4539 ImageJDesc j = new ImageJDesc();
4540 BioImage bi = Images.GetImage(IDs[0]);
4541 j.FromImage(bi);
4542 desc = j.GetString();
4543 for (int fi = 0; fi < IDs.Length; fi++)
4544 {
4545 string id = IDs[fi];
4546 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(id);
4547 string fn = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(id);
4548 string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(file);
4549 stride = b.Buffers[0].Stride;
4550
4551 //Save ROIs to CSV file.
4552 if (b.Annotations.Count > 0)
4553 {
4554 string f = dir + "//" + fn + ".csv";
4555 ExportROIsCSV(f, b.Annotations);
4556 }
4557
4558 //Embed ROI's to image description.
4559 for (int i = 0; i < b.Annotations.Count; i++)
4560 {
4561 desc += "-ROI:" + b.series + ":" + ROIToString(b.Annotations[i]) + NewLine;
4562 }
4563 foreach (Channel c in b.Channels)
4564 {
4565 string cj = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(c.info, Formatting.None);
4566 desc += "-Channel:" + fi + ":" + cj + NewLine;
4567 }
4568 string json = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(b.imageInfo, Formatting.None);
4569 desc += "-ImageInfo:" + fi + ":" + json + NewLine;
4570 }
4571
4572 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "w");
4573 for (int fi = 0; fi < IDs.Length; fi++)
4574 {
4575 int im = 0;
4576 string id = IDs[fi];
4577 BioImage b = Images.GetImage(id);
4578 int sizec = 1;
4579 if (!b.isRGB)
4580 {
4581 sizec = b.SizeC;
4582 }
4583 byte[] buffer;
4584 for (int c = 0; c < sizec; c++)
4585 {
4586 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
4587 {
4588 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
4589 {
4590 image.SetDirectory((short)(im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi)));
4591 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH, b.SizeX);
4592 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION, desc);
4593 image.SetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH, b.SizeY);
4594 image.SetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE, b.bitsPerPixel);
4595 image.SetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL, b.RGBChannelCount);
4596 image.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, b.SizeY);
4597 image.SetField(TiffTag.ORIENTATION, BitMiracle.LibTiff.Classic.Orientation.TOPLEFT);
4598 image.SetField(TiffTag.PLANARCONFIG, PlanarConfig.CONTIG);
4599 image.SetField(TiffTag.PHOTOMETRIC, Photometric.MINISBLACK);
4600 image.SetField(TiffTag.ROWSPERSTRIP, image.DefaultStripSize(0));
4601 if (b.PhysicalSizeX != -1 && b.PhysicalSizeY != -1)
4602 {
4603 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) / ((b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX) * b.PhysicalSizeX));
4604 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, (b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) / ((b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY) * b.PhysicalSizeY));
4605 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.NONE);
4606 }
4607 else
4608 {
4609 image.SetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION, 100.0);
4610 image.SetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION, 100.0);
4611 image.SetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT, ResUnit.INCH);
4612 }
4613 // specify that it's a page within the multipage file
4614 image.SetField(TiffTag.SUBFILETYPE, FileType.PAGE);
4615 // specify the page number
4616 buffer = b.Buffers[im].GetSaveBytes(true);
4617 image.SetField(TiffTag.PAGENUMBER, im + (b.Buffers.Count * fi), b.Buffers.Count * IDs.Length);
4618 for (int i = 0, offset = 0; i < b.SizeY; i++)
4619 {
4620 image.WriteScanline(buffer, offset, i, 0);
4621 offset += stride;
4622 }
4623 image.WriteDirectory();
4624 im++;
4625 }
4626 }
4627 }
4628 }
4629 image.Dispose();
4630 }
4637 public static BioImage[] OpenSeries(string file, bool tab)
4638 {
4639 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
4640 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories();
4641 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
4642 int sp = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
4643 ImageJDesc imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
4644 int count = 1;
4645 if (f != null)
4646 {
4647 string desc = f[0].ToString();
4648 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
4649 {
4650 imDesc.SetString(desc);
4651 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
4652 count = imDesc.channels;
4653 }
4654 }
4655 int scount = (pages * sp) / count;
4656 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[pages];
4657 image.Close();
4658 for (int i = 0; i < pages; i++)
4659 {
4660 bs[i] = OpenFile(file, i, tab, true);
4661 }
4662 return bs;
4663 }
4669 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file)
4670 {
4671 return OpenFile(file, 0, true, true);
4672 }
4673 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, bool tab)
4674 {
4675 return OpenFile(file, 0, tab, true);
4676 }
4683 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool tab, bool addToImages)
4684 {
4685 return OpenFile(file, series, tab, addToImages, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
4686 }
4687 static bool IsTiffTiled(string imagePath)
4688 {
4689 if (imagePath.EndsWith(".tif") || imagePath.EndsWith(".tiff"))
4690 {
4691 using (Tiff tiff = Tiff.Open(imagePath, "r"))
4692 {
4693 if (tiff == null)
4694 {
4695 throw new Exception("Failed to open TIFF image.");
4696 }
4697 bool t = tiff.IsTiled();
4698 tiff.Close();
4699 return t;
4700 }
4701 }
4702 else return false;
4703 }
4713 static void InitDirectoryResolution(BioImage b, Tiff image, ImageJDesc jdesc = null)
4714 {
4715 Resolution res = new Resolution();
4716 FieldValue[] rs = image.GetField(TiffTag.RESOLUTIONUNIT);
4717 string unit = "NONE";
4718 if (rs != null)
4719 unit = rs[0].ToString();
4720 if (jdesc != null)
4721 res.PhysicalSizeZ = jdesc.finterval;
4722 else
4723 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 2.54 / 96;
4724 if (unit == "CENTIMETER")
4725 {
4726 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
4727 {
4728 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4729 res.PhysicalSizeX = (1000 / x);
4730 }
4731 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
4732 {
4733 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4734 res.PhysicalSizeY = (1000 / y);
4735 }
4736 }
4737 else
4738 if (unit == "INCH")
4739 {
4740 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
4741 {
4742 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4743 res.PhysicalSizeX = (2.54 / x) / 2.54;
4744 }
4745 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
4746 {
4747 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4748 res.PhysicalSizeY = (2.54 / y) / 2.54;
4749 }
4750 }
4751 else
4752 if (unit == "NONE")
4753 {
4754 if (jdesc != null)
4755 {
4756 if (jdesc.unit == "micron")
4757 {
4758 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION) != null)
4759 {
4760 double x = image.GetField(TiffTag.XRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4761 res.PhysicalSizeX = (2.54 / x) / 2.54;
4762 }
4763 if (image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION) != null)
4764 {
4765 double y = image.GetField(TiffTag.YRESOLUTION)[0].ToDouble();
4766 res.PhysicalSizeY = (2.54 / y) / 2.54;
4767 }
4768 }
4769 }
4770 else
4771 {
4772 res.PhysicalSizeX = 2.54 / 96;
4773 res.PhysicalSizeY = 2.54 / 96;
4774 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 2.54 / 96;
4775 }
4776 }
4777 res.SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
4778 res.SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
4779 int bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
4780 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
4781 res.PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, bitsPerPixel);
4782 b.Resolutions.Add(res);
4783 }
4784
4810 public static BioImage OpenFile(string file, int series, bool tab, bool addToImages, bool tile, int tileX, int tileY, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
4811 {
4812 string fs = file.Replace("\\", "/");
4813 vips = VipsSupport(file);
4814 Console.WriteLine("Opening BioImage: " + file);
4815 bool ome = isOME(file);
4816 if (ome) return OpenOME(file, series, tab, addToImages, tile, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
4817 bool tiled = IsTiffTiled(file);
4818 Console.WriteLine("IsTiled=" + tiled.ToString());
4819 tile = tiled;
4820
4821 Stopwatch st = new Stopwatch();
4822 st.Start();
4823 status = "Opening Image";
4824 progFile = file;
4825 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
4826 if(tiled && file.EndsWith(".tif") && !file.EndsWith(".ome.tif"))
4827 {
4828 //To open this we need libvips
4829 vips = VipsSupport(b.file);
4830 }
4831 b.series = series;
4832 b.file = file;
4833 if (tiled)
4834 b.Type = ImageType.pyramidal;
4835 string fn = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(file);
4836 string dir = Path.GetDirectoryName(file);
4837 if (File.Exists(fn + ".csv"))
4838 {
4839 string f = dir + "//" + fn + ".csv";
4840 b.Annotations = BioImage.ImportROIsCSV(f);
4841 }
4842 if (file.EndsWith("tif") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIF") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
4843 {
4844 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
4845 b.tifRead = image;
4846 int SizeX = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEWIDTH)[0].ToInt();
4847 int SizeY = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGELENGTH)[0].ToInt();
4848 b.bitsPerPixel = image.GetField(TiffTag.BITSPERSAMPLE)[0].ToInt();
4849 b.littleEndian = image.IsBigEndian();
4850 int RGBChannelCount = image.GetField(TiffTag.SAMPLESPERPIXEL)[0].ToInt();
4851 string desc = "";
4852
4853 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
4854 desc = f[0].ToString();
4855 ImageJDesc imDesc = null;
4856 b.sizeC = 1;
4857 b.sizeT = 1;
4858 b.sizeZ = 1;
4859 if (f != null && !tile)
4860 {
4861 imDesc = new ImageJDesc();
4862 desc = f[0].ToString();
4863 if (desc.StartsWith("ImageJ"))
4864 {
4865 imDesc.SetString(desc);
4866 if (imDesc.channels != 0)
4867 b.sizeC = imDesc.channels;
4868 else
4869 b.sizeC = 1;
4870 if (imDesc.slices != 0)
4871 b.sizeZ = imDesc.slices;
4872 else
4873 b.sizeZ = 1;
4874 if (imDesc.frames != 0)
4875 b.sizeT = imDesc.frames;
4876 else
4877 b.sizeT = 1;
4878 if (imDesc.finterval != 0)
4879 b.frameInterval = imDesc.finterval;
4880 else
4881 b.frameInterval = 1;
4882 if (imDesc.spacing != 0)
4883 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = imDesc.spacing;
4884 else
4885 b.imageInfo.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
4886 }
4887 }
4888 int stride = 0;
4889 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
4890 if (RGBChannelCount == 1)
4891 {
4892 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
4893 {
4894 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
4895 stride = SizeX * 2;
4896 }
4897 else
4898 {
4899 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
4900 stride = SizeX;
4901 }
4902 }
4903 else
4904 if (RGBChannelCount == 3)
4905 {
4906 b.sizeC = 1;
4907 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
4908 {
4909 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
4910 stride = SizeX * 2 * 3;
4911 }
4912 else
4913 {
4914 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
4915 stride = SizeX * 3;
4916 }
4917 }
4918 else
4919 {
4920 PixelFormat = PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
4921 stride = SizeX * 4;
4922 }
4923
4924 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
4925 int index = 0;
4926 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
4927 {
4928 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-Channel"))
4929 {
4930 string val = sts[i].Substring(9);
4931 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
4932 int serie = int.Parse(val);
4933 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
4934 {
4935 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
4936 Channel.ChannelInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<Channel.ChannelInfo>(cht);
4937 Channel ch = new Channel(index, b.bitsPerPixel, info.SamplesPerPixel);
4938 ch.info = info;
4939 b.Channels.Add(ch);
4940 if (index == 0)
4941 {
4942 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
4943 }
4944 else
4945 if (index == 1)
4946 {
4947 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
4948 }
4949 else
4950 if (index == 2)
4951 {
4952 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
4953 }
4954 index++;
4955 }
4956 }
4957 else
4958 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ROI"))
4959 {
4960 string val = sts[i].Substring(5);
4961 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
4962 int serie = int.Parse(val);
4963 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 7)
4964 {
4965 string s = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4, sts[i].Length - (sts[i].IndexOf("ROI:") + 4));
4966 string ro = s.Substring(s.IndexOf(":") + 1, s.Length - (s.IndexOf(':') + 1));
4967 ROI roi = StringToROI(ro);
4968 b.Annotations.Add(roi);
4969 }
4970 }
4971 else
4972 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
4973 {
4974 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
4975 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
4976 int serie = int.Parse(val);
4977 if (serie == series && sts[i].Length > 10)
4978 {
4979 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
4980 b.imageInfo = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
4981 }
4982 }
4983 }
4984 b.Coords = new int[b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT];
4985 if (tiled && tileSizeX == 0 && tileSizeY == 0)
4986 {
4987 tileSizeX = 1920;
4988 tileSizeY = 1080;
4989 }
4990
4991 //If this is a tiff file not made by Bio we init channels based on RGBChannels.
4992 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
4993 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
4994
4995 //Lets check to see the channels are correctly defined in this file
4996 for (int ch = 0; ch < b.Channels.Count; ch++)
4997 {
4998 if (b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel != RGBChannelCount)
4999 {
5000 b.Channels[ch].SamplesPerPixel = RGBChannelCount;
5001 }
5002 }
5003
5004 b.Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
5005 int pages = image.NumberOfDirectories() / b.seriesCount;
5006 int str = image.ScanlineSize();
5007 bool inter = true;
5008 if (stride != str)
5009 inter = false;
5010 InitDirectoryResolution(b, image, imDesc);
5011 if (tiled)
5012 {
5013 Console.WriteLine("Opening tiles.");
5014 if (vips)
5015 OpenVips(b, b.Resolutions.Count);
5016 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
5017 {
5018 for (int c = 0; c < b.SizeC; c++)
5019 {
5020 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
5021 {
5022 Bitmap bmp = GetTile(b, new ZCT(z, c, t), series, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
5023 b.Buffers.Add(bmp);
5024 Statistics.CalcStatistics(bmp);
5025 }
5026 }
5027 }
5028 Console.WriteLine("Calculating statisitics.");
5029 }
5030 else
5031 {
5032 for (int p = series * pages; p < (series + 1) * pages; p++)
5033 {
5034 image.SetDirectory((short)p);
5035
5036 byte[] bytes = new byte[stride * SizeY];
5037 for (int im = 0, offset = 0; im < SizeY; im++)
5038 {
5039 image.ReadScanline(bytes, offset, im, 0);
5040 offset += stride;
5041 }
5042 Bitmap inf = new Bitmap(file, SizeX, SizeY, b.Resolutions[series].PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(0, 0, 0), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
5043 b.Buffers.Add(inf);
5044 Statistics.CalcStatistics(inf);
5045 }
5046 }
5047 image.Close();
5048 b.UpdateCoords();
5049 }
5050 else
5051 {
5052 Gdk.Pixbuf pf = new Gdk.Pixbuf(file);
5053 b.littleEndian = BitConverter.IsLittleEndian;
5054 PixelFormat px = GetPixelFormat(pf.NChannels, pf.BitsPerSample);
5055 b.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(pf.Width, pf.Height,px,96 * (1/2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000, 96 * (1 / 2.54) / 1000,0,0,0));
5056 b.bitsPerPixel = pf.BitsPerSample;
5057 b.Buffers.Add(new Bitmap(pf.Width, pf.Height, pf.Width * pf.NChannels, px, pf.Pixels));
5058 b.Buffers.Last().ID = Bitmap.CreateID(file, 0);
5059 Statistics.CalcStatistics(b.Buffers.Last());
5060 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, b.RGBChannelCount));
5061 b.Coords = new int[1, 1, 1];
5062 b.sizeC = 1;
5063 b.sizeT = 1;
5064 b.sizeZ = 1;
5065 }
5066 if (b.StageSizeX == -1)
5067 {
5068 b.imageInfo.Series = 0;
5069 b.StageSizeX = 0;
5070 b.StageSizeY = 0;
5071 b.StageSizeZ = 0;
5072 }
5073 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * b.SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * b.SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * b.SizeZ));
5074
5075 //If file is ome and we have OME support then check for annotation in metadata.
5076 if (ome)
5077 {
5078 b.Annotations.AddRange(OpenOMEROIs(file, series));
5079 }
5080
5081 //We wait for histogram image statistics calculation
5082 do
5083 {
5084 Thread.Sleep(50);
5085 } while (b.Buffers[b.Buffers.Count - 1].Stats == null);
5086 Statistics.ClearCalcBuffer();
5087 AutoThreshold(b, false);
5088 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5089 b.StackThreshold(true);
5090 else
5091 b.StackThreshold(false);
5092 if (addToImages)
5093 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
5094 //pr.Close();
5095 //pr.Dispose();
5096 st.Stop();
5097 b.loadTimeMS = st.ElapsedMilliseconds;
5098 Console.WriteLine("BioImage loaded " + b.ToString());
5099 BioLib.Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, file, series, tab, addToImages, tile, tileX, tileY, tileSizeX, tileSizeY);
5100 return b;
5101 }
5108 public static bool isTiffSeries(string file)
5109 {
5110 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
5111 string desc = "";
5112 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
5113 image.Close();
5114 string[] sts = desc.Split('\n');
5115 int index = 0;
5116 for (int i = 0; i < sts.Length; i++)
5117 {
5118 if (sts[i].StartsWith("-ImageInfo"))
5119 {
5120 string val = sts[i].Substring(11);
5121 val = val.Substring(0, val.IndexOf(':'));
5122 int serie = int.Parse(val);
5123 if (sts[i].Length > 10)
5124 {
5125 string cht = sts[i].Substring(sts[i].IndexOf('{'), sts[i].Length - sts[i].IndexOf('{'));
5126 ImageInfo info = JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<ImageInfo>(cht);
5127 if (info.Series > 1)
5128 return true;
5129 else
5130 return false;
5131 }
5132 }
5133 }
5134 return false;
5135 }
5143 public static bool isOME(string file)
5144 {
5145 if (file.EndsWith("ome.tif") || file.EndsWith("ome.tiff"))
5146 {
5147 return true;
5148 }
5149 if (file.EndsWith(".tif") || file.EndsWith(".TIF") || file.EndsWith("tiff") || file.EndsWith("TIFF"))
5150 {
5151 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
5152 string desc = "";
5153 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
5154 desc = f[0].ToString();
5155 image.Close();
5156 if (desc.Contains("OME-XML"))
5157 return true;
5158 else
5159 return false;
5160 }
5161 if ((file.EndsWith("png") || file.EndsWith("PNG") || file.EndsWith("jpg") || file.EndsWith("JPG") ||
5162 file.EndsWith("jpeg") || file.EndsWith("JPEG") || file.EndsWith("bmp") || file.EndsWith("BMP")))
5163 {
5164 return false;
5165 }
5166 else return true;
5167 }
5173 public static bool isOMESeries(string file)
5174 {
5175 if (!isOME(file))
5176 return false;
5177 ImageReader reader = new ImageReader();
5178 var meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
5179 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)meta);
5180 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
5181 reader.setId(file);
5182 bool ser = false;
5183 if (reader.getSeriesCount() > 1)
5184 ser = true;
5185 reader.close();
5186 reader = null;
5187 return ser;
5188 }
5189 public static void SaveOME(string file, string ID)
5190 {
5191 BioImage[] sts = new BioImage[1];
5192 sts[0] = Images.GetImage(ID);
5193 SaveOMESeries(sts, file, BioImage.Planes);
5194 }
5195
5196 public static void SaveOME(BioImage image, string file)
5197 {
5198 BioImage[] sts = new BioImage[1];
5199 sts[0] = image;
5200 SaveOMESeries(sts, file, BioImage.Planes);
5201 }
5207 public static void SaveOMESeries(BioImage[] files, string f, bool planes)
5208 {
5209 if (File.Exists(f))
5210 File.Delete(f);
5211 loci.formats.meta.IMetadata omexml = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
5212 status = "Saving OME Image Metadata.";
5213 for (int fi = 0; fi < files.Length; fi++)
5214 {
5215 int serie = fi;
5216 BioImage b = files[fi];
5217 if (b.isPyramidal)
5218 {
5219 b = OpenOME(b.file, b.Level, false, false, true,0, 0,1080, 1920);
5220 }
5221 // create OME-XML metadata store
5222
5223 omexml.setImageID("Image:" + serie, serie);
5224 omexml.setPixelsID("Pixels:" + serie, serie);
5225 omexml.setPixelsInterleaved(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
5226 omexml.setPixelsDimensionOrder(ome.xml.model.enums.DimensionOrder.XYCZT, serie);
5227 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5228 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16, serie);
5229 else
5230 omexml.setPixelsType(ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8, serie);
5231 omexml.setPixelsSizeX(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeX)), serie);
5232 omexml.setPixelsSizeY(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeY)), serie);
5233 omexml.setPixelsSizeZ(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeZ)), serie);
5234 omexml.setPixelsSizeC(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeC)), serie);
5235 omexml.setPixelsSizeT(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.SizeT)), serie);
5236 if (BitConverter.IsLittleEndian)
5237 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.FALSE, serie);
5238 else
5239 omexml.setPixelsBigEndian(java.lang.Boolean.TRUE, serie);
5240 ome.units.quantity.Length p1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeX), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5241 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeX(p1, serie);
5242 ome.units.quantity.Length p2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeY), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5243 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeY(p2, serie);
5244 ome.units.quantity.Length p3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.PhysicalSizeZ), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5245 omexml.setPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(p3, serie);
5246 ome.units.quantity.Length s1 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5247 omexml.setStageLabelX(s1, serie);
5248 ome.units.quantity.Length s2 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5249 omexml.setStageLabelY(s2, serie);
5250 ome.units.quantity.Length s3 = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Volume.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5251 omexml.setStageLabelZ(s3, serie);
5252 omexml.setStageLabelName("StageLabel:" + serie, serie);
5253
5254 for (int channel = 0; channel < b.Channels.Count; channel++)
5255 {
5256 Channel c = b.Channels[channel];
5257 for (int r = 0; r < c.range.Length; r++)
5258 {
5259 omexml.setChannelID("Channel:" + channel + ":" + serie, serie, channel + r);
5260 omexml.setChannelSamplesPerPixel(new PositiveInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, channel + r);
5261 if (c.LightSourceWavelength != 0)
5262 {
5263 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsID("LightSourceSettings:" + channel, serie, channel + r);
5264 ome.units.quantity.Length lw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceWavelength), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
5265 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsWavelength(lw, serie, channel + r);
5266 omexml.setChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(PercentFraction.valueOf(c.LightSourceAttenuation), serie, channel + r);
5267 }
5268 omexml.setChannelName(c.Name, serie, channel + r);
5269 if (c.Color != null)
5270 {
5271 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(c.Color.Value.R, c.Color.Value.G, c.Color.Value.B, c.Color.Value.A);
5272 omexml.setChannelColor(col, serie, channel + r);
5273 }
5274 if (c.Emission != 0)
5275 {
5276 ome.units.quantity.Length em = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Emission), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
5277 omexml.setChannelEmissionWavelength(em, serie, channel + r);
5278 ome.units.quantity.Length ex = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.Excitation), ome.units.UNITS.NANOMETER);
5279 omexml.setChannelExcitationWavelength(ex, serie, channel + r);
5280 }
5281 /*
5282 if (c.ContrastMethod != null)
5283 {
5284 ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod cm = (ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.ContrastMethod), c.ContrastMethod);
5285 omexml.setChannelContrastMethod(cm, serie, channel + r);
5286 }
5287 if (c.IlluminationType != null)
5288 {
5289 ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType il = (ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.IlluminationType), c.IlluminationType.ToUpper());
5290 omexml.setChannelIlluminationType(il, serie, channel + r);
5291 }
5292 if (c.AcquisitionMode != null)
5293 {
5294 ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode am = (ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode)Enum.Parse(typeof(ome.xml.model.enums.AcquisitionMode), c.AcquisitionMode.ToUpper());
5295 omexml.setChannelAcquisitionMode(am, serie, channel + r);
5296 }
5297 */
5298 omexml.setChannelFluor(c.Fluor, serie, channel + r);
5299 if (c.LightSourceIntensity != 0)
5300 {
5301 ome.units.quantity.Power pw = new ome.units.quantity.Power(java.lang.Double.valueOf(c.LightSourceIntensity), ome.units.UNITS.VOLT);
5302 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodePower(pw, serie, channel + r);
5303 omexml.setLightEmittingDiodeID(c.DiodeName, serie, channel + r);
5304 }
5305 }
5306 }
5307
5308 int i = 0;
5309 foreach (ROI an in b.Annotations)
5310 {
5311 if (an.roiID == "")
5312 omexml.setROIID("ROI:" + i.ToString() + ":" + serie, i);
5313 else
5314 omexml.setROIID(an.roiID, i);
5315 omexml.setROIName(an.roiName, i);
5316 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Point)
5317 {
5318 if (an.id != "")
5319 omexml.setPointID(an.id, i, serie);
5320 else
5321 omexml.setPointID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5322 omexml.setPointX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.X)), i, serie);
5323 omexml.setPointY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Y)), i, serie);
5324 omexml.setPointTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5325 omexml.setPointTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5326 omexml.setPointTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5327 if (an.Text != "")
5328 omexml.setPointText(an.Text, i, serie);
5329 else
5330 omexml.setPointText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5331 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5332 omexml.setPointFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5333 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5334 omexml.setPointStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5335 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5336 omexml.setPointStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5337 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5338 omexml.setPointFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5339 }
5340 else
5341 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon || an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform)
5342 {
5343 if (an.id != "")
5344 omexml.setPolygonID(an.id, i, serie);
5345 else
5346 omexml.setPolygonID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5347 omexml.setPolygonPoints(an.PointsToString(b), i, serie);
5348 omexml.setPolygonTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5349 omexml.setPolygonTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5350 omexml.setPolygonTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5351 if (an.Text != "")
5352 omexml.setPolygonText(an.Text, i, serie);
5353 else
5354 omexml.setPolygonText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5355 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5356 omexml.setPolygonFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5357 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5358 omexml.setPolygonStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5359 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5360 omexml.setPolygonStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5361 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5362 omexml.setPolygonFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5363 }
5364 else
5365 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Rectangle)
5366 {
5367 if (an.id != "")
5368 omexml.setRectangleID(an.id, i, serie);
5369 else
5370 omexml.setRectangleID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5371 omexml.setRectangleWidth(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(an.W)), i, serie);
5372 omexml.setRectangleHeight(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(an.H)), i, serie);
5373 omexml.setRectangleX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
5374 omexml.setRectangleY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
5375 omexml.setRectangleTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5376 omexml.setRectangleTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5377 omexml.setRectangleTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5378 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5379 if (an.Text != "")
5380 omexml.setRectangleText(an.Text, i, serie);
5381 else
5382 omexml.setRectangleText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5383 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5384 omexml.setRectangleFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5385 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5386 omexml.setRectangleStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5387 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5388 omexml.setRectangleStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5389 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5390 omexml.setRectangleFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5391 }
5392 else
5393 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Line)
5394 {
5395 if (an.id != "")
5396 omexml.setLineID(an.id, i, serie);
5397 else
5398 omexml.setLineID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5399 omexml.setLineX1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(0).X)), i, serie);
5400 omexml.setLineY1(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(0).Y)), i, serie);
5401 omexml.setLineX2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.GetPoint(1).X)), i, serie);
5402 omexml.setLineY2(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.GetPoint(1).Y)), i, serie);
5403 omexml.setLineTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5404 omexml.setLineTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5405 omexml.setLineTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5406 if (an.Text != "")
5407 omexml.setLineText(an.Text, i, serie);
5408 else
5409 omexml.setLineText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5410 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5411 omexml.setLineFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5412 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5413 omexml.setLineStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5414 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5415 omexml.setLineStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5416 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5417 omexml.setLineFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5418 }
5419 else
5420 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Ellipse)
5421 {
5422
5423 if (an.id != "")
5424 omexml.setEllipseID(an.id, i, serie);
5425 else
5426 omexml.setEllipseID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5427 //We need to change System.Drawing.Rectangle to ellipse radius;
5428 double w = (double)an.W / 2;
5429 double h = (double)an.H / 2;
5430 omexml.setEllipseRadiusX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeX(w)), i, serie);
5431 omexml.setEllipseRadiusY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSizeY(h)), i, serie);
5432
5433 double x = an.Point.X + w;
5434 double y = an.Point.Y + h;
5435 omexml.setEllipseX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(x)), i, serie);
5436 omexml.setEllipseY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(y)), i, serie);
5437 omexml.setEllipseTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5438 omexml.setEllipseTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5439 omexml.setEllipseTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5440 if (an.Text != "")
5441 omexml.setEllipseText(an.Text, i, serie);
5442 else
5443 omexml.setEllipseText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5444 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5445 omexml.setEllipseFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5446 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5447 omexml.setEllipseStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5448 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5449 omexml.setEllipseStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5450 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5451 omexml.setEllipseFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5452 }
5453 else
5454 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Label)
5455 {
5456 if (an.id != "")
5457 omexml.setLabelID(an.id, i, serie);
5458 else
5459 omexml.setLabelID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5460 omexml.setLabelX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
5461 omexml.setLabelY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
5462 omexml.setLabelTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5463 omexml.setLabelTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5464 omexml.setLabelTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5465 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5466 if (an.Text != "")
5467 omexml.setLabelText(an.Text, i, serie);
5468 else
5469 omexml.setLabelText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5470 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5471 omexml.setLabelFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5472 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5473 omexml.setLabelStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5474 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5475 omexml.setLabelStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5476 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5477 omexml.setLabelFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5478 }
5479 else
5480 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Mask || an.roiMask != null)
5481 {
5482 if (an.id != "")
5483 omexml.setMaskID(an.id, i, serie);
5484 else
5485 omexml.setMaskID("Shape:" + i + ":" + serie, i, serie);
5486 omexml.setMaskX(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceX(an.Rect.X)), i, serie);
5487 omexml.setMaskY(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.ToImageSpaceY(an.Rect.Y)), i, serie);
5488 omexml.setMaskTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.Z)), i, serie);
5489 omexml.setMaskTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.C)), i, serie);
5490 omexml.setMaskTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(an.coord.T)), i, serie);
5491 omexml.setMaskWidth(new java.lang.Double(an.W), i, serie);
5492 omexml.setMaskHeight(new java.lang.Double(an.H), i, serie);
5493 if (an.Text != "")
5494 omexml.setMaskText(an.Text, i, serie);
5495 else
5496 omexml.setMaskText(i.ToString(), i, serie);
5497 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.fontSize), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5498 omexml.setMaskFontSize(fl, i, serie);
5499 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.strokeColor.R, an.strokeColor.G, an.strokeColor.B, an.strokeColor.A);
5500 omexml.setMaskStrokeColor(col, i, serie);
5501 ome.units.quantity.Length sw = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(an.strokeWidth), ome.units.UNITS.PIXEL);
5502 omexml.setMaskStrokeWidth(sw, i, serie);
5503 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = new ome.xml.model.primitives.Color(an.fillColor.R, an.fillColor.G, an.fillColor.B, an.fillColor.A);
5504 omexml.setMaskFillColor(colf, i, serie);
5505 byte[] bts = an.roiMask.GetBytes();
5506 omexml.setMaskBinData(bts, i, serie);
5507 omexml.setMaskBinDataBigEndian(new java.lang.Boolean(!BitConverter.IsLittleEndian), i, serie);
5508 omexml.setMaskBinDataLength(new NonNegativeLong(new java.lang.Long(bts.Length)), i, serie);
5509 omexml.setMaskBinDataCompression(ome.xml.model.enums.Compression.ZLIB, i, serie);
5510 }
5511
5512 i++;
5513 }
5514
5515 if (b.Buffers[0].Plane != null && planes)
5516 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
5517 {
5518 //Correct order of parameters.
5519 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta != 0)
5520 {
5521 ome.units.quantity.Time t = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Delta), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
5522 omexml.setPlaneDeltaT(t, serie, bu);
5523 }
5524 if (b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure != 0)
5525 {
5526 ome.units.quantity.Time et = new ome.units.quantity.Time(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Exposure), ome.units.UNITS.MILLISECOND);
5527 omexml.setPlaneExposureTime(et, serie, bu);
5528 }
5529 ome.units.quantity.Length lx = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.X), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5530 ome.units.quantity.Length ly = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Y), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5531 ome.units.quantity.Length lz = new ome.units.quantity.Length(java.lang.Double.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Location.Z), ome.units.UNITS.MICROMETER);
5532 omexml.setPlanePositionX(lx, serie, bu);
5533 omexml.setPlanePositionY(ly, serie, bu);
5534 omexml.setPlanePositionZ(lz, serie, bu);
5535 omexml.setPlaneTheC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
5536 omexml.setPlaneTheZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
5537 omexml.setPlaneTheT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
5538
5539 omexml.setTiffDataPlaneCount(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(1)), serie, bu);
5540 omexml.setTiffDataIFD(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(bu)), serie, bu);
5541 omexml.setTiffDataFirstC(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.C)), serie, bu);
5542 omexml.setTiffDataFirstZ(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.Z)), serie, bu);
5543 omexml.setTiffDataFirstT(new NonNegativeInteger(java.lang.Integer.valueOf(b.Buffers[bu].Plane.Coordinate.T)), serie, bu);
5544
5545 }
5546
5547 }
5548 writer.setMetadataRetrieve(omexml);
5549 f = f.Replace("\\", "/");
5550 writer.setId(f);
5551 status = "Saving OME Image Planes.";
5552 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
5553 {
5554 BioImage b = files[i];
5555 writer.setSeries(i);
5556 for (int bu = 0; bu < b.Buffers.Count; bu++)
5557 {
5558 byte[] bts = b.Buffers[bu].GetSaveBytes(BitConverter.IsLittleEndian);
5559 writer.saveBytes(bu, bts);
5560 }
5561 }
5562 writer.close();
5563 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, files, f, planes);
5564 }
5576 public static int GetBands(PixelFormat format)
5577 {
5578 switch (format)
5579 {
5580 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed: return 1;
5581 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale: return 1;
5582 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb: return 3;
5583 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb:
5584 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppPArgb:
5585 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppRgb:
5586 return 4;
5587 case AForge.PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb:
5588 return 3;
5589 default:
5590 throw new NotSupportedException($"Unsupported pixel format: {format}");
5591 }
5592 }
5603 public static void SaveOMEPyramidal(BioImage[] bms, string file, Enums.ForeignTiffCompression compression, int compressionLevel)
5604 {
5605 if (File.Exists(file))
5606 File.Delete(file);
5607 //We need to go through the images and find the ones belonging to each resolution.
5608 //As well we need to determine the dimensions of the tiles.
5609 Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>> bis = new Dictionary<double, List<BioImage>>();
5610 Dictionary<double, Point3D> min = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
5611 Dictionary<double, Point3D> max = new Dictionary<double, Point3D>();
5612 for (int i = 0; i < bms.Length; i++)
5613 {
5614 Resolution res = bms[i].Resolutions[bms[i].Level];
5615 if (bis.ContainsKey(res.PhysicalSizeX))
5616 {
5617 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
5618 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5619 {
5620 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5621 }
5622 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5623 {
5624 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5625 }
5626 }
5627 else
5628 {
5629 bis.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new List<BioImage>());
5630 min.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue, double.MaxValue));
5631 max.Add(res.PhysicalSizeX, new Point3D(double.MinValue, double.MinValue, double.MinValue));
5632 if (bms[i].StageSizeX < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY < min[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5633 {
5634 min[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5635 }
5636 if (bms[i].StageSizeX > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].X || bms[i].StageSizeY > max[res.PhysicalSizeX].Y)
5637 {
5638 max[res.PhysicalSizeX] = bms[i].Volume.Location;
5639 }
5640 bis[res.PhysicalSizeX].Add(bms[i]);
5641 }
5642 }
5643 int s = 0;
5644 //We determine the sizes of each resolution.
5645 Dictionary<double, AForge.Size> ss = new Dictionary<double, AForge.Size>();
5646 int minx = int.MaxValue;
5647 int miny = int.MaxValue;
5648 double last = 0;
5649 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
5650 {
5651 int xs = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].X - min[px].X) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth)) * bis[px][0].SizeX;
5652 int ys = (1 + (int)Math.Ceiling((max[px].Y - min[px].Y) / bis[px][0].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight)) * bis[px][0].SizeY;
5653 if (minx > xs)
5654 minx = xs;
5655 if (miny > ys)
5656 miny = ys;
5657 ss.Add(px, new AForge.Size(xs, ys));
5658 last = px;
5659 }
5660 s = 0;
5661 string met = "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\" standalone=\"no\"?>" +
5662 "<OME xmlns=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06\" " +
5663 "xmlns:xsi=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance\" " +
5664 "xsi:schemaLocation=\"http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06 http://www.openmicroscopy.org/Schemas/OME/2016-06/ome.xsd\">";
5665 NetVips.Image img = null;
5666 int ib = 0;
5667
5668 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
5669 {
5670 int c = bis[px][s].SizeC;
5671 if (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].isRGB)
5672 c = 3;
5673 string endian = (bis[px][s].Buffers[0].LittleEndian).ToString().ToLower();
5674 met +=
5675 "<Image ID=\"Image:" + ib + "\">" +
5676 "<Pixels BigEndian=\"" + endian + "\" DimensionOrder= \"XYCZT\" ID= \"Pixels:0\" Interleaved=\"true\" " +
5677 "PhysicalSizeX=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeX + "\" PhysicalSizeXUnit=\"µm\" PhysicalSizeY=\"" + bis[px][s].PhysicalSizeY + "\" PhysicalSizeYUnit=\"µm\" SignificantBits=\"" + bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel + "\" " +
5678 "SizeC = \"" + c + "\" SizeT = \"" + bis[px][s].SizeT + "\" SizeX =\"" + ss[px].Width +
5679 "\" SizeY= \"" + ss[px].Height + "\" SizeZ=\"" + bis[px][s].SizeZ;
5680 if (bis[px][s].bitsPerPixel > 8) met += "\" Type= \"uint16\">";
5681 else met += "\" Type= \"uint8\">";
5682 int i = 0;
5683 foreach (Channel ch in bis[px][s].Channels)
5684 {
5685 met += "<Channel ID=\"Channel:" + ib + ":" + i + "\" SamplesPerPixel=\"1\"></Channel>";
5686 i++;
5687 }
5688 met += "</Pixels></Image>";
5689 ib++;
5690 }
5691 met += "</OME>";
5692 foreach (double px in bis.Keys)
5693 {
5694 PixelFormat pf = bis[px][0].Buffers[0].PixelFormat;
5695 Bitmap level = new Bitmap(ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, pf);
5696 int bands = GetBands(pf);
5697 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
5698 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(level.Data, (ulong)level.Length, level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
5699 else
5700 img = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(level.Data, (ulong)level.Length, level.Width, level.Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
5701 int i = 0;
5702 foreach (BioImage b in bis[px])
5703 {
5704 AForge.Size si = ss[px];
5705 double xs = (-(min[px].X - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.X) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeWidth) * bis[px][i].SizeX;
5706 double ys = (-(min[px].Y - bis[px][i].Volume.Location.Y) / bis[px][i].Resolutions[0].VolumeHeight) * bis[px][i].SizeY;
5707 NetVips.Image tile;
5708 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
5709 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Data, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Width, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Ushort);
5710 else
5711 tile = NetVips.Image.NewFromMemory(bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Data, (ulong)bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Length, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Width, bis[px][i].Buffers[0].Height, bands, Enums.BandFormat.Uchar);
5712 img = img.Insert(tile, (int)xs, (int)ys);
5713 i++;
5714 };
5715 using var mutated = img.Mutate(mutable =>
5716 {
5717 // Set the ImageDescription tag
5718 mutable.Set(GValue.GStrType, "image-description", met);
5719 mutable.Set(GValue.GIntType, "page-height", ss[last].Height);
5720 });
5721 if (bis[px][0].bitsPerPixel > 8)
5722 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 16,
5723 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
5724 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
5725 else
5726 mutated.Tiffsave(file, compression, 1, Enums.ForeignTiffPredictor.None, true, ss[px].Width, ss[px].Height, true, false, 8,
5727 Enums.ForeignTiffResunit.Cm, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeX, 1000 * bis[px][0].PhysicalSizeY, true, null, Enums.RegionShrink.Nearest,
5728 compressionLevel, true, Enums.ForeignDzDepth.One, true, false, null, null, ss[px].Height);
5729 s++;
5730 }
5731
5732 }
5733
5742 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, bool tab)
5743 {
5744 return OpenOMESeries(file, tab, true)[0];
5745 }
5754 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, int serie)
5755 {
5756 return OpenOME(file, serie, true, false, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
5757 }
5769 public static BioImage FilesToStack(string[] files, int sizeZ, int sizeC, int sizeT)
5770 {
5771 BioImage b = new BioImage(files[0]);
5772 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
5773 {
5774 BioImage bb = OpenFile(files[i], false);
5775 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
5776 }
5777 b.UpdateCoords(sizeZ, sizeC, sizeT);
5778 Images.AddImage(b, true);
5779 return b;
5780 }
5786 public static BioImage FolderToStack(string path, bool tab)
5787 {
5788 string[] files = Directory.GetFiles(path);
5789 BioImage b = new BioImage(files[0]);
5790 int z = 0;
5791 int c = 0;
5792 int t = 0;
5793 BioImage bb = null;
5794 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
5795 {
5796 string[] st = files[i].Split('_');
5797 if (st.Length > 3)
5798 {
5799 z = int.Parse(st[1].Replace("Z", ""));
5800 c = int.Parse(st[2].Replace("C", ""));
5801 t = int.Parse(st[3].Replace("T", ""));
5802 }
5803 bb = OpenFile(files[i], tab);
5804 b.Buffers.AddRange(bb.Buffers);
5805 }
5806 if (z == 0)
5807 {
5808 /*TO DO
5809 ImagesToStack im = new ImagesToStack();
5810 if (im.ShowDialog() != DialogResult.OK)
5811 return null;
5812 b.UpdateCoords(im.SizeZ, im.SizeC, im.SizeT);
5813 */
5814 }
5815 else
5816 b.UpdateCoords(z + 1, c + 1, t + 1);
5817 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
5818 return b;
5819 }
5820 static bool vips = false;
5829 public static void OpenVips(BioImage b, int pagecount)
5830 {
5831 try
5832 {
5833 for (int i = 0; i < pagecount; i++)
5834 {
5835 b.vipPages.Add(NetVips.Image.Tiffload(b.file, i));
5836 }
5837 }
5838 catch (Exception e)
5839 {
5840 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
5841 }
5842
5843 }
5863 public static Bitmap ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(BioImage b, int x, int y, int width, int height, int res)
5864 {
5865 try
5866 {
5867 NetVips.Image subImage = b.vipPages[res].Crop(x, y, width, height);
5868 if (b.vipPages[res].Format == Enums.BandFormat.Uchar)
5869 {
5870 Bitmap bm;
5871 byte[] imageData = subImage.WriteToMemory();
5872 if (b.Resolutions[res].RGBChannelsCount == 3)
5873 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
5874 else
5875 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
5876 return bm;
5877
5878 }
5879 else if (b.vipPages[res].Format == Enums.BandFormat.Ushort)
5880 {
5881 Bitmap bm;
5882 byte[] imageData = subImage.WriteToMemory();
5883 if (b.Resolutions[res].RGBChannelsCount == 3)
5884 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
5885 else
5886 bm = new Bitmap(width, height, PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed, imageData, new ZCT(), b.file);
5887 return bm;
5888 }
5889 }
5890 catch (Exception ex)
5891 {
5892 Console.WriteLine($"Error: {ex.Message}");
5893 return null;
5894 }
5895 return null;
5896 }
5923 public static BioImage OpenOME(string file, int serie, bool tab, bool addToImages, bool tile, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY, bool useOpenSlide = true)
5924 {
5925 if (file == null || file == "")
5926 throw new InvalidDataException("File is empty or null");
5927 //We wait incase OME has not initialized.
5928 do
5929 {
5930 Thread.Sleep(10);
5931 } while (!initialized);
