5932 Console.WriteLine("OpenOME " + file);
5933 reader = new ImageReader();
5934 if (tileSizeX == 0)
5935 tileSizeX = 1920;
5936 if (tileSizeY == 0)
5937 tileSizeY = 1080;
5938 progFile = file;
5939 BioImage b = new BioImage(file);
5940 b.Type = ImageType.stack;
5941 b.Loading = true;
5942 if (b.meta == null)
5943 b.meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
5944 string f = file.Replace("\\", "/");
5945 string cf = reader.getCurrentFile();
5946 if (cf != null)
5947 cf = cf.Replace("\\", "/");
5948 if (cf != f)
5949 {
5950 reader.close();
5951 reader.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
5952 try
5953 {
5954 reader.setId(f);
5955 }
5956 catch (Exception e)
5957 {
5958 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
5959 return null;
5960 }
5961 }
5962
5963 //status = "Reading OME Metadata.";
5964 reader.setSeries(serie);
5965 int RGBChannelCount = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
5966 //OME reader.getBitsPerPixel(); sometimes returns incorrect bits per pixel, like when opening ImageJ images.
5967 //So we check the pixel type from xml metadata and if it fails we use the readers value.
5968 PixelFormat PixelFormat;
5969 try
5970 {
5971 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, b.meta.getPixelsType(serie));
5972 }
5973 catch (Exception)
5974 {
5975 PixelFormat = GetPixelFormat(RGBChannelCount, reader.getBitsPerPixel());
5976 }
5977
5978 b.id = file;
5979 b.file = file;
5980 int SizeX, SizeY;
5981 SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
5982 SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
5983 int SizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
5984 b.sizeC = reader.getSizeC();
5985 b.sizeZ = reader.getSizeZ();
5986 b.sizeT = reader.getSizeT();
5987 b.littleEndian = reader.isLittleEndian();
5988 b.seriesCount = reader.getSeriesCount();
5989 b.imagesPerSeries = reader.getImageCount();
5990 if (PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb || PixelFormat == PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)
5991 b.bitsPerPixel = 8;
5992 else
5993 b.bitsPerPixel = 16;
5994 b.series = serie;
5995 string order = reader.getDimensionOrder();
5996
5997 //Lets get the channels and initialize them
5998 int i = 0;
5999 int sumSamples = 0;
6000 while (true)
6001 {
6002 bool def = false;
6003 try
6004 {
6005 int s = b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i).getNumberValue().intValue();
6006 Channel ch = new Channel(i, b.bitsPerPixel, s);
6007 if (b.meta.getChannelSamplesPerPixel(serie, i) != null)
6008 {
6009 ch.SamplesPerPixel = s;
6010 sumSamples += s;
6011 def = true;
6012 b.Channels.Add(ch);
6013 i++;
6014 }
6015 //If this channel is not defined we have loaded all the channels in the file.
6016 if (!def)
6017 break;
6018 if (b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i) != null)
6019 ch.Name = b.meta.getChannelName(serie, i);
6020 if (b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i) != null)
6021 ch.AcquisitionMode = b.meta.getChannelAcquisitionMode(serie, i).ToString();
6022 if (b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i) != null)
6023 ch.info.ID = b.meta.getChannelID(serie, i);
6024 if (b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i) != null)
6025 ch.Fluor = b.meta.getChannelFluor(serie, i);
6026 if (b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i) != null)
6027 {
6028 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color cc = b.meta.getChannelColor(serie, i);
6029 ch.Color = Color.FromArgb(cc.getRed(), cc.getGreen(), cc.getBlue());
6030 }
6031 if (b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i) != null)
6032 ch.IlluminationType = b.meta.getChannelIlluminationType(serie, i).ToString();
6033 if (b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i) != null)
6034 ch.ContrastMethod = b.meta.getChannelContrastMethod(serie, i).ToString();
6035 if (b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i) != null)
6036 ch.Emission = b.meta.getChannelEmissionWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
6037 if (b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i) != null)
6038 ch.Excitation = b.meta.getChannelExcitationWavelength(serie, i).value().intValue();
6039 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i) != null)
6040 ch.LightSourceIntensity = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodePower(serie, i).value().doubleValue();
6041 if (b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i) != null)
6042 ch.DiodeName = b.meta.getLightEmittingDiodeID(serie, i);
6043 if (b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i) != null)
6044 ch.LightSourceAttenuation = b.meta.getChannelLightSourceSettingsAttenuation(serie, i).toString();
6045 if (i == 0)
6046 {
6047 b.rgbChannels[0] = 0;
6048 }
6049 else
6050 if (i == 1)
6051 {
6052 b.rgbChannels[1] = 1;
6053 }
6054 else
6055 if (i == 2)
6056 {
6057 b.rgbChannels[2] = 2;
6058 }
6059 }
6060 catch (Exception e)
6061 {
6062 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6063 if (!def)
6064 break;
6065 }
6066 }
6067 //If the file doens't have channels we initialize them.
6068 if (b.Channels.Count == 0)
6069 {
6070 b.Channels.Add(new Channel(0, b.bitsPerPixel, RGBChannelCount));
6071 }
6072
6073 int resc = reader.getResolutionCount();
6074
6075 try
6076 {
6077 int wells = b.meta.getWellCount(0);
6078 if(wells>0)
6079 {
6080 b.Type = ImageType.well;
6081 b.Plate = new WellPlate(b);
6082 tile = false;
6083 }
6084 }
6085 catch (Exception)
6086 {
6087
6088 }
6089 List<Resolution> rss = new List<Resolution>();
6090 for (int s = 0; s < b.seriesCount; s++)
6091 {
6092 reader.setSeries(s);
6093 for (int r = 0; r < reader.getResolutionCount(); r++)
6094 {
6095 Resolution res = new Resolution();
6096 try
6097 {
6098 int rgbc = reader.getRGBChannelCount();
6099 int bps = reader.getBitsPerPixel();
6100 PixelFormat px;
6101 try
6102 {
6103 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, b.meta.getPixelsType(r));
6104 }
6105 catch (Exception)
6106 {
6107 px = GetPixelFormat(rgbc, bps);
6108 }
6109 res.PixelFormat = px;
6110 res.SizeX = reader.getSizeX();
6111 res.SizeY = reader.getSizeY();
6112 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(r) != null)
6113 {
6114 res.PhysicalSizeX = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(r).value().doubleValue();
6115 }
6116 else
6117 res.PhysicalSizeX = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
6118 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(r) != null)
6119 {
6120 res.PhysicalSizeY = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(r).value().doubleValue();
6121 }
6122 else
6123 res.PhysicalSizeY = (96 / 2.54) / 1000;
6124
6125 if (b.meta.getStageLabelX(r) != null)
6126 res.StageSizeX = b.meta.getStageLabelX(r).value().doubleValue();
6127 if (b.meta.getStageLabelY(r) != null)
6128 res.StageSizeY = b.meta.getStageLabelY(r).value().doubleValue();
6129 if (b.meta.getStageLabelZ(r) != null)
6130 res.StageSizeZ = b.meta.getStageLabelZ(r).value().doubleValue();
6131 else
6132 res.StageSizeZ = 1;
6133 if (b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(r) != null)
6134 {
6135 res.PhysicalSizeZ = b.meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(r).value().doubleValue();
6136 }
6137 else
6138 {
6139 res.PhysicalSizeZ = 1;
6140 }
6141 }
6142 catch (Exception e)
6143 {
6144 Console.WriteLine("No Stage Coordinates. PhysicalSize:(" + res.PhysicalSizeX + "," + res.PhysicalSizeY + "," + res.PhysicalSizeZ + ")");
6145 }
6146 rss.Add(res);
6147 }
6148 }
6149 reader.setSeries(serie);
6150
6151 int pyramidCount = 0;
6152 int pyramidResolutions = 0;
6153 List<Tuple<int, int>> prs = new List<Tuple<int, int>>();
6154 //We need to determine if this image is pyramidal or not.
6155 //We do this by seeing if the resolutions are downsampled or not.
6156 if (rss.Count > 1 && b.Type != ImageType.well)
6157 {
6158 if (rss[0].SizeX > rss[1].SizeX)
6159 {
6160 b.Type = ImageType.pyramidal;
6161 tile = true;
6162 //We need to determine number of pyramids in this image and which belong to the series we are opening.
6163 int? sr = null;
6164 for (int r = 0; r < rss.Count - 1; r++)
6165 {
6166 if (rss[r].SizeX > rss[r + 1].SizeX && rss[r].PixelFormat == rss[r + 1].PixelFormat)
6167 {
6168 if (sr == null)
6169 {
6170 sr = r;
6171 prs.Add(new Tuple<int, int>(r, 0));
6172 }
6173 }
6174 else
6175 {
6176 if(rss[prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1].PixelFormat == rss[r].PixelFormat)
6177 prs[prs.Count - 1] = new Tuple<int, int>(prs[prs.Count - 1].Item1, r);
6178 sr = null;
6179 }
6180 }
6181 pyramidCount = prs.Count;
6182 for (int p = 0; p < prs.Count; p++)
6183 {
6184 pyramidResolutions += (prs[p].Item2 - prs[p].Item1)+1;
6185 }
6186
6187 if (prs[serie].Item2 == 0)
6188 {
6189 prs[serie] = new Tuple<int, int>(prs[serie].Item1, rss.Count);
6190 }
6191 for (int r = prs[serie].Item1; r < prs[serie].Item2; r++)
6192 {
6193 b.Resolutions.Add(rss[r]);
6194 }
6195 }
6196 else
6197 {
6198 b.Resolutions.AddRange(rss);
6199 }
6200 }
6201 else
6202 b.Resolutions.AddRange(rss);
6203 //If we have 2 resolutions that we're not added they are the label & macro resolutions so we add them to the image.
6204 if(rss.Count != pyramidResolutions && rss.Count > 1)
6205 {
6206 b.Resolutions.Add(rss[rss.Count - 2]);
6207 b.Resolutions.Add(rss[rss.Count - 1]);
6208 }
6209 if(b.Resolutions.Count > 1 && b.Type == ImageType.pyramidal)
6210 {
6211 tile = true;
6212 }
6213 b.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(b.StageSizeX, b.StageSizeY, b.StageSizeZ), new Point3D(b.PhysicalSizeX * SizeX, b.PhysicalSizeY * SizeY, b.PhysicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
6214 int rc = b.meta.getROICount();
6215 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
6216 {
6217 string roiID = b.meta.getROIID(im);
6218 string roiName = b.meta.getROIName(im);
6219 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
6220 int scount = 1;
6221 try
6222 {
6223 scount = b.meta.getShapeCount(im);
6224 }
6225 catch (Exception e)
6226 {
6227 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
6228 }
6229 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
6230 {
6231 string typ = b.meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
6232 ROI an = new ROI();
6233 an.roiID = roiID;
6234 an.roiName = roiName;
6235 an.shapeIndex = sc;
6236 if (typ == "Point")
6237 {
6238 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
6239 an.id = b.meta.getPointID(im, sc);
6240 double dx = b.meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6241 double dy = b.meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6242 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy)));
6243 an.coord = new ZCT();
6244 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
6245 if (nz != null)
6246 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6247 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
6248 if (nc != null)
6249 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6250 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
6251 if (nt != null)
6252 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6253 an.Text = b.meta.getPointText(im, sc);
6254 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
6255 if (fl != null)
6256 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6257 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc);
6258 if (ff != null)
6259 an.family = ff.name();
6260 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
6261 if (col != null)
6262 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6263 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6264 if (fw != null)
6265 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6266 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
6267 if (colf != null)
6268 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6269 }
6270 else
6271 if (typ == "Line")
6272 {
6273 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
6274 an.id = b.meta.getLineID(im, sc);
6275 double px1 = b.meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
6276 double py1 = b.meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
6277 double px2 = b.meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
6278 double py2 = b.meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
6279 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1)));
6280 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2)));
6281 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
6282 if (nz != null)
6283 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6284 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
6285 if (nc != null)
6286 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6287 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
6288 if (nt != null)
6289 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6290 an.coord = co;
6291 an.Text = b.meta.getLineText(im, sc);
6292 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getLineFontSize(im, sc);
6293 if (fl != null)
6294 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6295 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getLineFontFamily(im, sc);
6296 if (ff != null)
6297 an.family = ff.name();
6298 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
6299 if (col != null)
6300 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6301 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6302 if (fw != null)
6303 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6304 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
6305 if (colf != null)
6306 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6307 }
6308 else
6309 if (typ == "Rectangle")
6310 {
6311 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
6312 an.id = b.meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
6313 double px = b.meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6314 double py = b.meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6315 double pw = b.meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
6316 double ph = b.meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
6317 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph));
6318 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
6319 if (nz != null)
6320 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6321 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
6322 if (nc != null)
6323 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6324 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
6325 if (nt != null)
6326 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6327 an.coord = co;
6328
6329 an.Text = b.meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
6330 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getRectangleFontSize(im, sc);
6331 if (fl != null)
6332 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6333 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getRectangleFontFamily(im, sc);
6334 if (ff != null)
6335 an.family = ff.name();
6336 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
6337 if (col != null)
6338 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6339 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6340 if (fw != null)
6341 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6342 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
6343 if (colf != null)
6344 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6345 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = b.meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
6346 }
6347 else
6348 if (typ == "Ellipse")
6349 {
6350 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
6351 an.id = b.meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
6352 double px = b.meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6353 double py = b.meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6354 double ew = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
6355 double eh = b.meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
6356 //We convert the ellipse radius to Rectangle
6357 double w = ew * 2;
6358 double h = eh * 2;
6359 double x = px - ew;
6360 double y = py - eh;
6361 an.Rect = b.ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(x, y, w, h));
6362 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
6363 if (nz != null)
6364 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6365 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
6366 if (nc != null)
6367 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6368 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
6369 if (nt != null)
6370 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6371 an.coord = co;
6372 an.Text = b.meta.getEllipseText(im, sc);
6373 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getEllipseFontSize(im, sc);
6374 if (fl != null)
6375 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6376 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getEllipseFontFamily(im, sc);
6377 if (ff != null)
6378 an.family = ff.name();
6379 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeColor(im, sc);
6380 if (col != null)
6381 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6382 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getEllipseStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6383 if (fw != null)
6384 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6385 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getEllipseFillColor(im, sc);
6386 if (colf != null)
6387 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6388 }
6389 else
6390 if (typ == "Polygon")
6391 {
6392 an.type = ROI.Type.Polygon;
6393 an.id = b.meta.getPolygonID(im, sc);
6394 an.closed = true;
6395 string pxs = b.meta.getPolygonPoints(im, sc);
6396 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
6397 pts = b.ToStageSpace(pts);
6398 if (pts.Length > 100)
6399 {
6400 an.type = ROI.Type.Freeform;
6401 }
6402 an.AddPoints(pts);
6403 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolygonTheZ(im, sc);
6404 if (nz != null)
6405 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6406 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolygonTheC(im, sc);
6407 if (nc != null)
6408 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6409 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolygonTheT(im, sc);
6410 if (nt != null)
6411 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6412 an.coord = co;
6413 an.Text = b.meta.getPolygonText(im, sc);
6414 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPolygonFontSize(im, sc);
6415 if (fl != null)
6416 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6417 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPolygonFontFamily(im, sc);
6418 if (ff != null)
6419 an.family = ff.name();
6420 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeColor(im, sc);
6421 if (col != null)
6422 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6423 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolygonStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6424 if (fw != null)
6425 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6426 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolygonFillColor(im, sc);
6427 if (colf != null)
6428 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6429 }
6430 else
6431 if (typ == "Polyline")
6432 {
6433 an.type = ROI.Type.Polyline;
6434 an.id = b.meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);
6435 string pxs = b.meta.getPolylinePoints(im, sc);
6436 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
6437 for (int pi = 0; pi < pts.Length; pi++)
6438 {
6439 pts[pi] = b.ToStageSpace(pts[pi]);
6440 }
6441 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(pxs));
6442 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getPolylineTheZ(im, sc);
6443 if (nz != null)
6444 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6445 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getPolylineTheC(im, sc);
6446 if (nc != null)
6447 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6448 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getPolylineTheT(im, sc);
6449 if (nt != null)
6450 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6451 an.coord = co;
6452 an.Text = b.meta.getPolylineText(im, sc);
6453 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getPolylineFontSize(im, sc);
6454 if (fl != null)
6455 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6456 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getPolylineFontFamily(im, sc);
6457 if (ff != null)
6458 an.family = ff.name();
6459 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeColor(im, sc);
6460 if (col != null)
6461 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6462 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getPolylineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6463 if (fw != null)
6464 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6465 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getPolylineFillColor(im, sc);
6466 if (colf != null)
6467 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6468 }
6469 else
6470 if (typ == "Label")
6471 {
6472 an.type = ROI.Type.Label;
6473 an.id = b.meta.getLabelID(im, sc);
6474
6475 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getLabelTheZ(im, sc);
6476 if (nz != null)
6477 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6478 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getLabelTheC(im, sc);
6479 if (nc != null)
6480 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6481 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getLabelTheT(im, sc);
6482 if (nt != null)
6483 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6484 an.coord = co;
6485
6486 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getLabelFontSize(im, sc);
6487 if (fl != null)
6488 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6489 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getLabelFontFamily(im, sc);
6490 if (ff != null)
6491 an.family = ff.name();
6492 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
6493 if (col != null)
6494 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6495 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6496 if (fw != null)
6497 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6498 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
6499 if (colf != null)
6500 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6501 PointD p = new PointD(b.meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), b.meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
6502 an.AddPoint(b.ToStageSpace(p));
6503 an.Text = b.meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
6504 }
6505 else
6506 if (typ == "Mask")
6507 {
6508 byte[] bts = b.meta.getMaskBinData(im, sc);
6509 bool end = b.meta.getMaskBinDataBigEndian(im, sc).booleanValue();
6510 an = ROI.CreateMask(co, bts, b.Resolutions[0].SizeX, b.Resolutions[0].SizeY,new PointD(b.StageSizeX,b.StageSizeY),b.PhysicalSizeX,b.PhysicalSizeY);
6511 an.Text = b.meta.getMaskText(im, sc);
6512 an.id = b.meta.getMaskID(im, sc);
6513 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = b.meta.getMaskTheZ(im, sc);
6514 if (nz != null)
6515 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
6516 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = b.meta.getMaskTheC(im, sc);
6517 if (nc != null)
6518 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
6519 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = b.meta.getMaskTheT(im, sc);
6520 if (nt != null)
6521 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
6522 an.coord = co;
6523
6524 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = b.meta.getMaskFontSize(im, sc);
6525 if (fl != null)
6526 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
6527 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = b.meta.getMaskFontFamily(im, sc);
6528 if (ff != null)
6529 an.family = ff.name();
6530 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = b.meta.getMaskStrokeColor(im, sc);
6531 if (col != null)
6532 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
6533 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = b.meta.getMaskStrokeWidth(im, sc);
6534 if (fw != null)
6535 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
6536 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = b.meta.getMaskFillColor(im, sc);
6537 if (colf != null)
6538 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
6539 }
6540 b.Annotations.Add(an);
6541 }
6542 }
6543
6544 List<string> serFiles = new List<string>();
6545 serFiles.AddRange(reader.getSeriesUsedFiles());
6546
6547 b.Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
6548 if (b.Type == ImageType.pyramidal)
6549 {
6550 try
6551 {
6552 string st = OpenSlideImage.DetectVendor(file);
6553 if (st != null && !file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && useOpenSlide)
6554 {
6555 b.openSlideImage = OpenSlideImage.Open(file);
6556 b.openslideBase = (OpenSlideBase)OpenSlideGTK.SlideSourceBase.Create(file, true);
6557 }
6558 else
6559 {
6560 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b, SlideImage.Open(b));
6561 }
6562 }
6563 catch (Exception e)
6564 {
6565 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
6566 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b, SlideImage.Open(b));
6567 }
6568 tile = true;
6569 }
6570 // read the image data bytes
6571 int pages = reader.getImageCount();
6572 bool inter = reader.isInterleaved();
6573 int z = 0;
6574 int c = 0;
6575 int t = 0;
6576 if (!tile)
6577 {
6578 try
6579 {
6580 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
6581 {
6582 Bitmap bf;
6583 byte[] bytes = reader.openBytes(p);
6584 bf = new Bitmap(file, SizeX, SizeY, PixelFormat, bytes, new ZCT(z, c, t), p, null, b.littleEndian, inter);
6585 b.Buffers.Add(bf);
6586 }
6587 }
6588 catch (Exception ex)
6589 {
6590 //If we failed to read an entire plane it is likely too large so we open as pyramidal.
6591 b.Type = ImageType.pyramidal;
6592 try
6593 {
6594 string st = OpenSlideImage.DetectVendor(file);
6595 if (st != null && !file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && useOpenSlide)
6596 {
6597 b.openSlideImage = OpenSlideImage.Open(file);
6598 b.openslideBase = (OpenSlideBase)OpenSlideGTK.SlideSourceBase.Create(file, true);
6599 }
6600 else
6601 {
6602 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b, SlideImage.Open(b));
6603 }
6604 }
6605 catch (Exception e)
6606 {
6607 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
6608 b.slideBase = new SlideBase(b, SlideImage.Open(b));
6609 }
6610 b.imRead = reader;
6611 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
6612 {
6613 b.Buffers.Add(GetTile(b, p, serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY));
6614 }
6615 }
6616
6617 }
6618 else
6619 {
6620 b.imRead = reader;
6621 for (int p = 0; p < pages; p++)
6622 {
6623 b.Buffers.Add(GetTile(b, p, serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY));
6624 }
6625 }
6626 int pls;
6627 try
6628 {
6629 pls = b.meta.getPlaneCount(serie);
6630 }
6631 catch (Exception)
6632 {
6633 pls = 0;
6634 }
6635 if (pls == b.Buffers.Count)
6636 for (int bi = 0; bi < b.Buffers.Count; bi++)
6637 {
6638 Plane pl = new Plane();
6639 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT();
6640 double px = 0; double py = 0; double pz = 0;
6641 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi) != null)
6642 px = b.meta.getPlanePositionX(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6643 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi) != null)
6644 py = b.meta.getPlanePositionY(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6645 if (b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi) != null)
6646 pz = b.meta.getPlanePositionZ(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6647 pl.Location = new AForge.Point3D(px, py, pz);
6648 int cc = 0; int zc = 0; int tc = 0;
6649 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi) != null)
6650 cc = b.meta.getPlaneTheC(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
6651 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheZ(serie, bi) != null)
6652 zc = b.meta.getPlaneTheZ(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
6653 if (b.meta.getPlaneTheT(serie, bi) != null)
6654 tc = b.meta.getPlaneTheT(serie, bi).getNumberValue().intValue();
6655 pl.Coordinate = new ZCT(zc, cc, tc);
6656 if (b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi) != null)
6657 pl.Delta = b.meta.getPlaneDeltaT(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6658 if (b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi) != null)
6659 pl.Exposure = b.meta.getPlaneExposureTime(serie, bi).value().doubleValue();
6660 b.Buffers[bi].Plane = pl;
6661 }
6662 //Bioformats gives a size of 3 for C when saved in ImageJ as RGB. We need to correct for this as C should be 1 for RGB.
6663 if (RGBChannelCount >= 3)
6664 {
6665 b.sizeC = sumSamples / b.Channels[0].SamplesPerPixel;
6666 }
6667 string ord = reader.getDimensionOrder();
6668 if(ord == "XYZCT")
6669 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, Order.ZCT);
6670 else if(ord == "XYCZT")
6671 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, Order.CZT);
6672 else if (ord == "XYTCZ")
6673 b.UpdateCoords(b.SizeZ, b.SizeC, b.SizeT, Order.TCZ);
6674
6675 b.SetLabelMacroResolutions();
6676 AutoThreshold(b, true);
6677 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
6678 b.StackThreshold(true);
6679 else
6680 b.StackThreshold(false);
6681 reader.close();
6682 if (addToImages)
6683 Images.AddImage(b, tab);
6684 b.Loading = false;
6685 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(),false, file, serie, tab, addToImages, tile, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY, true);
6686 return b;
6687 }
6688
6689 public int GetFrameIndex(int z,int c, int t)
6690 {
6691 if(StackOrder == Order.ZCT)
6692 {
6693 return Coords[z, c, t];
6694 }
6695 else if (StackOrder == Order.CZT)
6696 {
6697 return Coords[c, z, t];
6698 }
6699 else
6700 return Coords[t, c, z];
6701 }
6702 public void SetFrameIndex(int z, int c, int t, int val)
6703 {
6704 Coords[z, c, t] = val;
6705 }
6706 public ImageReader imRead;
6707 public Tiff tifRead;
6708 public OpenSlideImage openSlideImage;
6709 static Bitmap bm;
6710 public enum BackEnd
6711 {
6712 OpenSlide,
6713 Bioformats,
6714 LibVips,
6715 }
6728 public static Bitmap GetTile(BioImage b, ZCT coord, int serie, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY, BackEnd backend = BackEnd.Bioformats)
6729 {
6730 if (backend == BackEnd.LibVips || b.file.EndsWith(".tif") && !RuntimeInformation.IsOSPlatform(OSPlatform.Windows))
6731 {
6732 //We can get a tile faster with libvips rather than bioformats.
6733 return ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(b, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY, serie);
6734 }
6735 else
6736 if (backend == BackEnd.OpenSlide || b.openslideBase != null)
6737 {
6738 return new Bitmap(tileSizeX, tileSizeY, AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb, b.openSlideImage.ReadRegion(serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY), new ZCT(), "");
6739 }
6740 else
6741 {
6742 string curfile = b.imRead.getCurrentFile();
6743 if (curfile == null)
6744 {
6745 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6746 b.imRead.close();
6747 b.imRead.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
6748 Console.WriteLine(b.file);
6749 b.imRead.setId(b.file);
6750 }
6751 else
6752 {
6753 string fi = b.file.Replace("\\", "/");
6754 string cf = curfile.Replace("\\", "/");
6755 if (cf != fi)
6756 {
6757 b.imRead.close();
6758 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6759 b.imRead.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
6760 b.imRead.setId(b.file);
6761 }
6762 }
6763 if (b.imRead.getSeries() != serie)
6764 b.imRead.setSeries(serie);
6765 int SizeX = b.imRead.getSizeX();
6766 int SizeY = b.imRead.getSizeY();
6767 bool flat = b.imRead.hasFlattenedResolutions();
6768 int p = b.GetFrameIndex(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T);
6769 bool littleEndian = b.imRead.isLittleEndian();
6770 PixelFormat PixelFormat = b.Resolutions[serie].PixelFormat;
6771 bool interleaved = b.imRead.isInterleaved();
6772 if (tilex < 0)
6773 tilex = 0;
6774 if (tiley < 0)
6775 tiley = 0;
6776 if (tilex >= SizeX)
6777 tilex = SizeX;
6778 if (tiley >= SizeY)
6779 tiley = SizeY;
6780 int sx = tileSizeX;
6781 if (tilex + tileSizeX > SizeX)
6782 sx -= (tilex + tileSizeX) - (SizeX);
6783 int sy = tileSizeY;
6784 if (tiley + tileSizeY > SizeY)
6785 sy -= (tiley + tileSizeY) - (SizeY);
6786 //For some reason calling openBytes with 1x1px area causes an exception.
6787 if (sx <= 1)
6788 return null;
6789 if (sy <= 1)
6790 return null;
6791 try
6792 {
6793 byte[] bytesr = b.imRead.openBytes(b.GetFrameIndex(coord.Z, coord.C, coord.T), tilex, tiley, sx, sy);
6794 return new Bitmap(b.file, sx, sy, PixelFormat, bytesr, coord, p, null, littleEndian, interleaved);
6795 }
6796 catch (Exception e)
6797 {
6798 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6799 return null;
6800 }
6801
6802 }
6803 }
6804 public static Bitmap GetTile(BioImage b, int index, int serie, int tilex, int tiley, int tileSizeX, int tileSizeY)
6805 {
6806 if ((b.file.EndsWith("ome.tif") && vips) || (b.file.EndsWith(".tif") && vips))
6807 {
6808 //We can get a tile faster with libvips rather than bioformats.
6809 return ExtractRegionFromTiledTiff(b, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY, serie);
6810 }
6811 //We check if we can open this with OpenSlide as this is faster than Bioformats with IKVM.
6812 if (b.openSlideImage != null && !b.file.EndsWith("ome.tif"))
6813 {
6814 return new Bitmap(tileSizeX, tileSizeY, AForge.PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb, b.openSlideImage.ReadRegion(serie, tilex, tiley, tileSizeX, tileSizeY), new ZCT(), "");
6815 }
6816
6817 string curfile = b.imRead.getCurrentFile();
6818 if (curfile == null)
6819 {
6820 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6821 b.imRead.close();
6822 b.imRead.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
6823 Console.WriteLine(b.file);
6824 b.imRead.setId(b.file);
6825 }
6826 else
6827 {
6828 string fi = b.file.Replace("\\", "/");
6829 string cf = curfile.Replace("\\", "/");
6830 if (cf != fi)
6831 {
6832 b.imRead.close();
6833 b.meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
6834 b.imRead.setMetadataStore(b.meta);
6835 b.imRead.setId(b.file);
6836 }
6837 }
6838 if (b.imRead.getSeries() != serie)
6839 b.imRead.setSeries(serie);
6840 int SizeX = b.imRead.getSizeX();
6841 int SizeY = b.imRead.getSizeY();
6842 bool flat = b.imRead.hasFlattenedResolutions();
6843 bool littleEndian = b.imRead.isLittleEndian();
6844 bool interleaved = b.imRead.isInterleaved();
6845 PixelFormat PixelFormat = b.Resolutions[serie].PixelFormat;
6846 if (tilex < 0)
6847 tilex = 0;
6848 if (tiley < 0)
6849 tiley = 0;
6850 if (tilex >= SizeX)
6851 tilex = SizeX;
6852 if (tiley >= SizeY)
6853 tiley = SizeY;
6854 int sx = tileSizeX;
6855 if (tilex + tileSizeX > SizeX)
6856 sx -= (tilex + tileSizeX) - (SizeX);
6857 int sy = tileSizeY;
6858 if (tiley + tileSizeY > SizeY)
6859 sy -= (tiley + tileSizeY) - (SizeY);
6860 //For some reason calling openBytes with 1x1px area causes an exception.
6861 if (sx <= 1)
6862 return null;
6863 if (sy <= 1)
6864 return null;
6865 try
6866 {
6867 byte[] bytesr = b.imRead.openBytes(index, tilex, tiley, sx, sy);
6868 return new Bitmap(b.file, sx, sy, PixelFormat, bytesr, new ZCT(), index, null, littleEndian, interleaved);
6869 }
6870 catch (Exception e)
6871 {
6872 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
6873 return null;
6874 }
6875 }
6876 public BioImage GetRegion(int x, int y, int w, int h)
6877 {
6878 string id = System.IO.Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(Filename);
6879 id.Replace(".ome", "");
6880 BioImage bm = Copy();
6881 bm.ID = id + ".ome.tif";
6882 bm.Filename = id + ".ome.tif";
6883 bm.Volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(StageSizeX + (PhysicalSizeX * PyramidalOrigin.X), StageSizeY + (PhysicalSizeY * PyramidalOrigin.Y), StageSizeZ),
6884 new Point3D(w * PhysicalSizeX, h * PhysicalSizeY, SizeZ * PhysicalSizeZ));
6885 bm.Resolutions.Add(new Resolution(w, h, bm.Buffers[0].PixelFormat, PhysicalSizeX, PhysicalSizeY, PhysicalSizeZ, StageSizeX, StageSizeY, StageSizeZ));
6886 bm.Resolutions.RemoveAt(0);
6887 Recorder.AddLine("BioLib.Images.GetImage(\"" + bm.ID + "\").GetRegion("+ x + "," + y + "," + w + "," + h + ");",false);
6888 return bm;
6889 }
6894 public void StackThreshold(bool bit16)
6895 {
6896 if (bit16)
6897 {
6898 for (int ch = 0; ch < Channels.Count; ch++)
6899 {
6900 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[ch].range.Length; i++)
6901 {
6902 Channels[ch].range[i].Min = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMin;
6903 Channels[ch].range[i].Max = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMax;
6904 }
6905 Channels[ch].BitsPerPixel = 16;
6906 }
6907 bitsPerPixel = 16;
6908 }
6909 else
6910 {
6911 for (int ch = 0; ch < Channels.Count; ch++)
6912 {
6913 for (int i = 0; i < Channels[ch].range.Length; i++)
6914 {
6915 Channels[ch].range[i].Min = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMin;
6916 Channels[ch].range[i].Max = (int)Channels[ch].stats[i].StackMax;
6917 }
6918 Channels[ch].BitsPerPixel = 8;
6919 }
6920 bitsPerPixel = 8;
6921 }
6922 Recorder.AddLine("BioLib.Images.GetImage(\"" + id + "\").StackThreshold(" + bit16.ToString().ToLower() + ");", true);
6923 }
6934 public static int GetBitsPerPixel(int bt)
6935 {
6936 if (bt <= 255)
6937 return 8;
6938 if (bt <= 512)
6939 return 9;
6940 else if (bt <= 1023)
6941 return 10;
6942 else if (bt <= 2047)
6943 return 11;
6944 else if (bt <= 4095)
6945 return 12;
6946 else if (bt <= 8191)
6947 return 13;
6948 else if (bt <= 16383)
6949 return 14;
6950 else if (bt <= 32767)
6951 return 15;
6952 else
6953 return 16;
6954 }
6960 public static int GetBitMaxValue(int bt)
6961 {
6962 if (bt == 8)
6963 return 255;
6964 if (bt == 9)
6965 return 512;
6966 else if (bt == 10)
6967 return 1023;
6968 else if (bt == 11)
6969 return 2047;
6970 else if (bt == 12)
6971 return 4095;
6972 else if (bt == 13)
6973 return 8191;
6974 else if (bt == 14)
6975 return 16383;
6976 else if (bt == 15)
6977 return 32767;
6978 else
6979 return 65535;
6980 }
6996 public static PointD[] ToImageSpace(List<PointD> p, int stageSizeX, int stageSizeY, int physicalSizeX, int physicalSizeY)
6997 {
6998 PointD[] ps = new PointD[p.Count];
6999 for (int i = 0; i < p.Count; i++)
7000 {
7001 PointD pp = new PointD();
7002 pp.X = ((p[i].X - stageSizeX) / physicalSizeX);
7003 pp.Y = ((p[i].Y - stageSizeY) / physicalSizeY);
7004 ps[i] = pp;
7005 }
7006 return ps;
7007 }
7017 public static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(int rgbChannelCount, int bitsPerPixel)
7018 {
7019 if (bitsPerPixel == 8)
7020 {
7021 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
7022 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
7023 else if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
7024 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
7025 else if (rgbChannelCount == 4)
7026 return PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
7027 }
7028 else
7029 {
7030 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
7031 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
7032 if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
7033 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
7034 }
7035 throw new NotSupportedException("Not supported pixel format.");
7036 }
7047 public static PixelFormat GetPixelFormat(int rgbChannelCount, ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType px)
7048 {
7049 if (rgbChannelCount == 1)
7050 {
7051 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
7052 return PixelFormat.Format8bppIndexed;
7053 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
7054 return PixelFormat.Format16bppGrayScale;
7055 }
7056 else if (rgbChannelCount == 3)
7057 {
7058 if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT8 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT8)
7059 return PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb;
7060 else if (px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.INT16 || px == ome.xml.model.enums.PixelType.UINT16)
7061 return PixelFormat.Format48bppRgb;
7062 }
7063 else
7064 return PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb;
7065 throw new InvalidDataException("RGBChannels Count of " + rgbChannelCount + " not supported.");
7066 }
7074 public static BioImage[] OpenOMESeries(string file, bool tab, bool addToImages)
7075 {
7076 //We wait incase OME has not initialized yet.
7077 if (!initialized)
7078 do
7079 {
7080 Thread.Sleep(100);
7081 //Application.DoEvents();
7082 } while (!Initialized);
7083 var meta = (IMetadata)((OMEXMLService)new ServiceFactory().getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService))).createOMEXMLMetadata();
7084 reader.setMetadataStore((MetadataStore)meta);
7085 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
7086 try
7087 {
7088 if (reader.getCurrentFile() != file)
7089 {
7090 status = "Opening OME Image.";
7091 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
7092 reader.setId(file);
7093 }
7094 }
7095 catch (Exception e)
7096 {
7097 return null;
7098 }
7099 int count = reader.getSeriesCount();
7100 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[count];
7101 for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)
7102 {
7103 bs[i] = OpenOME(file, i, tab, addToImages, false, 0, 0, 0, 0);
7104 if (bs[i] == null)
7105 return null;
7106 }
7107 return bs;
7108 }
7112 public static async Task OpenAsync(string file, bool OME, bool newtab, bool images, int series)
7113 {
7114 openfile = file;
7115 omes = OME;
7116 tab = newtab;
7117 add = images;
7118 serie = series;
7119 await Task.Run(OpenThread);
7120 }
7124 public static async Task OpenAsync(string[] files, bool OME, bool tab, bool images)
7125 {
7126 foreach (string file in files)
7127 {
7128 await OpenAsync(file, OME, tab, images,0);
7129 }
7130 }
7134 public static void Open(string file)
7135 {
7136 OpenFile(file);
7137 }
7141 public static void Open(string[] files)
7142 {
7143 foreach (string file in files)
7144 {
7145 Open(file);
7146 }
7147 }
7153 public static BioImage ImagesToStack(string[] files, bool tab)
7154 {
7155 BioImage[] bs = new BioImage[files.Length];
7156 int z = 0;
7157 int c = 0;
7158 int t = 0;
7159 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
7160 {
7161 string str = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(files[i]);
7162 str = str.Replace(".ome", "");
7163 string[] st = str.Split('_');
7164 if (st.Length > 3)
7165 {
7166 z = int.Parse(st[1].Replace("Z", ""));
7167 c = int.Parse(st[2].Replace("C", ""));
7168 t = int.Parse(st[3].Replace("T", ""));
7169 }
7170 if (i == 0)
7171 bs[0] = OpenOME(files[i], tab);
7172 else
7173 {
7174 bs[i] = OpenFile(files[i], 0, tab, false);
7175 }
7176 }
7177 BioImage b = BioImage.CopyInfo(bs[0], true, true);
7178 for (int i = 0; i < files.Length; i++)
7179 {
7180 for (int bc = 0; bc < bs[i].Buffers.Count; bc++)
7181 {
7182 b.Buffers.Add(bs[i].Buffers[bc]);
7183 }
7184 }
7185 b.UpdateCoords(z + 1, c + 1, t + 1);
7186 b.Volume = new VolumeD(bs[0].Volume.Location, new Point3D(bs[0].SizeX * bs[0].PhysicalSizeX, bs[0].SizeY * bs[0].PhysicalSizeY, (z + 1) * bs[0].PhysicalSizeZ));
7187 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, files, tab);
7188 return b;
7189 }
7193 public static void Update(BioImage b)
7194 {
7195 b = OpenFile(b.file);
7196 }
7200 public async Task UpdateBuffersPyramidal()
7201 {
7202 try
7203 {
7204
7205 if (Type != ImageType.pyramidal)
7206 return;
7207 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
7208 {
7209 Buffers[i].Dispose();
7210 }
7211 Buffers.Clear();
7212 for (int i = 0; i < imagesPerSeries; i++)
7213 {
7214 if (openSlideImage != null)
7215 {
7216 byte[] bts = openslideBase.GetSlice(new OpenSlideGTK.SliceInfo(PyramidalOrigin.X, PyramidalOrigin.Y, PyramidalSize.Width, PyramidalSize.Height, resolution));
7217 int level = this.LevelFromResolution(resolution);
7218 Buffers.Add(new Bitmap((int)Math.Round(OpenSlideBase.destExtent.Width), (int)Math.Round(OpenSlideBase.destExtent.Height), PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bts, new ZCT(), ""));
7219 }
7220 else
7221 {
7222 start:
7223 byte[] bts = await slideBase.GetSlice(new BioLib.SliceInfo(Math.Round(PyramidalOrigin.X), Math.Round(PyramidalOrigin.Y), PyramidalSize.Width, PyramidalSize.Height, resolution,Coordinate));
7224 if(bts == null)
7225 {
7226 if(PyramidalOrigin.X == 0 && PyramidalOrigin.Y == 0)
7227 {
7228 Resolution = GetUnitPerPixel(0);
7229 }
7230 pyramidalOrigin = new PointD(0, 0);
7231 goto start;
7232 }
7233 try
7234 {
7235 Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap((int)Math.Round(SlideBase.destExtent.Width), (int)Math.Round(SlideBase.destExtent.Height), PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bts, new ZCT(), "");
7236 Buffers.Add(bmp);
7237 }
7238 catch (Exception e)
7239 {
7240 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7241
7242 }
7243 }
7244 }
7245 BioImage.AutoThreshold(this, true);
7246 if (bitsPerPixel > 8)
7247 StackThreshold(true);
7248 else
7249 StackThreshold(false);
7250 }
7251 catch (Exception e)
7252 {
7253 Console.WriteLine(e.Message);
7254 }
7255 }
7256 public async Task<Bitmap[]> GetSlice(int x, int y, int w, int h, double resolution)
7257 {
7258 List<Bitmap> Buffers = new List<Bitmap>();
7259 for (int i = 0; i < imagesPerSeries; i++)
7260 {
7261 if (openSlideImage != null)
7262 {
7263 byte[] bts = openslideBase.GetSlice(new OpenSlideGTK.SliceInfo(x, y, w, h, resolution));
7264 Buffers.Add(new Bitmap((int)Math.Round(OpenSlideBase.destExtent.Width), (int)Math.Round(OpenSlideBase.destExtent.Height), PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb, bts, new ZCT(), ""));
7265 }
7266 else
7267 {
7268 start:
7269 byte[] bts = await slideBase.GetSlice(new SliceInfo(x, y, w, h, resolution, Coordinate));
7270 if (bts == null)
7271 {
7272 if (x == 0 && y == 0)
7273 {
7274 Resolution = GetUnitPerPixel(0);
7275 }
7276 pyramidalOrigin = new PointD(0, 0);
7277 goto start;
7278 }
7279 Buffers.Add(new Bitmap((int)Math.Round(SlideBase.destExtent.Width), (int)Math.Round(SlideBase.destExtent.Height), Resolutions[Level].PixelFormat, bts, new ZCT(), ""));
7280 }
7281 }
7282 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), true, x, y,w,h,resolution);
7283 return Buffers.ToArray();
7284 }
7286 public void Update()
7287 {
7288 Update(this);
7289 }
7290
7291 static string openfile;
7292 static bool omes, tab, add;
7293 static int serie;
7294 static void OpenThread()
7295 {
7296 if(omes)
7297 OpenOME(openfile,serie,tab,add,false,0,0,0,0);
7298 else
7299 OpenFile(openfile, serie, tab, add);
7300 }
7301 static string savefile, saveid;
7302 static bool some;
7303 static int sserie;
7304 static void SaveThread()
7305 {
7306 if (some)
7307 SaveOME(savefile, saveid);
7308 else
7309 SaveFile(savefile, saveid);
7310 }
7323 public static async Task SaveAsync(string file, string id, int serie, bool ome)
7324 {
7325 savefile = file;
7326 saveid = id;
7327 some = ome;
7328 await Task.Run(SaveThread);
7329 }
7330
7331 static List<string> sts = new List<string>();
7332 static void SaveSeriesThread()
7333 {
7334 if (omes)
7335 {
7336 BioImage[] bms = new BioImage[sts.Count];
7337 int i = 0;
7338 foreach (string st in sts)
7339 {
7340 bms[i] = Images.GetImage(st);
7341 }
7342 SaveOMESeries(bms, savefile, Planes);
7343 }
7344 else
7345 SaveSeries(sts.ToArray(), savefile);
7346 }
7356 public static async Task SaveSeriesAsync(BioImage[] imgs, string file, bool ome)
7357 {
7358 sts.Clear();
7359 foreach (BioImage item in imgs)
7360 {
7361 sts.Add(item.ID);
7362 }
7363 savefile = file;
7364 some = ome;
7365 await Task.Run(SaveSeriesThread);
7366 }
7367 static Enums.ForeignTiffCompression comp;
7368 static int compLev= 0;
7369 static BioImage[] bms;
7370 static void SavePyramidalThread()
7371 {
7372 SaveOMEPyramidal(bms, savefile, comp, compLev);
7373 }
7387 public static async Task SavePyramidalAsync(BioImage[] imgs, string file, Enums.ForeignTiffCompression com, int compLevel)
7388 {
7389 bms = imgs;
7390 savefile = file;
7391 comp = com;
7392 compLev = compLevel;
7393 await Task.Run(SavePyramidalThread);
7394 }
7395 private static List<string> openOMEfile = new List<string>();
7397 private static void OpenOME()
7398 {
7399 foreach (string f in openOMEfile)
7400 {
7401 OpenOME(f, true);
7402 }
7403 openOMEfile.Clear();
7404 }
7405 private static string saveOMEfile;
7406 private static string saveOMEID;
7407 static NetVips.Image netim;
7416 public static bool VipsSupport(string file)
7417 {
7418 //Currently GTKSharp and LibVips causes an error so on windows no netvips support.
7419 if (OperatingSystem.IsWindows())
7420 return false;
7421 try
7422 {
7423 netim = NetVips.Image.Tiffload(file);
7424 Settings.AddSettings("VipsSupport", "true");
7425 }
7426 catch (Exception e)
7427 {
7428 Console.WriteLine(e.ToString());
7429 return false;
7430 }
7431 netim.Close();
7432 netim.Dispose();
7433 return true;
7434 }
7435 private static Stopwatch st = new Stopwatch();
7436 private static ServiceFactory factory;
7437 private static OMEXMLService service;
7438 private static ImageReader reader;
7439 private static ImageWriter writer;
7440 private loci.formats.meta.IMetadata meta;
7441
7442 //We use UNIX type line endings since they are supported by ImageJ & BioGTK.
7443 public const char NewLine = '\n';
7444 public const string columns = "ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,S,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE\n";
7445
7451 public static string OpenXML(string file)
7452 {
7453 if (!file.EndsWith(".tif"))
7454 return null;
7455 Tiff image = Tiff.Open(file, "r");
7456 FieldValue[] f = image.GetField(TiffTag.IMAGEDESCRIPTION);
7457 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, file);
7458 return f[0].ToString();
7459 }
7466 public static List<ROI> OpenOMEROIs(string file, int series)
7467 {
7468 List<ROI> Annotations = new List<ROI>();
7469 // create OME-XML metadata store
7470 ServiceFactory factory = new ServiceFactory();
7471 OMEXMLService service = (OMEXMLService)factory.getInstance(typeof(OMEXMLService));
7472 loci.formats.ome.OMEXMLMetadata meta = service.createOMEXMLMetadata();
7473 // create format reader
7474 ImageReader imageReader = new ImageReader();
7475 imageReader.setMetadataStore(meta);
7476 // initialize file
7477 file = file.Replace("\\", "/");
7478 imageReader.setId(file);
7479 int imageCount = imageReader.getImageCount();
7480 int seriesCount = imageReader.getSeriesCount();
7481 double physicalSizeX = 0;
7482 double physicalSizeY = 0;
7483 double physicalSizeZ = 0;
7484 double stageSizeX = 0;
7485 double stageSizeY = 0;
7486 double stageSizeZ = 0;
7487 int SizeX = imageReader.getSizeX();
7488 int SizeY = imageReader.getSizeY();
7489 int SizeZ = imageReader.getSizeY();
7490 try
7491 {
7492 bool hasPhysical = false;
7493 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(series) != null)
7494 {
7495 physicalSizeX = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeX(series).value().doubleValue();
7496 hasPhysical = true;
7497 }
7498 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(series) != null)
7499 {
7500 physicalSizeY = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeY(series).value().doubleValue();
7501 }
7502 if (meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(series) != null)
7503 {
7504 physicalSizeZ = meta.getPixelsPhysicalSizeZ(series).value().doubleValue();
7505 }
7506 else
7507 {
7508 physicalSizeZ = 1;
7509 }
7510 if (meta.getStageLabelX(series) != null)
7511 stageSizeX = meta.getStageLabelX(series).value().doubleValue();
7512 if (meta.getStageLabelY(series) != null)
7513 stageSizeY = meta.getStageLabelY(series).value().doubleValue();
7514 if (meta.getStageLabelZ(series) != null)
7515 stageSizeZ = meta.getStageLabelZ(series).value().doubleValue();
7516 else
7517 stageSizeZ = 1;
7518 }
7519 catch (Exception e)
7520 {
7521 stageSizeX = 0;
7522 stageSizeY = 0;
7523 stageSizeZ = 1;
7524 }
7525 VolumeD volume = new VolumeD(new Point3D(stageSizeX, stageSizeY, stageSizeZ), new Point3D(physicalSizeX * SizeX, physicalSizeY * SizeY, physicalSizeZ * SizeZ));
7526 int rc = meta.getROICount();
7527 for (int im = 0; im < rc; im++)
7528 {
7529 string roiID = meta.getROIID(im);
7530 string roiName = meta.getROIName(im);
7531 ZCT co = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
7532 int scount = 1;
7533 try
7534 {
7535 scount = meta.getShapeCount(im);
7536 }
7537 catch (Exception e)
7538 {
7539 Console.WriteLine(e.Message.ToString());
7540 }
7541 for (int sc = 0; sc < scount; sc++)
7542 {
7543 string type = meta.getShapeType(im, sc);
7544 ROI an = new ROI();
7545 an.roiID = roiID;
7546 an.roiName = roiName;
7547 an.shapeIndex = sc;
7548 if (type == "Point")
7549 {
7550 an.type = ROI.Type.Point;
7551 an.id = meta.getPointID(im, sc);
7552 double dx = meta.getPointX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7553 double dy = meta.getPointY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7554 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(dx, dy), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
7555 an.coord = new ZCT();
7556 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPointTheZ(im, sc);
7557 if (nz != null)
7558 an.coord.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7559 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPointTheC(im, sc);
7560 if (nc != null)
7561 an.coord.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7562 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPointTheT(im, sc);
7563 if (nt != null)
7564 an.coord.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7565 an.Text = meta.getPointText(im, sc);
7566 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPointFontSize(im, sc);
7567 if (fl != null)
7568 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7569 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
7570 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
7571 if (col != null)
7572 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7573 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPointStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7574 if (fw != null)
7575 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7576 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPointStrokeColor(im, sc);
7577 if (colf != null)
7578 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7579 }
7580 else
7581 if (type == "Line")
7582 {
7583 an.type = ROI.Type.Line;
7584 an.id = meta.getLineID(im, sc);
7585 double px1 = meta.getLineX1(im, sc).doubleValue();
7586 double py1 = meta.getLineY1(im, sc).doubleValue();
7587 double px2 = meta.getLineX2(im, sc).doubleValue();
7588 double py2 = meta.getLineY2(im, sc).doubleValue();
7589 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(px1, py1), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
7590 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(new PointD(px2, py2), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
7591 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getLineTheZ(im, sc);
7592 if (nz != null)
7593 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7594 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getLineTheC(im, sc);
7595 if (nc != null)
7596 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7597 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getLineTheT(im, sc);
7598 if (nt != null)
7599 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7600 an.coord = co;
7601 an.Text = meta.getLineText(im, sc);
7602 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getLineFontSize(im, sc);
7603 if (fl != null)
7604 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7605 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
7606 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLineStrokeColor(im, sc);
7607 if (col != null)
7608 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7609 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7610 if (fw != null)
7611 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7612 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLineFillColor(im, sc);
7613 if (colf != null)
7614 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7615 }
7616 else
7617 if (type == "Rectangle")
7618 {
7619 an.type = ROI.Type.Rectangle;
7620 an.id = meta.getRectangleID(im, sc);
7621 double px = meta.getRectangleX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7622 double py = meta.getRectangleY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7623 double pw = meta.getRectangleWidth(im, sc).doubleValue();
7624 double ph = meta.getRectangleHeight(im, sc).doubleValue();
7625 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, pw, ph), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
7626 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getRectangleTheZ(im, sc);
7627 if (nz != null)
7628 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7629 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getRectangleTheC(im, sc);
7630 if (nc != null)
7631 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7632 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getRectangleTheT(im, sc);
7633 if (nt != null)
7634 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7635 an.coord = co;
7636
7637 an.Text = meta.getRectangleText(im, sc);
7638 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getRectangleFontSize(im, sc);
7639 if (fl != null)
7640 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7641 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
7642 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getRectangleStrokeColor(im, sc);
7643 if (col != null)
7644 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7645 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getRectangleStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7646 if (fw != null)
7647 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7648 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getRectangleFillColor(im, sc);
7649 if (colf != null)
7650 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7651 ome.xml.model.enums.FillRule fr = meta.getRectangleFillRule(im, sc);
7652 }
7653 else
7654 if (type == "Ellipse")
7655 {
7656 an.type = ROI.Type.Ellipse;
7657 an.id = meta.getEllipseID(im, sc);
7658 double px = meta.getEllipseX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7659 double py = meta.getEllipseY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7660 double ew = meta.getEllipseRadiusX(im, sc).doubleValue();
7661 double eh = meta.getEllipseRadiusY(im, sc).doubleValue();
7662 //We convert the ellipse radius to Rectangle
7663 double w = ew * 2;
7664 double h = eh * 2;
7665 double x = px - ew;
7666 double y = py - eh;
7667 an.Rect = ToStageSpace(new RectangleD(px, py, w, h), physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
7668 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getEllipseTheZ(im, sc);
7669 if (nz != null)
7670 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7671 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getEllipseTheC(im, sc);
7672 if (nc != null)
7673 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7674 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getEllipseTheT(im, sc);
7675 if (nt != null)
7676 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7677 an.coord = co;
7678 an.Text = meta.getEllipseText(im, sc);
7679 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getEllipseFontSize(im, sc);
7680 if (fl != null)
7681 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7682 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
7683 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getEllipseStrokeColor(im, sc);
7684 if (col != null)
7685 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7686 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getEllipseStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7687 if (fw != null)
7688 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7689 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getEllipseFillColor(im, sc);
7690 if (colf != null)
7691 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7692 }
7693 else
7694 if (type == "Polygon")
7695 {
7696 an.type = ROI.Type.Polygon;
7697 an.id = meta.getPolygonID(im, sc);
7698 an.closed = true;
7699 string pxs = meta.getPolygonPoints(im, sc);
7700 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
7701 pts = ToStageSpace(pts, physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
7702 if (pts.Length > 100)
7703 {
7704 an.type = ROI.Type.Freeform;
7705 }
7706 an.AddPoints(pts);
7707 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPolygonTheZ(im, sc);
7708 if (nz != null)
7709 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7710 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPolygonTheC(im, sc);
7711 if (nc != null)
7712 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7713 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPolygonTheT(im, sc);
7714 if (nt != null)
7715 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7716 an.coord = co;
7717 an.Text = meta.getPolygonText(im, sc);
7718 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPolygonFontSize(im, sc);
7719 if (fl != null)
7720 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7721 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
7722 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPolygonStrokeColor(im, sc);
7723 if (col != null)
7724 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7725 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPolygonStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7726 if (fw != null)
7727 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7728 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPolygonFillColor(im, sc);
7729 if (colf != null)
7730 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7731 }
7732 else
7733 if (type == "Polyline")
7734 {
7735 an.type = ROI.Type.Polyline;
7736 an.id = meta.getPolylineID(im, sc);
7737 string pxs = meta.getPolylinePoints(im, sc);
7738 PointD[] pts = an.stringToPoints(pxs);
7739 for (int pi = 0; pi < pts.Length; pi++)
7740 {
7741 pts[pi] = ToStageSpace(pts[pi], physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y);
7742 }
7743 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(pxs));
7744 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getPolylineTheZ(im, sc);
7745 if (nz != null)
7746 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7747 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getPolylineTheC(im, sc);
7748 if (nc != null)
7749 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7750 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getPolylineTheT(im, sc);
7751 if (nt != null)
7752 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7753 an.coord = co;
7754 an.Text = meta.getPolylineText(im, sc);
7755 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getPolylineFontSize(im, sc);
7756 if (fl != null)
7757 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7758 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
7759 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getPolylineStrokeColor(im, sc);
7760 if (col != null)
7761 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7762 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getPolylineStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7763 if (fw != null)
7764 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7765 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getPolylineFillColor(im, sc);
7766 if (colf != null)
7767 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7768 }
7769 else
7770 if (type == "Label")
7771 {
7772 an.type = ROI.Type.Label;
7773 an.id = meta.getLabelID(im, sc);
7774
7775 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getLabelTheZ(im, sc);
7776 if (nz != null)
7777 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7778 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getLabelTheC(im, sc);
7779 if (nc != null)
7780 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7781 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getLabelTheT(im, sc);
7782 if (nt != null)
7783 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7784 an.coord = co;
7785
7786 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getLabelFontSize(im, sc);
7787 if (fl != null)
7788 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7789 an.family = meta.getPointFontFamily(im, sc).name();
7790 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getLabelStrokeColor(im, sc);
7791 if (col != null)
7792 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7793 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getLabelStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7794 if (fw != null)
7795 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7796 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getLabelFillColor(im, sc);
7797 if (colf != null)
7798 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7799 PointD p = new PointD(meta.getLabelX(im, sc).doubleValue(), meta.getLabelY(im, sc).doubleValue());
7800 an.AddPoint(ToStageSpace(p, physicalSizeX, physicalSizeY, volume.Location.X, volume.Location.Y));
7801 an.Text = meta.getLabelText(im, sc);
7802 }
7803 else
7804 if (type == "Mask")
7805 {
7806 byte[] bts = meta.getMaskBinData(im, sc);
7807 bool end = meta.getMaskBinDataBigEndian(im, sc).booleanValue();
7808 an = ROI.CreateMask(co, bts, SizeX, SizeY, new PointD(stageSizeX, stageSizeY),physicalSizeX,physicalSizeY);
7809 an.Text = meta.getMaskText(im, sc);
7810 an.id = meta.getMaskID(im, sc);
7811 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nz = meta.getMaskTheZ(im, sc);
7812 if (nz != null)
7813 co.Z = nz.getNumberValue().intValue();
7814 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nc = meta.getMaskTheC(im, sc);
7815 if (nc != null)
7816 co.C = nc.getNumberValue().intValue();
7817 ome.xml.model.primitives.NonNegativeInteger nt = meta.getMaskTheT(im, sc);
7818 if (nt != null)
7819 co.T = nt.getNumberValue().intValue();
7820 an.coord = co;
7821
7822 ome.units.quantity.Length fl = meta.getMaskFontSize(im, sc);
7823 if (fl != null)
7824 an.fontSize = fl.value().intValue();
7825 ome.xml.model.enums.FontFamily ff = meta.getMaskFontFamily(im, sc);
7826 if (ff != null)
7827 an.family = ff.name();
7828 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color col = meta.getMaskStrokeColor(im, sc);
7829 if (col != null)
7830 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(col.getAlpha(), col.getRed(), col.getGreen(), col.getBlue());
7831 ome.units.quantity.Length fw = meta.getMaskStrokeWidth(im, sc);
7832 if (fw != null)
7833 an.strokeWidth = (float)fw.value().floatValue();
7834 ome.xml.model.primitives.Color colf = meta.getMaskFillColor(im, sc);
7835 if (colf != null)
7836 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(colf.getAlpha(), colf.getRed(), colf.getGreen(), colf.getBlue());
7837 }
7838 }
7839 }
7840
7841 imageReader.close();
7842 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, file, series);
7843 return Annotations;
7844 }
7850 public static string ROIsToString(List<ROI> Annotations)
7851 {
7852 string s = "";
7853 for (int i = 0; i < Annotations.Count; i++)
7854 {
7855 s += ROIToString(Annotations[i]);
7856 }
7857 return s;
7858 }
7865 public static string ROIToString(ROI an)
7866 {
7867 PointD[] points = an.GetPoints();
7868 string pts = "";
7869 for (int j = 0; j < points.Length; j++)
7870 {
7871 if (j == points.Length - 1)
7872 pts += points[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + points[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7873 else
7874 pts += points[j].X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + "," + points[j].Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + " ";
7875 }
7876 char sep = (char)34;
7877 string sColor = sep.ToString() + an.strokeColor.A.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.R.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.G.ToString() + ',' + an.strokeColor.B.ToString() + sep.ToString();
7878 string bColor = sep.ToString() + an.fillColor.A.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.R.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.G.ToString() + ',' + an.fillColor.B.ToString() + sep.ToString();
7879
7880 string line = an.roiID + ',' + an.roiName + ',' + an.type.ToString() + ',' + an.id + ',' + an.shapeIndex.ToString() + ',' +
7881 an.Text + ',' + an.serie + ',' + an.coord.Z.ToString() + ',' + an.coord.C.ToString() + ',' + an.coord.T.ToString() + ',' + an.X.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + an.Y.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' +
7882 an.W.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + an.H.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + sep.ToString() + pts + sep.ToString() + ',' + sColor + ',' + an.strokeWidth.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + bColor + ',' + an.fontSize.ToString(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture) + ',' + NewLine;
7883 return line;
7884 }
7890 public static ROI StringToROI(string sts)
7891 {
7892 //Works with either comma or tab separated values.
7893 if (sts.StartsWith("<?xml") || sts.StartsWith("{"))
7894 return null;
7895 ROI an = new ROI();
7896 string val = "";
7897 bool inSep = false;
7898 int col = 0;
7899 double x = 0;
7900 double y = 0;
7901 double w = 0;
7902 double h = 0;
7903 string line = sts;
7904 bool points = false;
7905 char sep = '"';
7906 for (int i = 0; i < line.Length; i++)
7907 {
7908 char c = line[i];
7909 if (c == sep)
7910 {
7911 if (!inSep)
7912 {
7913 inSep = true;
7914 }
7915 else
7916 inSep = false;
7917 continue;
7918 }
7919
7920 if ((c == ',' || c == '\t') && (!inSep || points))
7921 {
7922 //ROIID,ROINAME,TYPE,ID,SHAPEINDEX,TEXT,C,Z,T,X,Y,W,H,POINTS,STROKECOLOR,STROKECOLORW,FILLCOLOR,FONTSIZE
7923 if (col == 0)
7924 {
7925 //ROIID
7926 an.roiID = val;
7927 }
7928 else
7929 if (col == 1)
7930 {
7931 //ROINAME
7932 an.roiName = val;
7933 }
7934 else
7935 if (col == 2)
7936 {
7937 //TYPE
7938 an.type = (ROI.Type)Enum.Parse(typeof(ROI.Type), val);
7939 if (an.type == ROI.Type.Freeform || an.type == ROI.Type.Polygon)
7940 an.closed = true;
7941 }
7942 else
7943 if (col == 3)
7944 {
7945 //ID
7946 an.id = val;
7947 }
7948 else
7949 if (col == 4)
7950 {
7951 //SHAPEINDEX/
7952 an.shapeIndex = int.Parse(val);
7953 }
7954 else
7955 if (col == 5)
7956 {
7957 //TEXT/
7958 an.Text = val;
7959 }
7960 else
7961 if (col == 6)
7962 {
7963 an.serie = int.Parse(val);
7964 }
7965 else
7966 if (col == 7)
7967 {
7968 an.coord.Z = int.Parse(val);
7969 }
7970 else
7971 if (col == 8)
7972 {
7973 an.coord.C = int.Parse(val);
7974 }
7975 else
7976 if (col == 9)
7977 {
7978 an.coord.T = int.Parse(val);
7979 }
7980 else
7981 if (col == 10)
7982 {
7983 x = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7984 }
7985 else
7986 if (col == 11)
7987 {
7988 y = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7989 }
7990 else
7991 if (col == 12)
7992 {
7993 w = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7994 }
7995 else
7996 if (col == 13)
7997 {
7998 h = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
7999 }
8000 else
8001 if (col == 14)
8002 {
8003 //POINTS
8004 an.AddPoints(an.stringToPoints(val));
8005 points = false;
8006 an.Rect = new RectangleD(x, y, w, h);
8007 }
8008 else
8009 if (col == 15)
8010 {
8011 //STROKECOLOR
8012 string[] st = val.Split(',');
8013 an.strokeColor = Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
8014 }
8015 else
8016 if (col == 16)
8017 {
8018 //STROKECOLORW
8019 an.strokeWidth = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8020 }
8021 else
8022 if (col == 17)
8023 {
8024 //FILLCOLOR
8025 string[] st = val.Split(',');
8026 an.fillColor = Color.FromArgb(int.Parse(st[0]), int.Parse(st[1]), int.Parse(st[2]), int.Parse(st[3]));
8027 }
8028 else
8029 if (col == 18)
8030 {
8031 //FONTSIZE
8032 double s = double.Parse(val, CultureInfo.InvariantCulture);
8033 an.fontSize = (float)s;
8034 an.family = "Times New Roman";
8035 }
8036 col++;
8037 val = "";
8038 }
8039 else
8040 val += c;
8041 }
8042
8043 return an;
8044 }
8049 public static void ExportROIsCSV(string filename, List<ROI> Annotations)
8050 {
8051 string con = columns;
8052 con += ROIsToString(Annotations);
8053 File.WriteAllText(filename, con);
8054 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false,filename, Annotations);
8055 }
8061 public static List<ROI> ImportROIsCSV(string filename)
8062 {
8063 List<ROI> list = new List<ROI>();
8064 if (!File.Exists(filename))
8065 return list;
8066 string[] sts = File.ReadAllLines(filename);
8067 //We start reading from line 1.
8068 for (int i = 1; i < sts.Length; i++)
8069 {
8070 list.Add(StringToROI(sts[i]));
8071 }
8072 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, filename);
8073 return list;
8074 }
8082 public static void ExportROIFolder(string path, string filename)
8083 {
8084 string[] fs = Directory.GetFiles(path);
8085 int i = 0;
8086 foreach (string f in fs)
8087 {
8088 List<ROI> annotations = OpenOMEROIs(f, 0);
8089 string ff = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(f);
8090 ExportROIsCSV(path + "//" + ff + "-" + i.ToString() + ".csv", annotations);
8091 i++;
8092 }
8093 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), false, path, filename);
8094 }
8095
8096 private static BioImage bstats = null;
8097 private static bool update = false;
8123 public static void AutoThreshold(BioImage b, bool updateImageStats)
8124 {
8125 bstats = b;
8126 Statistics statistics = null;
8127 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8128 statistics = new Statistics(true);
8129 else
8130 statistics = new Statistics(false);
8131 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers.Count; i++)
8132 {
8133 if (b.Buffers[i].Stats == null || updateImageStats)
8134 b.Buffers[i].Stats = Statistics.FromBytes(b.Buffers[i]);
8135 if (b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
8136 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[0]);
8137 else
8138 {
8139 for (int r = 0; r < b.Buffers[i].RGBChannelsCount; r++)
8140 {
8141 statistics.AddStatistics(b.Buffers[i].Stats[r]);
8142 }
8143 }
8144 }
8145 for (int c = 0; c < b.Channels.Count; c++)
8146 {
8147 Statistics[] sts = new Statistics[b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount];
8148 for (int i = 0; i < b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount; i++)
8149 {
8150 if (b.bitsPerPixel > 8)
8151 {
8152 sts[i] = new Statistics(true);
8153 }
8154 else
8155 sts[i] = new Statistics(false);
8156 }
8157 for (int z = 0; z < b.SizeZ; z++)
8158 {
8159 for (int t = 0; t < b.SizeT; t++)
8160 {
8161 int ind;
8162 if(b.Channels.Count > b.SizeC)
8163 {
8164 ind = b.GetFrameIndex(z, 0, t);
8165 }
8166 else
8167 ind = b.GetFrameIndex(z, c, t);
8168 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 1)
8169 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
8170 else
8171 {
8172 sts[0].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[0]);
8173 sts[1].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[1]);
8174 sts[2].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[2]);
8175 if (b.Buffers[ind].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
8176 sts[3].AddStatistics(b.Buffers[ind].Stats[3]);
8177 }
8178 }
8179 }
8180 if (b.RGBChannelCount == 1)
8181 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
8182 else
8183 {
8184 sts[0].MeanHistogram();
8185 sts[1].MeanHistogram();
8186 sts[2].MeanHistogram();
8187 if (b.Buffers[0].RGBChannelsCount == 4)
8188 sts[3].MeanHistogram();
8189 }
8190 b.Channels[c].stats = sts;
8191 }
8192 statistics.MeanHistogram();
8193 b.statistics = statistics;
8194 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(), true, b, updateImageStats);
8195 }
8197 public static void AutoThreshold()
8198 {
8199 AutoThreshold(bstats, update);
8200 }
8204 public static void AutoThresholdThread(BioImage b)
8205 {
8206 bstats = b;
8207 Thread th = new Thread(AutoThreshold);
8208 th.Start();
8209 }
8221 public static int FindFocus(BioImage im, int Channel, int Time)
8222 {
8223 long mf = 0;
8224 int fr = 0;
8225 List<double> dt = new List<double>();
8226 ZCT c = new ZCT(0, 0, 0);
8227 for (int i = 0; i < im.SizeZ; i++)
8228 {
8229 long f = CalculateFocusQuality(im.Buffers[im.GetFrameIndex(i, Channel, Time)]);
8230 dt.Add(f);
8231 if (f > mf)
8232 {
8233 mf = f;
8234 fr = im.GetFrameIndex(i, Channel, Time);
8235 }
8236 }
8237
8238 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(),false, im, Channel, Time);
8239 return fr;
8240 }
8248 public static long CalculateFocusQuality(Bitmap b)
8249 {
8250 if (b.RGBChannelsCount == 1)
8251 {
8252 long sum = 0;
8253 long sumOfSquaresR = 0;
8254 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
8255 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
8256 {
8257 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
8258 sum += pixel.R;
8259 sumOfSquaresR += pixel.R * pixel.R;
8260 }
8261 return sumOfSquaresR * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
8262 }
8263 else
8264 {
8265 long sum = 0;
8266 long sumOfSquares = 0;
8267 for (int y = 0; y < b.SizeY; y++)
8268 for (int x = 0; x < b.SizeX; x++)
8269 {
8270 ColorS pixel = b.GetPixel(x, y);
8271 int p = (pixel.R + pixel.G + pixel.B) / 3;
8272 sum += p;
8273 sumOfSquares += p * p;
8274 }
8275 Recorder.Record(BioLib.Recorder.GetCurrentMethodInfo(),true,b);
8276 return sumOfSquares * b.SizeX * b.SizeY - sum * sum;
8277 }
8278 }
8281 public void Dispose()
8282 {
8283 for (int i = 0; i < Buffers.Count; i++)
8284 {
8285 Buffers[i].Dispose();
8286 }
8287 for (int i = 0; i < Channels.Count; i++)
8288 {
8289 Channels[i].Dispose();
8290 }
8291 for (int i = 0; i < Annotations.Count; i++)
8292 {
8293 Annotations[i].Dispose();
8294 }
8295 }
8300 public override string ToString()
8301 {
8302 return "BioLib.Images.GetImage(\"" + id + "\")";
8303 }
8304
8305 public void ToShort()
8306 {
8307 foreach (var b in Buffers)
8308 {
8309 b.ToShort();
8310 }
8311 }
8312
8313 public void ToFloat()
8314 {
8315 foreach (var b in Buffers)
8316 {
8317 b.ToFloat();
8318 }
8319 }
8320
8327 public static BioImage operator /(BioImage a, float b)
8328 {
8329 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8330 {
8331 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] / b;
8332 }
8333 return a;
8334 }
8335 public static BioImage operator *(BioImage a, float b)
8336 {
8337 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8338 {
8339 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] / b;
8340 }
8341 return a;
8342 }
8349 public static BioImage operator +(BioImage a, float b)
8350 {
8351 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8352 {
8353 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] + b;
8354 }
8355 return a;
8356 }
8363 public static BioImage operator -(BioImage a, float b)
8364 {
8365 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8366 {
8367 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] - b;
8368 }
8369 return a;
8370 }
8371
8372
8379 public static BioImage operator /(BioImage a, ColorS b)
8380 {
8381 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8382 {
8383 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] / b;
8384 }
8385 return a;
8386 }
8393 public static BioImage operator *(BioImage a, ColorS b)
8394 {
8395 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8396 {
8397 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] * b;
8398 }
8399 return a;
8400 }
8408 public static BioImage operator +(BioImage a, ColorS b)
8409 {
8410 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8411 {
8412 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] + b;
8413 }
8414 return a;
8415 }
8422 public static BioImage operator -(BioImage a, ColorS b)
8423 {
8424 for (int i = 0; i < a.Buffers.Count; i++)
8425 {
8426 a.Buffers[i] = a.Buffers[i] - b;
8427 }
8428 return a;
8429 }
8430 }
8431}
